V05bhivin_u:5_0: bhagavān samyaksambuddho yadarthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā śākyeṣu
V05bhivin_u:5_1: viharati śākyānāṃ kapilavastusmin nyagrodhārāme śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho
V05bhivin_u:5_2: bhagavān satkṛtogurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito arcito apacāyito lābhāgrayaśo-'graprāpto
V05bhivin_u:6_0: tatra cānupalipto padmam iva jalena puṇyabhāgīyān satvān puṇyehi niveśayamāno phalabhāgīyān
V05bhivin_u:6_1: satvān phalehi pratiṣṭhāpayamāno vāsanābhāgīyān satvān vāsanāyām avasthāpayamāno
V05bhivin_u:6_2: amṛtam analpakena devamanuṣyān samvibhajanto prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy amṛtaṃ
V05bhivin_u:6_4: kṣeme śive same sthale abhaye nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayamāno āvarjayitvā aṅgamagadhavṛjimallikāśikośalakurupañcālacedivatsamatsyaśūrasenaśividaśārṇa cāsvakiavanti /
V05bhivin_u:7_0: jñāne dṛṣṭaparākramo svayāṃbhūḥ divyehi vihārehi viharanto brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi
V05bhivin_u:7_1: vihārehi aniñjehi vihārehi viharanto brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi vihārehi aniñjehi vihārehi
V05bhivin_u:7_2: sātatye hi vihārehi buddho buddhavihārehi jino jinavihārehi jānako jānakavihārehi
V05bhivin_u:7_3: sarvajño sarvajñavihārehi cetovasiparamapāramipraptāś ca punar buddhā bhagavanto
V05bhivin_u:7_4: yehi yehi vihārehi ākāṅkṣanti tehi tehi vihārehi viharanti vihārakuśalāś ca punar
V05bhivin_u:8_0: 2. atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī cchandāya cchandakapālāya dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare
V05bhivin_u:8_1: ca pañcahi ca śākiyānīśatehi sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ
V05bhivin_u:8_2: pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi ekāntasthitā mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:10: bhagavāṃs caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśayati aupasamiko pārinivāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāya samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:11: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadaṃ bhikṣuṇibhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:13: mā te gautami rocatu tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:15: na khalu bhagavān mātṛgrāmasya avakāśaṃ karoti tathāgata pravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāyeti /
V05bhivin_u:16: sā bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ cchandāya cchandakapālāye dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare ca yena tāni pañca śākiyānīśatāni tenopasaṃkramitvā śākiyānīyo etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:17: na khalu āryamiśrikāyo bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāya /
V05bhivin_u:18_0: kim puna vayam āryamiśrikāyo sāmam eva keśān otārayitvā kāṣāyāni vastrāṇi ācchādayitvā
V05bhivin_u:18_1: kośakābaddhehi yānehi bhagavantaṃ kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ caramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭhimena pṛṣṭhim ābandhema /
V05bhivin_u:19_0: sace mo bhagavān anujāniṣyati pravrajiṣyāmo no ca anujāniṣyati evam tu tāyi bhagavato
V05bhivin_u:19_1: santike brahmacaryañ cariṣyāmaḥ sādhu āryeti tāyo śākiyānīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratyāśrauṣi /
V05bhivin_u:20: 3. atha khalu bhagavān kapilavastusmin nagare yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmi /
V05bhivin_u:21_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī sārdhaṃ cchandāye cchandakapalāye dāsacchandāya
V05bhivin_u:21_1: cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyānīśatehi sātmaneva keśān otārayitvā kāṣāyāṇi
V05bhivin_u:21_2: vastrāṇi ācchādayitvā kośakabaddhehi yānehi bhagavantaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ
V05bhivin_u:22: 4. atha khalu bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caramāno mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcahi bhikṣuśatehi yena kośalānāṃ śrāvastīnagaraṃ tad avasāri /
V05bhivin_u:23: tad anuprāptas tatraiva viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
V05bhivin_u:24: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:25: ekāntasthitā mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:27: bhagavāṃś caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato rhaṃ samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśate aupasamiko ca pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāya samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:28: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:29: evam ukte bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:30: mā te gautamī rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasampadābhikṣuṇibhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:32: na khalu bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāya upasampadāya bhikṣuṇibhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:33: sā bhagavato pādāṃ śirasā vanditvā jetavanasya ārāmadvārakoṣṭhakasamīpe rodamānī asthāsi pādāṇguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhantī /
V05bhivin_u:34_0: addaśāśi khu anyataro bhikṣur mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ jetavanasya ārāmadvārakoṣṭhasamīpe
V05bhivin_u:34_1: rudamānīn tiṣṭhantīṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhentīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān
V05bhivin_u:34_2: ānando tenopasaṃkramitvā āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:35: eṣā āyuṣman ānanda mahāprajāpatī gautamī jetavanasya ārāmakoṣṭhakasamīpe rudamānī tiṣṭhati pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhantī /
V05bhivin_u:36: gacchāvusānanda jānehi kiṃ mahāprapatī gautamī rodīti /
V05bhivin_u:37: 6. atha khalu āyuṣmān ānando yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:39: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:40: alam me āryānanda ruṇṇena yatra hi nāma evaṃ durlabho buddhotpādo evaṃ durlabhā saddharmadeśanā /
V05bhivin_u:41: bhagavāṃś caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo deśīyati aupasamiko pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāyai samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:42_0: na ca bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasampadāya
V05bhivin_u:42_1: bhikṣuṇībhāvasya ścai sādhu tāvāryānanda bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā labheya mātṛgrāmo
V05bhivin_u:42_2: pi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:43: 7. sādhu gautamīti āyuṣmān ānando mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratiśrutvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādauśirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:44_0: ekāntasthito āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat durlabho bhagavan buddhotpādo
V05bhivin_u:44_1: durlabhā saddharmadeśanā bhagavān cetarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho
V05bhivin_u:44_2: dharmo ca deśyate aupasamiko pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya
V05bhivin_u:45: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upadampadāṃ bhikṣuṇibhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:46: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:47: mā te gautamīmātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:49: bhagavān nāvakaśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgata pravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasaṃpadāye bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:50: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena mahāprajāpati gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:51: na khalu gautamī bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāya /
V05bhivin_u:52: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:53: sādhu tāvāryānanda dvitīyaṃ pi bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:54: sādhu gautamīti āyuṣmān ānando dvitīyaṃ pi mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratiśrutvā yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:55: ekānte sthito āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:56: durlabho bhagavan buddhotpādo ti tad evaṃ sarvaṃ yāva bhikṣuṇībhāvo ti evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:57: māte gautamī mātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyā upasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:58_0: saṃyathāpi nāmānanda sampanne yavakaraṇe ca kāraṇḍavaṃ nāma rogarājā ti upanipateya
V05bhivin_u:58_1: evan taṃ sampannaṃ yavakaraṇaṃ mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ bhavati evam eva gautamī
V05bhivin_u:58_2: mātā yasmin prāvacane mātṛgrāmo pi labhati pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ
V05bhivin_u:58_3: evan taṃ prāvacanaṃ mahatāmupakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:59: sayyathāpi nāma gautamī mātā sampanne ikṣukaraṇe mañjiṣṭhā nāma rogarājā ti evan taṃ sampannaṃ ikṣukaraṇam mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:60: evam eva gautamī mātā yasmin prāvacane mātṛgrāmo pi labhati pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ evan taṃ prāvacanam mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:61: sayyathāpi nāma mā te gautamī mātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:63: bhagavān nā vakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:64: yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:65: na khalu gautamī bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:66: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:67: sādhu tāvāryānanda tṛtīyaṃ pi bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:68_0: sādhu gautamītī āyuṣmān ānando tṛtīyaṃ pi mahāprajāpatīya gautamīya pratiśrutvā yena
V05bhivin_u:68_1: bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣīdi ekāntaniṣaṇṇo
V05bhivin_u:69: purimakānāṃ bhagavan tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ kati parṣāyo abhuvan /
V05bhivin_u:70: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:71: purimakānām ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ catvāri pariṣāyo abhuvan sayyathīdaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:73: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:74: ye ime bhagavan catvāro śrāmaṇyaphalā sayyathīdaṃ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam agraphalam arhatvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:75: bhavyo eteṣāṃ mātṛgrāmo pi eko 'pramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:76: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:77: yānīmāni ānanda catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni sayyathīdaṃ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ yāvad agraphalam arhatvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:78: bhavyo eteṣāṃ matṛgrāmo pi eko 'pramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:79: 10. evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:80: yato khalu bhagavan purimakānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ catvāro parṣāyo abhūṃsuḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsikā /
V05bhivin_u:83: bhavyo eteṣāṃ mātṛgrāmo pi eko apramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:84: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:85: duṣkarakārikā ca bhagavato mahāprajāpatī gautamī āpāyikā poṣikā janetrīye kālagatāye stanyasya dāyikā bhagavāṃś ca kṛtajño kṛtavedī /
V05bhivin_u:86: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:87: evam etad ānanda duṣkarakārikā ānanda tathāgatasya mahāprajāpatī gautamī āpāyikā poṣikā janetriye kālagatāye stanyasya dāyikā tathāgato ca kṛtajño kṛtavedī ca /
V05bhivin_u:88: api cānanda tathāgato pi mahāprajāpatīya gautamīya duṣkarakārako /
V05bhivin_u:89: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:91: saṃghaśaraṇaṃ gatā tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī
V05bhivin_u:97: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī śraddhayā vardhati /
V05bhivin_u:98: śīlena vardhati śrutena vardhati tyāgena vardhati /
V05bhivin_u:100: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī duḥkhaṃ jānāti samudayaṃ jānāti /
V05bhivin_u:103: 11. yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:106: iminā ānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṇaṃ bhavati yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:108: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāto prativiramati /
V05bhivin_u:113: iminā pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:117: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya śraddhayā vardhati śīlena śrutena tyāgena prajñayā vardhati /
V05bhivin_u:118: iminānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:119: yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:120: evaṃ pi se na supratikāram bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:121: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya duḥkhaṃ jānāti samudayaṃ jānāti nirodhañ jānāti mārgañ ca jānāti /
V05bhivin_u:122: iminā ānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikāram bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:123: yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:124: evaṃ pi se na supratikaram bhavati //
V05bhivin_u:126: sace khalu aham ānandasya gautamasya putrasya yāvattṛtīyakaṃ api prativahiṣyāmi bhaviṣyati ca se cittasyānyathātvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:127: śrutā pi se dharmā sammohaṃ gamiṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:128: kāmaṃ varṣasahasraṃ pi me saddharmo sthāsyati /
V05bhivin_u:129: mā haivānandasya gautamīputrasya bhavatu cittasyānyathātvaṃ mā pi se śrutā dharmā sammoṣaṅ gacchantu /
V05bhivin_u:130: kāmaṃ pañcāpi me varṣaśatāni saddharmo sthāsyati /
V05bhivin_u:131: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayati sma /
V05bhivin_u:132_0: sayyathāpi nāmānanda iha puruṣo parvatasaṃkṣepe setuṃ bandheya yāvad eva vārisya
V05bhivin_u:132_1: anatikramaṇāya evam evānanda tathāgato bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭa gurudharmān prajñāpeti ye
V05bhivin_u:132_2: bhikṣunīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā
V05bhivin_u:136: 13. varṣaśato pasampannāye ānanda bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya śirasā pādā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:137: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prathamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣūṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāva anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa //
V05bhivin_u:139: aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇī deśitāśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye ubhayato saṃghe upasampadā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:140: ayam ānanda dvitīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo yāva velā iva samudreṇa //
V05bhivin_u:142: āvaḍḍo ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣuṣu vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena vā anāvaḍḍo bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīṣu vacanapatho bhūtena no abhūtena /
V05bhivin_u:143: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tṛtīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa //
V05bhivin_u:145: bhaktāgraṃ śayyāsanaṃ vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣuto sādayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:146: ayam ānanda caturtho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo vistareṇa //
V05bhivin_u:148: gurudharmāpannāye ānanda bhikṣuṇīye ardhamāsam bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ yācitavyaṃ ubhayato saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:149: ayam ānanda paṇcamo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa //
V05bhivin_u:152: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnām ṣaṣṭho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:154: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:155: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saptamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa //
V05bhivin_u:157: varṣoṣitāhi ānanda bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayatosaṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:158: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velā iva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:159: ime ānanda bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭau gurudharmā ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā velā iva samudreṇa //
V05bhivin_u:160: 14. sace nāmānanda mahāprajāpatī gautamī imān aṣṭa gurudharmān pratīcchati catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyācārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣati /
V05bhivin_u:163: sādhu bhagavann iti āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:165_0: sayyathāpi nāma gautamī iha puruṣa parvatasaṃkṣepe setuṃ bandheya yāvad eva vāriṣya
V05bhivin_u:165_1: anatikramaṇāya evam eva gautamī bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭagurudharmān prajñāpeti ye
V05bhivin_u:165_2: bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā
V05bhivin_u:166: 15. katame 'ṣṭa / varṣaśatopasampannāya gautamī bhikṣuṇīya tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:167: ayaṃ gautamī bhikṣuṇīnām prathamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:170: yāva sace khu tvaṃ gautamī imān aṣṭa gurudharmān pratīcchasi catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyācārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣasi /
V05bhivin_u:171: eṣā eva te adyadagreṇa pravrajyā eṣā upasampadā eṣa bhikṣuṇībhāvo //
V05bhivin_u:172: 16. evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:173_0: sayyathāpi nāmānanda iha syāt yuvā puruṣo maṇḍanajātīyo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro
V05bhivin_u:173_1: utpalamālām vā campakamālām vā kumudamālām vā tṛṇamolikamālām vā śirasā pratīccheya
V05bhivin_u:173_2: evam evāham āryānanda imān aṣṭagurudharmān śirasā pratīcchāmi catuhi ca patanīyehi
V05bhivin_u:174_0: 17. atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī sārdhaṃ cchandāyi cchandakapālāye dāsacchandāye
V05bhivin_u:174_1: cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyāniśatehi sārdhaṃ yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramitvā
V05bhivin_u:174_2: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:176: tasmād iha bhave bhikṣuṇīyo adydagreṇa mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ saṃghasthavirāṃ saṃghamahattarīṃ saṃghathaviriṇā vikandhāvetha /
V05bhivin_u:177: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇāmayitvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:178: ye ime bhagavan bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭagurudharmā bhagavatā saṃkṣiptena bhāṣitā vistareṇa vibhaktā labhyā te 'smābhir vistareṇa śrotuṃ //
V05bhivin_u:182: kinti dānī gautamī varṣaśatopasampannāye bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma samīcīkarma kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:184: yadāhaṃ varsaśatopasampannā bhaviṣyaṃ bhikṣu ca tad ahopasampanno bhaviṣyati tadāham abhivādanavandanapratyutthānamañjalīkarma sāmīcikarma kariṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:185_0: 20. atha khalu sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi sthavirīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ
V05bhivin_u:185_1: bhikṣūṇām stherāṇāṃ navānāṃ madhyamānāṃ abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma sāmīcikarma kartavyaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:186: ete dāni bhikṣū bhikṣūṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:187: sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi stherīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ stherāṇāṃ navānāñ ca madhyamānām abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma sāmīcīkarma kartavyaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:188: 21. atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā vā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā yattakānāṃ abhisaṃbhuṇoti tattakānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:191: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuvihāraṃ nirdhāvanti sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi stherīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ therāṇāṃ navānāṃ madhyamānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:192: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā yattakānām abhisaṃbhuṇoti tattakānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā śiṣṭakānāṃ mūrdhni añjalīṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:194_0: 22. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya paribhavanena koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā ḍhossabhikṣū ti
V05bhivin_u:194_1: vā kṛtvā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā akhallamahalle ti vā akuśalo ti vā apratikṛtijño
V05bhivin_u:194_2: ti vā kṛtvā na śirasā pādān vandati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
V05bhivin_u:195: evaṃ gautamī varṣaśatopasampannāye bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya śirasā vanditavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:196: ayaṃ gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prathamo gurudharmo yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva samudreṇa //
V05bhivin_u:198: 23. kinti dāni gautamī aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dvevarṣāṇi śikṣitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye ubhayatosaṃghe upasampadā pratyāsaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:199: yā dāni eṣā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā bhavati tāye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe dvevarṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsaṃmuti yācitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:202: iyam itthannāmā nāma aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:203: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyamnāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā saṃghaṃ dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yāceyā /
V05bhivin_u:204: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikāyo saṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:205: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:208: aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:209: sāhaṃ saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācāmi /
V05bhivin_u:210: sādhu vata me āryasaṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ detu /
V05bhivin_u:213: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:214: tasyā āryasaṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutin dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:217: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:218: seyaṃ saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:219: tasyā saṃgho itthan nāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutin deti /
V05bhivin_u:220: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya /
V05bhivin_u:222: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ pi tṛtīyaṃ pi dinnāmāryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:223: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:225: sarvabhikṣuṇīnān navikā sarvaśrāmaṇerīṇāṃ vṛddhā āsanaparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [1] /
V05bhivin_u:226_0: bhaktaparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [2] yvāguparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [3] yat tasyā
V05bhivin_u:226_1: 'miṣam akalpikam taṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āmiṣaṃ kalpikaṃ [4] yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āmiṣaṃ kalpikaṃ
V05bhivin_u:226_2: tasyā taṃ āmiṣaṃ akalpikaṃ [5] bhikṣuṇīyihi tasyāḥ tena parivartaśeyyā kartavyā [6]
V05bhivin_u:226_3: tāya pi śrāmaṇerīṇāṃ tena parivartakaśeyyā kartavyā [7] /
V05bhivin_u:227: bhikṣuṇīyihi sā pratigrāhaṇikā kārāpayitavyā sthāpayitvā agnikalpañ ca [8] /
V05bhivin_u:228: jātarūparajatañ ca [9] tāye pi śrāmaṇerīyo pratigrāhaṇikā kārāpayitavyāyo [10] /
V05bhivin_u:229: 27. na kṣamati tāye poṣadho vā pravāraṇā vā abhisaṃbhuṇituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:230: atha khalu yadā poṣadho vā pravāraṇā vā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:231: tadaho tāyi vṛddhāntam āruhya mūrdhni añjaliṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:234: vandāmi āryāyo viśuddhāṃ dhārayetha trīṇi vārāṃ jalpīya gantavyaṃ [11] na kṣamati sā prātimokṣasūtraṃ śrāvayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:235: atha khalu yattakaṃ pāriyati padaphalakāye grāhayituṃ tattakaṃ grāhayitavyā [12] / vaktavyam /
V05bhivin_u:236: na kṣamati abrahmacaryaṃ pratisevituṃ [13] na kṣamati adinnam ādayitum [14] /
V05bhivin_u:237: na kṣamati svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyoparāyituṃ [15] na kṣamati abhūvanam uttarimanuṣyadharmam prajānituṃ [16] /
V05bhivin_u:238: evaṃ yattakaṃ pārīyati padaphalake grāhayituṃ tattakaṃ grāhayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:245: yattakāni divasāni adhyācarati tattakāni divasāni uktāni śikṣā śikṣitavyā [18] //
V05bhivin_u:246: 28. yaṃ kālaṃ dve varṣāṇi bhavanti tato tāya saṃgho upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ yācitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:248_0: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā
V05bhivin_u:248_1: paripūraśikṣā ākāmkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadām bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:249: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve vaṣrāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:251: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmā aṣṭādaśāvarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā dve varsāṇi upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:252: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇim etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:254: vandāmi āryasaṃgham aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarśā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:256: sādhu me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsaṃmutin detu /
V05bhivin_u:258: vandāmi āryāyo aham itthan nāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:263: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā sā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:264: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthan nāmāye aṣṭādeśavarṣāye kumārī bhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthhāpanāsaṃmutin dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:266: 30. śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyaṃ itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārī bhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūrṇaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:268: tāya saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ deti /
V05bhivin_u:269: yāsāṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśa varṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:274: 31. dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśa varṣāye kumāribhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmuti saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:275: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:277: vandāmy ārye aham itthannāmā āryām upādhyāyinīṃ yācāmi /
V05bhivin_u:279: evaṃ dvitiyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:281: anuśrāvaṇācāryā paryeṣitavyā dve rahānuśāsanācāryā paryeṣitavyā yo gaṇo samudānayitavyo gaṇasya upanāmayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:282: 33. karma / śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā itthannāmāya upasampādyā /
V05bhivin_u:283: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthaṃnāmā ca itthannāmā ca itthannāmāṃ raho 'nuśāseyyā /
V05bhivin_u:284: anuśāsiṣyati āryasaṃgho itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca itthannāmāṃ raho /
V05bhivin_u:285: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:286: 34. tāhi dāni sā anuśāsitavyā gaṇasya nātidūre nātyāsanne saṃkṣiptena vā vistareṇa vā /
V05bhivin_u:289: śṛṇu kuladhite yaṃ yad evātra saṃghamadhye pṛcchiyasi tat tad eva yaṃ asti tam astīti vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:293_0: śṛṇu kuladhīte ayaṃ satyakālo ayaṃ bhūtakālo yāva sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ
V05bhivin_u:293_1: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāṃ visamvādeyyā yā ca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ
V05bhivin_u:293_2: samyaksambuddhasya śrāvikāsaṃghaṃ visamvādeyyā imaṃ tato mahāsāvadyataraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:294: yaṃ yad eva saṃghamadhye pṛcchiyasi taṃ tad eva yaṃ asti taṃ astīti vaktavyaṃ /

V05bhivin_u:818: yāciṣyati bhante saṃgho dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnām upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānāṃ ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān /
V05bhivin_u:819: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:822: tasyā me itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:824: sāhaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ upasaṃpādyānān tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpādāpratigrāhakān yācāmi /
V05bhivin_u:825: sādhu bhava me āryo saṃgho itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthito saṃgho dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān detu /
V05bhivin_u:826: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:829: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:831: seyan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakā yācayati /
V05bhivin_u:832: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ ca itthannāmaṃ ca dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān sammanyeyā /
V05bhivin_u:835: iyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinī upasaṃpādyā tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo /
V05bhivin_u:836: seyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānāṃ ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān yācate /
V05bhivin_u:837: tān saṃgho dharmadinnāye bhikṣuṇīye itthannāmaṃ ca itthannāmaṃ ca dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān sammanyati /
V05bhivin_u:838: yeṣām āyuṣmantānāṃ kṣamati dharmadinnāye bhikṣuṇīye itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakān sammanyiyamānān saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:842: evaṃ dvitīya tṛtīyā karmavācanā iti kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:844_0: dharmadinnāye bhikṣuniye itthannāmāye ca itthannāmāye ca antevāsinīnāṃ tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ
V05bhivin_u:844_1: syād brahmacaryāntarāya iti kṛtvā tatrasthitānām ihasthitena saṃghena itthannāmo
V05bhivin_u:844_2: ca itthannāmo ca bhikṣū dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakāḥ kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm
V05bhivin_u:845: 77. tehi dani sammatehi samānehi dharmadinnāye bhikṣuṇīye upāśrayaṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:846: tāhi dāni dharmadinnāya antevāsinīhi te yācitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:847: vandāmy āryaṃ ihasthitāyo itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca āryāye dharmadinnāye upādhyāyinīye upasaṃpādyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:849: itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca āryāya raho'nuśāstāyo tāsām asmākaṃ tatragacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo /
V05bhivin_u:850: tā vayaṃ itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca āryāya dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitaṃ saṃgham upasaṃpadaṃ yācāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:853: anukampatu me āryo saṃgho anukampako anukampām upādāya /
V05bhivin_u:856: yaṃ kālaṃ ubhayato saṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati tato dharmadinnāya yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:859: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:862: sāhan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca antevāsinīnām upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām ihasthitaṃ saṃghaṃ upasaṃpadaṃ yācāmi /
V05bhivin_u:863: upasaṃpādetu tāyo saṃgho mayā itthannāmāya upādhyāyinīya /
V05bhivin_u:864: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyaṃ pi yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:868: iyan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:870: tāhi itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāhi ihasthitaḥ saṃgha upasaṃpadaṃ yācitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:875: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:877: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho iyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:878: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca raho'nuśāstāyo /
V05bhivin_u:879: tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo tāhi itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatra sthitāhi ihasthitaḥ saṃgho upasaṃpadaṃ yācito /
V05bhivin_u:886: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāyo ihasthito saṃgho upāsaṃpādeyyā /
V05bhivin_u:890: tasyā itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:893: tāhi itthannāmāya ca itthannāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāhi ihasthito saṃgho upasaṃpadaṃ yācito /
V05bhivin_u:901: tāyo saṃgho itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya ihasthito saṃgho upasaṃpādeti /
V05bhivin_u:902: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamati itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāyo ihasthitena saṃghena upasaṃpādīyamānāyo /
V05bhivin_u:908: upasampannā bhante saṃgho itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāyo ihasthitena saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:909: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:910: evam upasaṃpadāya tehi dūtopasaṃpadāpratigrāhakehi bhikṣuṇyupāśrayaṅ gatvā tāyo upasaṃpannāyo vaktavyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:911: etā itthannāmāyopasaṃpannāyo sūpasaṃpannāyo traivācikena karmaṇā jñapticaturthena /
V05bhivin_u:919: dharma guru ca saṃgha guru ca /
V05bhivin_u:929: so vo 'rtho anuprāpto labdhā vo upasaṃpadā // [2]
V05bhivin_u:930: aśokaṃ virajaṃ kṣemaṃ dvīpaṃ lenaṃ parāyaṇaṃ
V05bhivin_u:931: taṃ prāpuṇatha nirvāṇaṃ eṣā vo sarvasaṃpadā // [3]
V05bhivin_u:933: evaṃ gautami aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārī bhūtāye ubhayataḥsaṃghe upasaṃpadā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:934: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ dvitīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:936: 83. kin ti dāni gautami āvaḍo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣūhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena vā anāvaḍo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena abhūtena /
V05bhivin_u:937: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣuṃ dharṣiya vaktuṃ koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā akhallā mahallaapratijñaakuśalo ti vā vaktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:939: 84. atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kaścit pravrajito bhavati jñātiko vā bhrātā vā /
V05bhivin_u:941: na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ nāmapi kṣamati dharṣiya vaktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:942: atha khalu prajñayā samjñāpayitavyo yadi tāvat taruṇako bhoti vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:943: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:944: kin dāni yadā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako adhvagatavayan anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:945: etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yac ca uddiśeśi svādhyāyesi bhadrako guṇavān śikṣākāmo bhavesi buddhānām śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:948: idanīṃ imīdṛśo punas tvaṃ taruaṇakāle idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:949_0: kin dāni yadā maṇḍaladvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi tadā śikṣiṣyasi yā py eṣā tava parṣā
V05bhivin_u:949_1: sāpi tava dṛṣṭā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayavyasanam āpadyiṣyatīti etat tava sādhu etat
V05bhivin_u:949_2: pratirūpaṃ yat tvam uddiśasi svādhyāyesi bhadrako guṇavān /
V05bhivin_u:950_0: śikṣākāmo bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena
V05bhivin_u:950_1: vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā akhallamahallaaprakṛtijñaakuśalo
V05bhivin_u:950_2: ti vā dharṣiya jalpati gurudharmam atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:951: 86. anāvaḍo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena iti na kṣamati bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīṃ dharṣiya vaktuṃ muṇḍastrī chinnakavaḍeti jalpati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:952: 87. atha dāni bhikṣor mātā vā bhaginī vā pravrajitikā bhavati sā ca uddhatā vā unnaḍā vā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:953: na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ yadi tāvat taruṇikā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:955: sālohite idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣiṣyasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:956_0: kiṃ dāni yaṃ kālaṃ jīrṇavṛddhā mahallikā bhaviṣyasi etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ
V05bhivin_u:956_1: yat tvaṃ uddiśesi svādhyāyesi bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhanāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:959_0: sālohite idānīṃ tvam īdṛśī kīdṛśī punas taruṇīkāle idānīṃ tvan na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi
V05bhivin_u:959_1: kin dāni yaṃ kālaṃ maṇḍaladvāram anuprāptā bhavisyasi tadā śikṣiṣyasi yā py eṣā tava
V05bhivin_u:959_2: parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayena vyasanam āpadyiṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:960: etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yat tvaṃ uddiśesi svādhyāyasi bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesīti /
V05bhivin_u:961: eṣa gautami āvaṭo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣūhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā /
V05bhivin_u:963: anāvaṭo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena no abhūtena /
V05bhivin_u:964: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnām tṛtiyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:966: 89. kin ti dāni gautami bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanāgraṃ vihārāgrañ ca bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto sā dayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:967: eṣo dāni koci bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya bhaktaṃ karoti vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:969: atha dāni so āha nāsti mama taṃhi śraddhā nāsti prasādo ti vaktavyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:972: dattapūrvaṃ teṣāṃ mama mātrā vā pitrā vā goṣṭhīsambandhena vā śreṇīsaṃbandhena vā samayasambhandhena vā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ na kadācin mayā bhaktaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:973: pratigṛhṇantu āryamiśrikā ti antamasato ekapiṇḍapātaṃ pi dāpayitvā bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho śatarasaṃ pi bhojanaṃ praticchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:975: eṣo dāni kocid bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya śayanāsanaṃ dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:977: atha dāni so āha nāsti mama tahiṃ śraddhā nāsti prasādo / vaktavyaṃ / vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:980: dattapūrvaṃ mama ārye bhikṣusaṃghasya śayanāsanaṃ mātrā vā yāvat samayasambandhena vā /
V05bhivin_u:982: ]kā mañcaṃ pi bhikṣusaṃghasya dāpayitvā mahārhaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaḥ pratīcchaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:984: eṣo dāni kocit bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:990: vaktavyaṃ vayaṃ pi na pratīcchāmo ti /
V05bhivin_u:992_0: ārye kārāpitan teṣāṃ vihārāḥ mātrā vā yāvat samayasambandhena vā pratīcchantv āryamiśrikā
V05bhivin_u:992_1: vihāran ti antamasato gomayagṛhaṃ pi piṣṭhagṛhaṃ pi bhikṣusaṃghasya dāpayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho
V05bhivin_u:993: 92. tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo avajñāya paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā /
V05bhivin_u:995: akhallamahallāprakṛtijño tī vā kṛtvā bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanāgraṃ vihārāgraṃ bhikṣusaṃghāto na śātiyati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
V05bhivin_u:996: evaṃ gautamī bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanagraṃ vihārāgraṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto sātayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:997: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ caturtho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:999: 93. kin ti dāni gurudharmāpannāya bhikṣuṇīya ardhamāsaṃ mānatvañ caritavyaṃ ubhayataḥ saṃghe āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1000: sā dāni eṣā bhikṣuṇī gurudharmān apannā bhavati tāya ardhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ ubhayataḥ saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1001: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā yāvad akuśalo ti vā kṛtvā gurudharmāpannā samānā nārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ carati ubhayataḥ saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1003: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pañcamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:1005: 94. kin ti dāni anvārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ yadaho dāni poṣadho bhavati tadaho bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena bhikṣuvihāraṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1006: atha dāni sarvasaṃgho na gacchati ardhasaṃghena gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1007: ardhasaṃgho na gacchati aṣṭāhi vṛddhatarikāhi gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1008: aṣṭa vṛddhatarikā na gacchanti antamasato māsacārikiṇīhi pakṣacārikiṇīhi vā cchandārhaṇāṃ chandaṃ gṛhṇīya gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1009: yadi tāvad anukālyaṃ bhavati stūpo tāvad vanditavyo /
V05bhivin_u:1010: stūpaṃ vanditvā yo tahiṃ bhikṣur abhilakṣito bhavati parijñāto vā tasya chando dātavyo /
V05bhivin_u:1012: āryasamagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādān śirasā vandati /
V05bhivin_u:1017: ahaṃ saṃghasthaviro ahaṃ tatradeśako ahaṃ bhikṣuṇīovādako ti tābhir api ete trayo varjaṃ kṛtvā śiṣṭakānāṃ chando dātavyo chandaṃ datvā bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1018: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati poṣasdhakarmāya sūtroddeśikāya sūtraṃ pragṛhītaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1019: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā pāñcadaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ ettakaṃ ṛtusya nirgataṃ ettakam avaśiṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1021: alpārtho 'lpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvikāsaṃgho śobhati anāgatānām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ chandapariśuddhiṃ ārocetha /
V05bhivin_u:1022: nīto chandahārikāhi chando ti tāhi vṛddhāntam āruhitvā sāmīciṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1023: nīto 'smābhiḥ chandahārikābhiś chando itthan nāmenāryeṇa pratīcchito /
V05bhivin_u:1024: 96. yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣusaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati sūtroddeśakena sūtraṃ pratigṛhītaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1025: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā pāñcadaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1027: kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtvā alpārtho alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho śobhati /
V05bhivin_u:1030: ko bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīnāṃ chandahārako tenotthāya vṛddhāntaṃ āruhya vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1031: vandāmy āryasaṃghaṃ samagro hi bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya pādāṃ śirasā vandati /
V05bhivin_u:1034: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1035: yadi tahiṃ bhikṣuṇītovādako sammatako bhavati vaktavyo / ovādāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:1036: 97. atha dāni na kocid bhikṣuṇīyovādako bhavati tatra yo dvādaśehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhavati so sammanyitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:1040: anumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣitaśikṣāpadeṣu kāyakarmavākkarmaṇā sammanvāgataḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1042: bahuśrutaś ca abhidharme bahusrutaś ca bhavaty abhivinaye partibalo ca bhavaty adhiśīlaśikṣāyām vinayituṃ / ṇka /
V05bhivin_u:1051: na ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ gurudharmaṃ āpadyitā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1052: to kalyāṇavacanaś ca bhavati kalyāṇavākkaraṇopetaś ca bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1053: pauryavācā samanvāgato vispaṣṭāya anelāya arthasya vijñāpanīya /
V05bhivin_u:1055: imehi dvādaśehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhikṣuṇīovādaka sammutīya saṃmanyitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:1057: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho ayam itthannāmo ti bhikṣur aṅgopeto /
V05bhivin_u:1058: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇītovādakaṃ saṃmutīya saṃmanyeya ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1059: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho ayam itthannāmo bhikṣur taṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇīovādakaṃ saṃmutīya sammanyati /
V05bhivin_u:1060: yeṣām āyuṣmantānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇīovādakaṃ saṃmutīya sammanyiyamānaṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:1063: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā evaṃ dvitīya tṛtīyā karmavācaneti /
V05bhivin_u:1064: sammato bhante saṃgho itthannāmo bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīovādaka saṃmutīya saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:1065: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1066: 99. tena dāni sammatena samānena tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo ovāditavyāyo nākāle [1] /
V05bhivin_u:1079: adeśo nāma veśikāsāmante vā dyūtakaraśālāsāmante vā /
V05bhivin_u:1081: vadhabandhanāgāraśālāsāmante vā atibhūṇḍe vā atiprākaṭe vā pradeśe [2] /
V05bhivin_u:1082: kin ti dāni nānāgate kāle anāgato nāma kālo pratipade dvitīyāyām vā [3] /
V05bhivin_u:1084: atikrānto nāma kālo caturdaśīyām vā pañcadaśīyām vā /
V05bhivin_u:1085: atha khu tṛtīyāprabhṛti tāvad ovaditavyā yāvat trayodaśīti [4] /
V05bhivin_u:1093: na tāvat tava parṣā ovaditavyā tavādya parṣāye ovādakavāro tavādya parṣāye ovādakavāro ti /
V05bhivin_u:1095: kin ti dāni na dīrghovādena ovaditāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1099: eṣa bhaginīyo ovādo śiṣṭakaṃ parikathā bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:1103: yadi so bhikṣuṇīovādako deśāntaraṅ gato bhavati tato ye tasya sārdhevihārikāvā antevāsikā bhavanti te bhikṣunīsaṃghena utsāhayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1105: teṣān dāni gacchantānām āgacchantānāñ ca pathy adanenāvaikalyaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1106: āgacchantasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena chatradhvajapatākehi yojanaṃ panthasya pratyudgantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1107: yaṃhi vihāre avatarāya taṃhi ubhayasaṃghasya saptāhaṃ bhaktaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1108: atha dāni daridro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati bhikṣusaṃghasyaiva saptāhaṃ bhaktaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1109: antamasato ekapiṇḍapātenāpi pratimānayitavyo tena dāni bhikṣuṇīovādakena bhikṣuṇīhi dhītāsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1110: tāhi bhikṣuṇīhi tasmin bhikṣuṇīovādakehi pitṛsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1111: 101. na kṣamati tena bhikṣuṇīovādakena ghoṭena yathā prasārya grīvāṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo ovādituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1112: atha khalu yugamātraṃ nirīkṣante na tāyo ovāditavyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:1113: yadi kadācit tahiṃ bhavet keśāvartena vā kṛtena /
V05bhivin_u:1114: akṣīhi vā añcitena ākoṭitamaṣṭehi vā cīvarehi /
V05bhivin_u:1119_0: he avyakte akuśale idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yaṃ kālaṃ jīrṇavṛddhā mahallikā
V05bhivin_u:1119_1: adhvagatavayam anuprāptā bhaviṣyasi yā pi tavaiṣā parṣā sā pi tava dṛṣṭvā anukṛtim
V05bhivin_u:1120: etaṃ tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:1121: atha dāni sā vṛddhā bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1122: sālohite idānīṃ īdṛśī kīdṛśī tvam āsi taruṇe kāle idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:1123_0: yaṃ kālaṃ maṇḍaladvāram anuprāptā bhaviṣyasi yāpi tava eṣa parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭvā
V05bhivin_u:1123_1: nukṛtim āpadyamānā anayā vyasanam āpatsyati etat tava sādhu etaṃ pratirūpaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ
V05bhivin_u:1123_2: bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:1124: 102. atha dāni so bhikṣuṇīyovādako gocaraprasṛto rathyāyaṃ bhikṣuṇīn paśyati keśāvartena vā kṛtena /
V05bhivin_u:1128: citrakūṭāhi vā upānahāhi na dāni kṣamati nahi kīñcij jalpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1129: mā jano ojjhāpeya paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇako bhāryām iva śravaṇikām ovadati /
V05bhivin_u:1133: kā se ācāryā paścād uktaṃ tahiṃ gatvā ovaditayvā /
V05bhivin_u:1134: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:1135: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:1136: akhallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā anvārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na pratyāśaṃsati gurudharmam atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:1137: evaṃ gautami anvardhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1139: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ṣaṣṭo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:1141: 103. kin ti dāni na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣuke avāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1142: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣukehi grāmanagarehi varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1143: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jñātikehi grāmavāsakehi nimantrīyati /
V05bhivin_u:1144: ihāryā varṣāvasāna ti na ca tahiṃ keci bhikṣū bhavanti bhikṣuṇī ca jñātikāmanukaṃpitukāmā bhavanti vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1154: teṣām āgatānāṃ samānānāṃ āhāreṇa avaikalyaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1156: tāya bhikṣuṇīya tahiṃ varṣām tāya bhikṣuṇīya teṣām bhikṣūṇāṃ mūle anvardhamāsaṃ ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1157: 104. atha teṣām bhikṣūṇāṃ varṣām upagatānāṃ antaravarṣā-r-astu /
V05bhivin_u:1159: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya kahiñci gantuṃ yāvat pravāraṇākālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1160: yadi tāvat kṣemam bhavati tato te śabdāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1163: āgatānāṃ samānānāṃ bhaktena pratimānīya ācchādīya yathā samvibhāgan dātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1164: pravārite kiñcāpi yaṃhi chando tahiṃ gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1165: 105. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭa bhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:1166: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā kṛtvā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā khallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagacchati gurudharmam atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:1167: evaṃ gautami na kṣamati bhikṣunīya abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1168: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saptamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvaj jīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:1170: 106. kin ti dāni varṣoṣitāhi bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayato saṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1171: yadaho dāni saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhavati tadaho bhikṣuṇīhi pravārayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1172: aparejjukāto pratipade kalyato ye ca nirdhāviya bhikṣuvihāraṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1173: yadi tāva samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhavati na kṣamati sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi apūrvācarimaṃ prāvarayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1179: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīm saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyeya /
V05bhivin_u:1183: tāṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyati /
V05bhivin_u:1184: yāsām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyiyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:1190: sammatā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmā saṃghasya pravārāyikā saṃghena kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1193: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravāreti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:1194: ovadantu mo āryo saṃgho arthakāmo hitaiṣī anukampako anukampām upādāya jānantyo paśyantyo smarantyo yathā dharmavinayaṃ pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1196: atha dāni samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati saṃbahulā bhikṣū bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:1198: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho saṃbahulān bhikṣūn pravāreti dṛṣṭena śrutena yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1200: 109. atha dāni samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati eka bhikṣu ca bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1202: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho āryaṃ pravāretīti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi /
V05bhivin_u:1205: vaktyavyaṃ saṃbahulāḥ āryamiśrikāḥ samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1207: atha dāni saṃbahulā ca bhikṣuṇīyo bhavanti saṃbahulā ca bhikṣu bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:1209: saṃbahulā āryamiśrikāḥ saṃbahulān āryamiśrān pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvad /
V05bhivin_u:1210: yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1215: saṃbahulā āryamiśrikāḥ āryaṃ pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvad yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1220: aham itthannāmā saṃghaṃ pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:1221: ovadatu mo āryo saṃgho yāvat pratikariṣyāmi evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi /
V05bhivin_u:1225: aham ithannāmā saṃbahulān āryamiśrān pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:1226: ovadantu me āryamiśrā yāvad yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1231: aham itthannāmā āryaṃ pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:1232: ovadatu me āryo artha kāmo hitaiṣī anukampako anukampām upādāya jānantī paśyanti smarantī yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1234: 110. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:1236: cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā akhallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:1237: varṣoṣitā ubhayato saṃghapravāraṇān na pratyāśaṃsayati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
V05bhivin_u:1238: evaṃ gautami varṣoṣitāhi bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayato saṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1239: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:1240: ime gautami bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭau gurudharmāḥ ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitvyā anatikramaṇīyā velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:1243: 111. atha khalu bhagavān bhikṣuṇīyo āmantrayate sma tasmāt tahiṃ bhikṣuṇīyo adyadagreṇa mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ saṃghasthavirīṃ saṃghamahattarīṃ saṃghapariṇāyikāṃ dhārayatha /
V05bhivin_u:1244: ya ime bhagavan bhagavatā catvāro patanīyo dharmo abhijñāya deśitāḥ labhyā te bhagavann asmābhi vistareṇa śrotuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1246: 112. pañcārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānāya śraddhāya kuladhītāya alam vinayam uddiśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1248: 113. ekam idaṃ gautami samayan tathāgato śrāvastīyam viharati /
V05bhivin_u:1249: atha khalu śāriputrasya sthavirasya yāvat ko nu khalu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena ihaikeṣān tathāgatānām,
V05bhivin_u:1250: arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānām atyayena cirasthitikaṃ prāvacanaṃ bhavati cirasthitikaḥ saddharma iti yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
V05bhivin_u:1251: ekam idaṃ gautami samayan tathāgato vaiśālīyam viharati /
V05bhivin_u:1253: tasmāt tarhi gautami bhikṣuṇyāpi atraiva śikṣitavyam /
V05bhivin_u:1259: vistareṇa tasmād iha gautami bhikṣuṇīhi atraiva śikṣitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1260: 114. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:1262: atha khalu bhagavān sannipatitaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ viditvā yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1263: yā puna bhikṣuṇī chandaso maithunaṃ grāmyaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣeviya antamasato tiryagyonigatena pi sārdhaṃ iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1264: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ti upasampannā sūpasampannā traivācikena karmaṇā jñapticaturthena anāghātapañcamena samagreṇa saṃghena ubhayataḥ saṃghena iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:1266: maithunan ti abrahmacaryaṃ grāmyadharman ti grāmasyāpy eṣo dharmo nagarasyāpy eṣo dharmo sarvāvantasyāpi lokasya eṣo dharmo /
V05bhivin_u:1268_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣevati mānuṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānuṣyakena
V05bhivin_u:1268_1: paṇḍakena trayāṇāṃ vraṇamukhānāṃ dhanyamārge varcamārge prasrāvamārge anyatarānyatarasmiṃ
V05bhivin_u:1268_2: vraṇamukhe aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ prakṣiptaṃ ārtīyati ārtayitvā svādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1280: paryavasāne svādayati yā āsvādan nigamayati sā pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1284: evaṃ suptasya mṛtasya aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ prakṣipitvā artīyati /
V05bhivin_u:1285: peyālaṃ evaṃ amānuṣasya paṇḍakasya tiryagyonigatasya puruṣasya paṇḍakasya trayāṇāṃ vraṇamukhānāṃ / peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1286: 115. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī raktacittā puruṣaṃ darśanāya uṭṭhāpeti samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati darśanaśravaṇe deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1295: 117. pañca bhikṣuṇīyo pañca bhikṣūn balāt prasahyamadhyomardanti pañca bhikṣuṇīyo pārājikāyo bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:1297: pañca bhikṣū pañca bhikṣuṇīyo balāt pragṛhyamadhyomardanti pañca bhikṣū pārājikā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:1299: bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ anyonyaṃ vipratipadyati ubhaye pārājikā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:1300: bhikṣuṇī śrāmaṇereṇa saha vipratipadyati bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati śrāmaṇero nāśayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:1301: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī ārāmikena saha vipratipadyate bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1305: mānuṣeṇa amānuṣeṇa tiryagyonigatena aparehi trihi dhanyamārge varcamārge prasrāvamārge /
V05bhivin_u:1307: dvihi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati puruṣeṇa paṇḍakena ca /
V05bhivin_u:1308: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī suptā vā bhavati mattā vā unmattā vā vistareṇa puruṣo upasaṃkramya abhiniṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā /
V05bhivin_u:1316: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī chandaso maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣevatīti /
V05bhivin_u:1323: apy ekatyā rāgābhibhūtā doṣābhibhūtā mohābhibhūtā anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1326: yā punar bhikṣuṇī chandaśo maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamasato tiryagyonigatenāpi sārdhaṃ iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asaṃvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1333: 118. bhagavān chākyeṣu viharati śākyānāṃ kapilavastusmiṃ nyagrodhārāme /
V05bhivin_u:1334: tena dāni kālena tena samayena bhagavatā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ araṇyakāni śayanāsanāni pratikṣiptāni /
V05bhivin_u:1338: sā dāni aparasya sākyasya uduvasite vasati /
V05bhivin_u:1339: sā dāni rāṣṭrā tasya śākiyakumārasya uddiśati /
V05bhivin_u:1340: sā dāni rāṣṭrā prāsādikā darśaniyā avigatarāga /
V05bhivin_u:1342: so dāni tāye trikkhatto devaśikaṃ upalaṅkṛtaṃ kālyaṃ madhyāhne sāyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1343: tāye dāni taṃ śākiya kumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsevāya ca rāgacittam anudhvaṃsayati /
V05bhivin_u:1344: sā dāni mlāyati pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā bhontīmapi bhojanaṃ na chando bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1346: kena tvaṃ bhaginī rāṣṭrā pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā /
V05bhivin_u:1350: sā dān āha bhotu bhotu ārya evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1352: ārye rāṣṭre kena tvam evaṃ pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā /
V05bhivin_u:1357: bhotu bhotu āryamiśrikāyo evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:1362: ācikṣāhi kīdṛśehi atra bhaiṣajyehi vā upakaraṇehi vā artho bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:1363: saced asmākaṃ na bhaviṣyati prātiveśya kulāto uddhāradharmaṇā ānāpayiṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1365: sā dān āha bhotu dīrghāyuḥ evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1368: kenāsi pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā yāvad grāmāntarāto ānāpayiṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1369: sā dān āha bhotu dīrghāyu evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1371: na idaṃ āryāye kiñcit kāyikaṃ gailāyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1375: so dān āha kathaṃ sahyaṃ bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:1377: yadi evam icchasi evaṃ sahyaṃ bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:1378: 120. so dān āha / ārye kim artham ahaṃ necchāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1382: kīdṛśehi atra bhaiṣajyehi vā upakaraṇehi vā artho bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:1383: saced asmākaṃ na bhaviṣyati prātiveśyakulāto uddhāradharmaṇā ānayiṣyāmi antarāpaṇāto vā grāmāntarāto vā ānāpayiṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:1389: anyāhi ahaṃ kāṣāyavasanāhi notsahāmy etaṃ arthaṃ kartuṃ prāg eva āryāya /
V05bhivin_u:1390: āryā mama guru ca bhāvanīyā ca /
V05bhivin_u:1392: nahy aham utsahāmy etaṃ kāryaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1394: sādhu tāva me āliṅgasva cumbasva stanodarañ ca me parimardasveti /
V05bhivin_u:1396: sa mātrāliṅgati cumbati stanodarañ ca se parimṛśati /
V05bhivin_u:1398: so pi dāni śākiyakumāro abhīkṣṇasaṃsargeṇa apamlāyati /
V05bhivin_u:1401_0: evaṃ rañjanīyam evaṃ kamanīyam evaṃ vañcanīyam evaṃ mūrcchanīyam evam adhyohāri evam
V05bhivin_u:1401_1: antarāyakaram anuttarasya yogakṣemasyādhigamāya yathā puruṣasya strī spraṣṭavyaṃ
V05bhivin_u:1401_2: strīyā puruṣa iti dāni tena abhikṣṇasaṃsevāya apamlāyati /
V05bhivin_u:1404: mā ārye evaṃ karohi naivaṃ labhyā kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1407: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsu /
V05bhivin_u:1412: satyaṃ rāṣṭre evaṃ nāma tvaṃ avaśrutā avaśrutasya /
V05bhivin_u:1413: puruṣasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyasi /
V05bhivin_u:1418: nanv ahaṃ rāṣṭre anekaparyāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ kāmānāṃ kāmanandīnāṃ kāmanimnānāṃ kāmamūrcchānāṃ kāmapipāsānāṃ kāmaparidāhyānāṃ kāmādhyavasānānāṃ antam vadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1421: tatra nāma tvaṃ imaṃ evaṃ rūpatvaṃ pāpam akuśalaṃ dharmaṃ adhyācarasi /
V05bhivin_u:1426: naivaṃ karato vṛddhir bhavati kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:1427: 123. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:1429: yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo kapilavastun nagaram upaniśritya viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:1430: atha khalu bhagavān sannipatitaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ viditvā etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vistareṇārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:1433: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣābhyām upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1436: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā ti raktacittā /

V05bhivin_u:1471: 125 / atha dāni bhikṣuṇī lalāṭasirāṃ vedhāpayati dvitīyāya bhikṣuṇīya mūrdhni ākramitavyā yathā strī spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti na puruṣa spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti /
V05bhivin_u:1472: atha dāni bāhuśirāṃ vindhāpayati aparāya bhikṣuṇīya bāhā grahetavyā yathā strī spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti na puruṣa spraṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1475: atha dāni gaṇḍaṃ vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ālambayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1476: na kṣamati sambādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā puruṣeṇa vedhāpayitum vā pāṭāpayitum vā upanāhāpayitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:1477: sambādho nāma pradeśo upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adhaḥ kakṣābhyām /
V05bhivin_u:1479: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣā bhyām upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /

V05bhivin_u:1484: tena dāni kālena tena samayena bhagavatā bhikṣuṇīnām āraṇyakāni śayanāsanāni pratikṣiptāni /
V05bhivin_u:1488: sā dāni aparasya licchavikumārasya uduvasite vasati /
V05bhivin_u:1489: sā dāni tasya licchavikumārasya uddeśan dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:1490: sā dāni rāṣṭrapālā tasya devasikam upasaṃkramati kālyaṃ madhyāhne sāyam /
V05bhivin_u:1493: tāye dāni rāṣṭrapālāya abhīkṣṇadarśanena abhikṣṇaṃ saṃsevāya ca rāgacittam anudhvaṃsayati /
V05bhivin_u:1496: yāvad guru ca bhāvanīyā ca yāvan notsahāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1497: 127. sā dān āha / sādhu khalu tāvan me anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhāhi saṃlapāhi /
V05bhivin_u:1506: pīṭhikām vā āpaṇam vā karmāntam vā gamiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:1509: so dāni tāye anto hastapāsasya tiṣṭhati /
V05bhivin_u:1519: so pi dāni licchavikumāro abhīkṣṇadarśanena abhīkṣṇasaṃsevāya apamlāyati /
V05bhivin_u:1521: nāham bhikṣavo 'nyad ekarūpam api samanupaśyāmīti vistareṇa sūtraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1530: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:1536: satyaṃ rāṣṭrapāle evan nāma tvaṃ avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭhasi saṃlapasi /
V05bhivin_u:1545: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭheta vā saṃlapeta vā /
V05bhivin_u:1552: iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asaṃvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1554: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā ti raktacittā /
V05bhivin_u:1558: hastagrahaṇan ti haste gṛhṇiya yāvad aṅguṣṭake vā /
V05bhivin_u:1559: cīvaragrahaṇan ti saṃghāṭīyaṃ vā uttarāsaṅge vā aṅtarevāse vā saṃkakṣikāyāṃ vā dakaśāṭikāyām vā /
V05bhivin_u:1561: āgataṃ vā abhinandeyā ti vā svāgatan te anurāgatan te punaḥ puna āgacchesi /
V05bhivin_u:1565: kāyaṃ se anuprayaccheyā ti yenāsau tena kāyaṃ praṇāmeta /
V05bhivin_u:1566_0: saṃketakṛtaṃ gacched iti yas tasya abhīkṣṇaṃ upacāro bhaved āpaṇo vā pīṭhikā vā kṣetravastraṃ
V05bhivin_u:1566_1: vā udakasamīpaṃ vā karmāntaṃ vā udyāyaṃ vā mārge vā tahiṃ tiṣṭhed iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī
V05bhivin_u:1567: 130. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśaṃ saṃtiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketaṃ kṛtaṃ gacchati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1569: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketakṛtam vā gacchati thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1571: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketakṛtam vā gacchati sthūlātyayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1573: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa santiṣṭhati thūl'-accayam /
V05bhivin_u:1584: atha dāni anukhajjakam āpajjati yadāṣṭau thūl'-accayā bhavanti tadā pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1585: atha dāni eka samāpadyitvā pratikaritvā yāvat saptamam āpadyitvā pratikaritvā aṣṭamam āpadyati na sā pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1586: atha dāni saptamam āpadyitvā apratikaritvā aṣṭamam āpadyati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1588: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya santiṣṭhed vā /
V05bhivin_u:1596: iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsya /
V05bhivin_u:1601: vaiśālīyaṃ dāni nagare aparasya licchavisya triyantarā dārikā jātā /
V05bhivin_u:1605: gṛhe pi dhāryamāṇā amaṅgalyā kasyeyan dātavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1614: ārye 'smākaṃ triyantarā dārikā jātā adhanyā vāmaṅgalyā vāpraśastā vā /
V05bhivin_u:1624: sā yadā mahantībhūtā tadā tāya pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:1632: ārye na dāni pravrajyāyāṃ gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1638: sā paśyati yadi tāvad iyaṃ pratyodhāvati tato me lābhasatkāro 'ntarahāyiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:1640: sā dāni kleśān asahantī ārāmikaparivrājakehi sārdhaṃ miśribhūtā /
V05bhivin_u:1644: ārye kāli jānāsi tvam etāṃ āgārakehi parivrājakehi saha miśrībhūtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1653: 132. etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1658: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:1663: asti nāma tvaṃ kāli jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ duṣṭhullāpattim āpanāṃ praticchādesi /
V05bhivin_u:1664: yāvan naiṣa kāli dharmo naiṣa vinayo /
V05bhivin_u:1666: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo vaiśālīn nagarīm upaniśritya viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:1668: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ chādeya /
V05bhivin_u:1669: sā na pareṣām ārocayati kuvege mahājane saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:1670: yadā sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi cyutā bhavati mṛtā niṣaṇṇā avasaṇṇā avakrāntā imasmād dharmavinayād /
V05bhivin_u:1672: ājñāsi vatāham ārye itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullāmāpatti kṛtāmadhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:1674: kin ti imāye māpare jānantū ti /
V05bhivin_u:1678: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena śravaṇena /
V05bhivin_u:1679: duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ ti duṣṭhullānāma aṣṭānām anyatarānyatarā kṛtā adhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:1680: sā na pareṣām āroceya iti na kathayet /
V05bhivin_u:1687: avakrāntā imasmād dharmavinayād iti anyatīrthikāyatanaṃ saṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:1688: atha sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ evaṃ vadeyā /
V05bhivin_u:1689: ājñāsi vatāhaṃ ārye itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullā-m-āpattiḥ kṛtāmadhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:1692: kin ti imāye māpare jānantū ti /
V05bhivin_u:1697: 133. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī paśyati bhikṣuṇīṃ aruṇodgate duṣṭhullām āpattim āpadyantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1699: sūryasyodgamanakālasamaye chādanācittaṃ pratilabhitvā aruṇamudghāte ti iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1700: evaṃ do kālikā aṣṭa parivartā kartavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1702: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ paśyati duṣṭhullām āpattim adhyācarantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1704: atha sā bhoti antevāsiṇī vā sārdhavihāriṇī vā paśyati /
V05bhivin_u:1705: yadi ārocayiṣyāmi idānīṃ bhikṣuṇīhi niskāsiṣyatīti anunayasambandhena chādeti pārājikā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:1706: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī paśyati aparāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ āpattim āpadyantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1707: sā dāni aparāya āroceti dṛṣṭā mayā itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī duṣṭhullām āpattim adhyācarantī /
V05bhivin_u:1708: ahaṃ paśyāmi yadi ārocayiṣyatīti dānī bhikṣuṇīhi nirdhāvayiṣyatīti mayā pi cchāditaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1709: sā pi paśyati yadi aham ārocayiṣyaṃ ubhaye nirdhāvayiṣyantīti cchādeti /
V05bhivin_u:1711: evaṃ yattikāyo cchādenti sarvāyo pārājikā bhonti /
V05bhivin_u:1712: eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ paśyati duṣṭhullām āpattim āpadyantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1717: mā aparāye pi ārocayiṣyasīti thūl'-accyam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1718: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī paśyati bhikṣuṇīṃ duṣthullām āpattim adhyācarantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1720: atha dāni sā bhoti raudrā vā sāhasakārā paśyati /
V05bhivin_u:1721: mā se jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā brahmacaryāntarāyam vā kariṣyatīti upekṣā partilabhati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1723: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ chādeya /
V05bhivin_u:1724: sā na pareṣām ārocayet kuvege mahājane saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:1725: yadā sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi cyutā bhavati mṛtā niṣaṇṇā avasaṇṇā avakrāntā imasmād dharmavinayād /
V05bhivin_u:1726: atha bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnām evam vadeya ājñāsi vatāhaṃ ārye itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullā-m-āpatti kṛtāmadhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:1728: kin ti imāye māpare jānantū ti /
V05bhivin_u:1729: iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1732: 134. bhagavān samyaksaṃbuddho yad arthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:1734: yāvat tehi tehi vihārehi viharan kauśāmbyām viharati ghoṣitārāme /
V05bhivin_u:1735: āyuṣmān dāni chandako pañcānām āpattikāyānām anyatarānyatarām āpattim adhyomardati /
V05bhivin_u:1736: so bhikṣūhi vuccati āyuṣman chandaka paśyasi etām āpattiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1738: nāhaṃ paśyāmi yūyam api naṃ paśyatha /
V05bhivin_u:1743: yady eṣo bhikṣavaś chandako pañcānām āpattikāyānām anyatarānyatarām āpattim adhyomardati /
V05bhivin_u:1745: tena saṃgho āpattīya adarśanena utkṣepanīyaṃ karma karotu /
V05bhivin_u:1748: tasya dāni mātā aparaṃhi bhikṣuṇīvihāre āvāsinī /
V05bhivin_u:1757: ārye eṣo hi ārya chandako samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinyato utkṣipto apratikṛto /
V05bhivin_u:1760: apāpāya āryamiśrikā ahaṃ ca tāvan netaṃ bhikṣuṃ anuvartiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1763: kim artham aham etaṃ kim artham aham etam nānuvartiṣye /
V05bhivin_u:1764: etat prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1767: yady eṣā bhikṣuṇī chandakamātā chandakaṃ bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartati /
V05bhivin_u:1768: tena hi taṃ gacchatha triḥkkhatto kuvege triḥkkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:1769: sā dāni kuvege vuccati satyaṃ tvam ārye chandakamāte āryechandakaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartasi /
V05bhivin_u:1772: mā ārye chandakamāto āryachandakaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtaṃ anuvartāhi /
V05bhivin_u:1773: yaṃ khalu te ārye chandakamāte mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti te taṃ mitrā ekā vācā gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:1774: dve vāce avaśiṣṭe pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmītya āha /
V05bhivin_u:1776: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā yāvan na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:1777: 135. etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhagavataḥ ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1778: anuprāptā bhagavan āryā chandakamātā trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya na ca pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:1784: evan nāma tvaṃ chandakaṃ bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtaṃ saṃbhuñjasi /
V05bhivin_u:1785: sā tvaṃ trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahājane trikkhutto saṃghamadhye anuprāptā etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya na ca pratiniḥsarasi /
V05bhivin_u:1789: nanv ahaṃ chandakamāte anekaparyāyeṇa daurvacanasyaṃ garhāmi daurvacanasya avarṇavādi tatra nāma tvaṃ kharākhakkhaṭaṃ vāmā apradakṣinagrāhiṇī /
V05bhivin_u:1793: naivaṃ karontīye vṛddhir bhavati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
V05bhivin_u:1794: evaṃ ca dāni tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam anuvartasi /
V05bhivin_u:1795: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1796: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:1797: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo kauśāmbinagarīm upaniśrāya viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:1800: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śravaṇena /
V05bhivin_u:1802: dharmavinayato āpattīya adarśanena āpattīya apratikarmeṇa trayāṇāṃ dṛṣṭigatānām apratiniḥsargeṇa /
V05bhivin_u:1805: anuvarteyā ti āmiṣasaṃbhogena vā dharmasaṃbhogena vā saṃbhuñjeya /
V05bhivin_u:1806: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:1807: eṣo hi ārye bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:1809: yāvat tad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhṇeya na pratiniḥsareya yaṃ taṃ utkṣiptakaṃ bhikṣum anuvartati /
V05bhivin_u:1811: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā iti trikkhatto kuvege mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:1813: satyaṃ tvaṃ itthaṃnāme itthaṃnāme bhikṣusamagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartasi /
V05bhivin_u:1816: mā ārye itthaṃnāma bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam anuvartāhi /
V05bhivin_u:1817: yaṃ khalu te itthannāme mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣinīya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:1818: te taṃ mitrā ekā vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam api /
V05bhivin_u:1820: saṃghamadhye pi traivācikaṃ yāvat taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1821: no ca pratiniḥsareya iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1822: pārājiketi pārājikāye āpattīye saṃkāśanā prakāśanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkarmatā prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1823: 137. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1824: trikkhatto mahājane samanugrāhiyaṃāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratinissarati vācāyām vācāyām vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1833: ye ca kuvege mahājane ye ca saṃghamadhye vinayātikramāś ca thūl'-atyayāś ca sarve te pratipraśraṃbhyante ekā āpattir gurukā santhihati /
V05bhivin_u:1837: kim apratiniḥsargārham abhūṣisi itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ utkṣiptakam anuvartiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:1838: nānuvārtitaṃ anuvartāmi anuvartiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1841: anuvartitaṃ dāni nānuvartāmi anuvartiṣyāmi ceti evam apratiniḥsargārhaṃ ceti evam apratiniḥsārgarhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1843: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvarteya sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīya /
V05bhivin_u:1844: eṣo hi ārye bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣipto apratikṛto /
V05bhivin_u:1846: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratigṛhṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:1847: na pratiniḥsareya sā bhikṣunī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakam samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:1848: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1849: no ca pratiniḥsareya iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:1858: 138. saṃcaritrakarma yathā bhikṣūṇāṃ sarvam anvarthaṃ yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:1859_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya strīmatam vā puruṣasyopasaṃhareya puruṣasya
V05bhivin_u:1859_1: vā mataṃ striyāyopasaṃhareya jāyattatena vā jārattatena vā antamasato tatkṣaṇīkāni
V05bhivin_u:1860: ] upādiśeṣo saṃgho saṃgham evādhipati kṛtya niḥsaraṇīyo /
V05bhivin_u:1863: dve abhūte tathaiva kartavyā yathā bhikṣūṇāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1865_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī duṣṭād doṣāt kupitā anāttamanā śuddhāṃ bhikṣuṇīm anāpattikāṃ amūlakena
V05bhivin_u:1865_1: pārājikena dharmeṇānudhvaṃsaye apy eva nām' enāṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyan ti sā tad
V05bhivin_u:1865_2: apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā asamanubhāṣiyamānā vā amūlakam etam adhikaraṇam
V05bhivin_u:1865_3: bhavati bhikṣuṇī ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣā avacāmīti ayam pi varge prathamāpattiko
V05bhivin_u:1868_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī duṣṭā doṣāt kupitā anāttamanā anyabhāgiyasya cādhikaraṇasya kiñci
V05bhivin_u:1868_1: deśaṃ leśamātrakaṃ dharmaṃ upādāya aparājikāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pārājikena dharmeṇānudhvaṃsaye
V05bhivin_u:1868_2: apy eva nāmaināṃ brahmacaryā cyāveyan ti sā tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇā
V05bhivin_u:1868_3: vāsamanubhāṣiyamānā vā anyabhāgīyam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya
V05bhivin_u:1868_4: kiñci deśa leśamātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati bhikṣuṇī ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣā
V05bhivin_u:1872: taṃhi dāni bhikṣuṇīvihāro ca tīrthikaśayyā ca /
V05bhivin_u:1880: āryamiśrikāḥ hrīrapatrāpya sampannāḥ kāle ca vikāle ca marmāṃ praviśantāṃ niṣkrāmantāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaviṣyati cittasyopakleśo /
V05bhivin_u:1882: ayaṃ varṣārātro yadā varṣā nirgatā bhaviṣyanti tadā kariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1886: sā dāni ākrośati bhraṣṭāyūḥ naṣṭāyūḥ bhagnāśā surābhraṣṭā yānagardabhā na kariṣyatha /
V05bhivin_u:1890: te dān āhaṃsuḥ itikitikāya dhīte vaḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭe śramaṇike yadi marasi na karoma etāṃ kanthāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1892: etad eva sarvam ārocayitvāha dīrghāyu yathā sā kanthā kriyate tathā karotha /
V05bhivin_u:1897: he itikitikāya putrāḥ tīrthinagnāḥ surābhraṣṭā yānagardabhāḥ mithyādṛṣṭīka vinipātitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1899: yūyam ahrīkā anotrāpiṇo āryamiśrikā hrīrapatrāpya sampannāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1900: teṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ kāle ca vikāle ca niṣkrāmantāṃ praviśantāṃ dṛṣṭvā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ brahmacāriṇīnāṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ tehi dāni āsanikehi niyuktāḥ akāmakā kāryante /
V05bhivin_u:1903: teṣāṃ dāni tremāsaṃ karma kurvantānāṃ gataṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1905: imāya itikitikāya dhītare vaḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭāya śramaṇikāya mṛttikākarma kariyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1906: upāsakakulehi avadhyāyanti paśyatha gṛhapatayo yuṣmākaṃ dakṣiṇīya śramaṇikāya asti me calan ti kṛtvā tremāsaṃ akāmakā karma kārāpitā /
V05bhivin_u:1907: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ upāsakā kulopikānāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:1916: yā puna bhikṣuṇī utsayavādā vihareyā āgārikaparivrājakehi divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇ'uddeśehi sārdham ayam pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:1927: saṃgho tā nāma vuccanti aṣṭa pārājikā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1929: saṃghātiśeṣan ti saṃghātiśeṣāye āpattīye saṃkāṣanā prakāśanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkarmatā prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1930: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rājākule vā āsane vā nivedayati thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1932: upāsakakule vā śrāddhakule vā nivedayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1934: bhikṣur api rājakule nivedayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1937: yā puna bhikṣuṇī utsayavādā vihareya āgārikaparivrājakehi divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇ'uddeśehi sārdham āpattiḥ dharmo prathamāpattiko //

V05bhivin_u:2383: tato yeva pratinivartayitvā śrāvastīn nagaram anupraviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2384: bhagavān dāni śrāvastīyaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ prakrāmi /
V05bhivin_u:2390: rājā dāni virūḍhako śākīyān vadhitvā śākiyakanyāyo ādāya śrāvastīṃ pratigataḥ tadyathā /
V05bhivin_u:2397: so dāni sārdhaṃ krīḍanto ramanto paricārayantaḥ abhikṣṇaṃ vadati /
V05bhivin_u:2402: atha khalv abhayā rājadhītā rājānaṃ virūḍhakam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:2403: mā deva evaṃ vada nihatā me grāmakaṇṭakāḥ śākiyā iti /
V05bhivin_u:2413: santi deva śākiyāḥ śrotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino nāgāminas te devena adūṣakā anaparādhino jīvitād vyavaropitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2417: 154. atha rājā virūḍhakaḥ kupitaḥ yāvat kāraṇāntikaṃ mahāmātram āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2418: tvaṃ hi bhaṇe puruṣa mama bhogehi jāyayasi /
V05bhivin_u:2425: tena hi bhaṇe mahāmātra imāyo śākiyāyinīyo daṇḍahatāyo kṛtvā karṇanāsāhastapādacchinnāyo kṛtvā taptena telena kāyaṃ pariṣiñcitvā jīvantikāyo evaṃ parikhāyāṃ cchorayā /
V05bhivin_u:2427: yan dāni ahaṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ āsi darśanaṃ pi na labhamāno tāyo etāyo mama hastagatāyo yan nūnam aham etāhi saha krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ paricārayeyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2428: so dāni tāhi sārdhaṃ svake gṛhe pravicārayati /
V05bhivin_u:2429: aśrauṣīd rājā virūḍhako kāraṇāntikas tāhi sārdhaṃ krīḍati yāvan na ca pi yathoktaṃ karotīti /
V05bhivin_u:2435: tāyo tatra duḥkhaṃ tīvrāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2442: atha khalu bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīn nagarīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2445: mahato janakāyasya nirghoṣo yāvad rājñā virūḍhakena ṣaṇṇāṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ yāvat tasya kṛpaṇena yāvan sūktavādī bhagavān iti krandanti /
V05bhivin_u:2446: sādhu bhagavān arthakāmo jñātīnām anukampyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāmatu /
V05bhivin_u:2447: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ sammukhād dharmaṃ śruṇitvā api svargopigā bhaveṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2448: 155. atha khalu bhagavāṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ samanvāharati sma /
V05bhivin_u:2449: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ śacim āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2450: eṣa śaci bhagavān jñātīnām upasaṃkramati anukampārthaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2451: gaccha śaci tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānaṃ niṣīdāpehi vastreṇācchādehi bhagavān upasaṃkramiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:2452: atha khalu śacī tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānan niṣīdāpayitvā vastreṇācchāditā /
V05bhivin_u:2453: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat tāyomaindryā spharitvā yat kiñcit kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca duḥkhavedanāgataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ pratiprasraṃbheti /
V05bhivin_u:2455: tṛpyatāṃ bhikṣavo bhagavatīṣu ko bhikṣavo bhavam abhinandeya ko upādiyeya anyatra bālapṛthagjanānāṃ andhānāṃ acakṣukānāṃ paśyatha /
V05bhivin_u:2456_0: bhikṣavaḥ etāyo śākiyāyinīyo manuṣyakehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi krīḍitvā ramitvā pravicārayitvā
V05bhivin_u:2456_1: etarhi jñātikṣaye ca bhogakṣaye ca karmasya ca sammukhībhāvād duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2458: sacen manyatha bhaginīyo yad idaṃ yuṣmākaṃ hasto ca pādo ca chinno api tu te vedayanti vā na vā /
V05bhivin_u:2461: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan sacen manyatha bhaginīyo cakṣuḥ svabhāvaṃ vedayati /
V05bhivin_u:2462: yāvad asti ca tatpratyayā duḥkhā vedanā /
V05bhivin_u:2468: evaṃ ca punar duḥkhā vedanā parādhīnā parapratibaddhā pratyayādhīnā pratyayapratibaddhā iti viditvā dvā triṃśatīhi ākārehi prakṛti bhinnaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2470: ataś ca bhaginīyo ārya śrāvaka imesāṃ pañcopādānaskandhānāṃ nātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
V05bhivin_u:2473: yāvat tāyo paṭa śākiyāyinīyo dhītāṃ anāgāmitāṃ sākṣāt kuryuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2474: pañcānāñ ca bhikṣuśatānam anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2475: anekeṣāñ ca devatāśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣu viśuddhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2476: 156. athāyuṣmān vāgīśas tasyām eva parṣadi yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:2482: śūnyam asāram kañ ca kāyaṃ viditvā
V05bhivin_u:2491: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:2492: kiṃ bhagavann imāhi śākiyāyinīhi purā pāpaṃ karma kṛtam yena etāyo evaṃ duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2494: bhūtapūrvam ānanda etāyo śākiyāyinīyo ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇikāyo abhūvan /
V05bhivin_u:2495: ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ kālo nāma pratyekabhuddho abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2496: so dāni piṇḍāya caranto tāhi gaṇikāhi ukto /
V05bhivin_u:2497: ayaṃ dāni śramaṇo svayaṃ kāmān paribhuñjati /
V05bhivin_u:2499: tāhi hāsyābhiprāyāhi viheṭhanābhiprāyāhi anyehi duruktehi vacanapathehi obhartsito aṅgāramallakehi cāvakīrṇaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2500: so dāni ānanda pratyekabuddho duḥkhāya vedanāya spṛṣṭaḥ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanto kāyena ca jīvitena ca ardiyanto tatraiva vihāya samabhyudgamya anupādāya parinivṛtaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2501: pūrvādhiṣṭhitena ca svakena tejodhātunā tasya śarīraṃ vyāpinaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2502: tāyo dāni gaṇikāyo bhītayo pāpakam asmābhiḥ karmopacitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2511: anāgatam adhvānam vayam etādṛśaṃ śāstāram ārāgayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2514: tāyo etāyo tena pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena yāvan narakeṣūpapannāyo etāyo tahiṃ bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaveṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2515: etāhi ānanda bālapṛthagjanāhi hasantīhi pāpakarma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2517: yam etāhi sā pūjā kṛtā vipratisāraś cotpāditaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2518: yaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ anāgatam adhvānaṃ etādṛśaṃ śastāram ārāgayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2521: yāvat pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ yāvat tatra parinirvāyinyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2525: tasmāt tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ kāraṇavaipulyan nāma dhāraya idam avocat /
V05bhivin_u:2527: kāścid anto nagare nilīnāḥ kāścid bahir nirgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2544: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2545: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2546: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā ekarātram pi vipravaseya anyatrasamayena /
