V05bhivin_u:2552: ekaṃ rātram pi vipravaseyā ti aruṇamudagame ca anyatrasamaye /
V05bhivin_u:2554: jarāburbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā nagaroparodho vā /
V05bhivin_u:2556: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī anto nagarato bahirdhā nirdhāvati bahirdhāto vā anto nagaraṃ praviśati /
V05bhivin_u:2558: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sasūrye vinā bhūtā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā aruṇamudghāteti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:2559: astamite sūrye vinā bhūtā aruṇamudghātayati thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2560: bhikṣuṇīvihāre anyatra vā sarvāhi anto hastapāśasya pratikramitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2564: atha khalu yāme yāme purime yāme samavadhānaṃ na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2565: madhyame yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2566: paścime yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2568: atha dāni dvibhūmakaṃ bhavati ekā heṣṭhime pratikramati aparā uparime /
V05bhivin_u:2571: yā punabhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi vinā ekarātram pi vipravasiya anyatrasamaye /
V05bhivin_u:2573: nagaro parodhe vā ruddhā bhavati ayam atra samayo /
V05bhivin_u:2577: rājagṛhe dāni aparasya abhaṭagaṇasya sudinnikā nāma bhāryā taruṇī /
V05bhivin_u:2591: taṃhi dāni kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī prativasati /
V05bhivin_u:2606: so dāni puruṣo anupūrveṇa śrāvastīṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:2610: pṛcchati yāvād āha katamā āryā kālīti sā dān āha /
V05bhivin_u:2613: prāptakālan nāma āryāye mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2621: ānetha saṃghāṭiṃ yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ bandhāpayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:2623: yāvad iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca bandhāpayeya iti /
V05bhivin_u:2624: so manuṣyo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca yāvad bahir gatvā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mahājanakāyasyārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:2625: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryām ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayati mama ca bhandhanena santarjeti /
V05bhivin_u:2626: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2635: evan nāma tvaṃ anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:2636: tena hi na kṣamati anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2638: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ kālīya pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
V05bhivin_u:2641: na ceṣā bhikṣuṇīyo kālīya etarhy eva pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
V05bhivin_u:2645: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo iyam eva nagarī vārāṇasī /
V05bhivin_u:2646: iyaṃ strī rātrau dārikāṃ skandhenādāya gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:2649: tāya striyāya sā dārikā capeṭāya āhatā /
V05bhivin_u:2650: eko te siṃho khādito etam pi khāditukāmāsi /
V05bhivin_u:2652: yādṛśī eṣā strī dhvāṅkṣā ca mukharā ca khādaty /
V05bhivin_u:2671: sā strī jalpati mā rodāhi dārike /
V05bhivin_u:2672: eṣo tava mātuḥ kenānīto keśehi gṛhītvā /
V05bhivin_u:2673: idāniṃ yan naṃ icchasi taṃ se khādāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:2678: yat tāvad ahaṃ ekaṃ vāraṃ prapalānaḥ kiṃ bhūyo nivartitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2679: so dāni tasya markaṭasya avadhunitvā prapalānaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2686: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā strī abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2688: iyam eva sā kālī strī abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2689: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā dārikā ti /
V05bhivin_u:2691: iyam eva sā sudinnikā dārikā abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2692: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyo so siṃho abhūṣīti /
V05bhivin_u:2697: 159. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2698: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2699: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:2701: anujñāpakehi ananujñātām iti avūḍhāya dārikāya mātāpitarau anujñāpakā /
V05bhivin_u:2704: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
V05bhivin_u:2706: upasaṃpādeti saṃghātiśeṣo eṣā kācit pravrajyāpekṣā āgacchati praṣṭavyā /
V05bhivin_u:2711: vūḍhā vaktavyā patidevarau śvaśruśvaśurāv anujānāpayitvā āgacchāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:2713: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:2718: taṃhi dāni aparasya mallasya bhāryā parapuruṣeṇa sārdham abhicarati /
V05bhivin_u:2722: 'to mā te aham evañ ca evañ ca asat kariṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2725: na punar aham ato doṣato viramiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2726: tena sā sahoḍhaṃ gṛhītvā āsane upanāmitā /
V05bhivin_u:2727: iccheyam ahaṃ bhavanto imāṃ svadharmeṇa lambhiyamānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2729: yā strī anyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ abhicarati /
V05bhivin_u:2730: sā saptadivasāni dānavisargaṃ kārapetvā ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭīyati /
V05bhivin_u:2733: tena dāni puruṣeṇa gṛhaṃ nayitvā uktā /
V05bhivin_u:2734: itikitikāya dhīte dada yat te asti ca nāsti ca /
V05bhivin_u:2735: sapta divasāni ahaṃ te ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2736: sā dāni ubhayato jñātisaṃghaṃ sannipātetvā annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ samudānīya rodati /
V05bhivin_u:2738: kiṃ ruditena tvayaiva tathā ceṣṭitaṃ yena tvam evaṃ duḥkham anubhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:2742: api tu ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:2752: sā tasyā vacanaṃ śrutvā janasya khādyantasya pibantasya pramattasya yathā vā tathā vā nirdhāvitvā anupūrveṇa pṛcchapṛcchikāya śrāvastīm āgatā /
V05bhivin_u:2773: putriṇi yā tvaṃ nisṛṣṭā sunisṛṣṭā yā tvaṃ gopāṭikāyāṃ nisṛṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:2787: prāptan nāmāryāya mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭām pravrājayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2793: caṇḍāyu coras tvam ocorakas tvam ocaritukāmo tvaṃ śrāvastīyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2794: na tvaṃ jānāsi nityaviruddhāḥ śrāvasteyāḥ āmalakakalyāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:2796: ānehi tāva samaghāṭim yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ rājakule bhandhāpemi /
V05bhivin_u:2798: yādṛśī iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca /
V05bhivin_u:2800: eṣa so dāni puruṣo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca /
V05bhivin_u:2801: so dāni puruṣo bhikṣuṇī nāṃ mahājanakāyasya ca puro ojjhāyati /
V05bhivin_u:2802: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryāñ ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājeti /
V05bhivin_u:2804: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2807: evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:2808: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2812: yāvad anyā tāva mayā īdṛśī yeva pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:2815: sā dāni aparāparāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām allīnā na kācit pravrājeti /
V05bhivin_u:2822: idānīṃ sā itikitikāya dhītā sumahatā dṛṣṭadhārmikena ca vadhena /
V05bhivin_u:2824: so punar na gaveṣati na pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:2825: sā pi dāni tena tīrthikabhāvena tīrthikabhāvenārtīyati /
V05bhivin_u:2829: nagnā ahrīkā anotrāpiṇo istrikāmā pi dūṣenti /
V05bhivin_u:2831: moha bhāginī asmākaṃ pravrajyā gartasmi patitā /
V05bhivin_u:2845: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2847: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayed anyatra samaye /
V05bhivin_u:2851: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:2853: viditān ti ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya mātṛpakṣasya pitṛpakṣasya ca /
V05bhivin_u:2855: jñātayo nāma kṣatriyāṅ brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ambaṣṭhavaidehāḥ bhaṭanāḥ kuṅkumālāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2857: keṣāñcit kīṭena vā kāliñjena vā veṭhayitvā dahyati /
V05bhivin_u:2858: keṣāñcit vālukāghaṭakaṃ kaṇṭhe badhvā udake praveśiyati /
V05bhivin_u:2861: keṣāñcit taptaṃ phālaṃ vraṇamukhe anuśrotaṃ prakṣipīyati /
V05bhivin_u:2863: kṣatriyāṇāṃ palālena śarehi ca veṭhayitvā dahyati /
V05bhivin_u:2864: abhīrāṇām vālukāya ghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bhadhvā udake prakṣipati /
V05bhivin_u:2867: taptam vā phālaṃ anuśrote vraṇamukhe prakṣipīyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2869: anyatra samaye ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2873: carakaparivrājakanirgranthājīvakatredaṇḍikāḥ mākandikāḥ gudugudukāḥ gautamadharmacintakāḥ vṛddhaśrāvakaḥ dakatṛtīyakāḥ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2874: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti daṇḍaprāptāṃ pravrajayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2878: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:2886: atha saṃbahulā striyo nadīyam ajirāvatīyaṃ snāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2888: sā tāvad ekānte cīvarakāṇi nikṣipya bāhubhyāṃ pratīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:2891: sā kayadhānake muhūrtam viśramitvā punar evāgatā /
V05bhivin_u:2899: mahāprajāpatī gautami bhagavato āroceti yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:2901: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ ekākinī nadīṃ tarasi /
V05bhivin_u:2902: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tarituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2903: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2904: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2905: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tare ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:2908: nadīti yā bahiḥ sīmāto pravahantī bahiḥ sīmām upeti /
V05bhivin_u:2911: yāvatā ca etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadīn taranti anto hastapāśe taritavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2914: athavaikā madhye tiṣṭhati aparā taranti thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2915: yāvad evam aparāparanti sarvāḥ thūl'-accayam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2916: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadyāṃ snāyanti ante hastapāśena snātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2919: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tareya /
V05bhivin_u:2924: tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī grāmacārikāṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:2925: tasyā gatāya antevāsinīye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena utkṣepanīyakarma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2934: sā dāni anyadā cānyadā ca yadā grāmacārikāṃ caritvā āgatā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:2936: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo sannipatathety uktā śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sannipatitāḥ kiñcid vaibhaṅgikaṃ dāsyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:2941: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosareya /
V05bhivin_u:2947: yasyā āryamiśrikānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosāryamāṇāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣetu /
V05bhivin_u:2949: evaṃ traivācikaṃ pratyosāritā āryamiśrikā iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:2951: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:2952: atha sā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ceti na kācit pratikṣipati /
V05bhivin_u:2957: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2965: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptām apratikṛtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2970: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2972: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2977: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti upasampannā yāvad ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:2979: svayam vā jāne parato vā śrutvā /
V05bhivin_u:2987: akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ ti prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇīyo asaṃjñāpayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:2989: saṃghamadhye avalokanām akṛtvā svayam eva pratyosārayet /
V05bhivin_u:2991: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2996: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣiptā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:2997: yā tasyā upādhyāyī vā ācāryāyiṇī vā ca yā prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇyāḥ tā saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3007: tasyāḥ saṃghena amukasmin vastuni utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3011: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgham itthannāmā pratyosāraṇāṃ yāceya /
V05bhivin_u:3017: atha tatra kācit pṛatihati karmakriyamāṇe prakṛtisthābhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3019: bhikṣur api jānan bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati sthūlātyayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3021: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānanti bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ akṛtāṃ akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati /
V05bhivin_u:3031: jānāsi ārye kasya vayam arthāya āryāya dadāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3039: ayaṃ tv aham āryāya arthikaḥ āryāya dadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3043: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahaprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3052: nanu te paścimā nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:3054: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3056: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pratigṛhṇīyāt pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā bhakṣyaṃ vā bhojyaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā ayam api dharmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3057: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yāvad upasampannā ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:3061: pātram iti jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ kanyasam vā /
V05bhivin_u:3065: antaśaḥ glānabhaiṣajyam iti saptāhikaṃ vā yāvajjīvikam vā /
V05bhivin_u:3068: eṣo tāvan manuṣyo bhikṣuṇīya dadāti pātram vā cīvaram /
V05bhivin_u:3076: tavaiva bhavatu dīrghāyuḥ labhiṣyāmaḥ vayam anyato pi /
V05bhivin_u:3078: atha vācaṃ na bhāṣati hastavikāraṃ vā pādavikāraṃ vā akṣivikāraṃ vā karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3085: atha khalu denaṃ deti prasannair indriyaiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3086: atha khalu tayā bhikṣuṇyā āśayena pratīcchitavyaṃ pratīcchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3087: evaṃ bhikṣor api raktacittā strī dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:3093: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya ayam api dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:3097: na kṣamati avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātraṃ vā yāvat pratigṛhṇātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3098: sā jetā tasya puruṣasya na praticchati /
V05bhivin_u:3106: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vada /
V05bhivin_u:3108: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:3112: dvitīyam tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3113: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:3120: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3122: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3128: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā etad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhya tiṣtheya na pratinissaret /
V05bhivin_u:3129_0: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya
V05bhivin_u:3129_1: vastusya pratiniḥsargāya yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā
V05bhivin_u:3129_2: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3132: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:3133: tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm iti yathā tāṃ jetāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3135: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3137: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tad evaṃ vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3138: ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyakaḥ yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
V05bhivin_u:3142: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3144: kiṃ te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:3147: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3148: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vade /
V05bhivin_u:3150: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:3153: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3155: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanuśāsitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3156: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā samanubhāṣyamāṇā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3157: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3161: dvau bhedena tathaiva kartavyo yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:3162: yā puna bhikṣuṇī samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasamvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3163: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3164: mā ārye samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya /
V05bhivin_u:3165: bhedanasamvartanīyam vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3167: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodayamāna avivadamāno /
V05bhivin_u:3168: ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ sukhañ ca phāsuñ ca viharati /
V05bhivin_u:3169: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3171: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3172: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3176: tasyāḥ khalu bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṇyo bhavanti sahāyikā /
V05bhivin_u:3177: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā /
V05bhivin_u:3180: mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha /
V05bhivin_u:3182: dharmavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī vinayavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:3183: asmākaṃ caiṣā bhikṣuṇī chandañ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V05bhivin_u:3184: yañ caitasyāḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
V05bhivin_u:3185: jānantī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī bhāṣate no ajānanti /
V05bhivin_u:3186: tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3193: sahito sammodayamāno avivadamāno ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3195: evañ ca tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3196: no ce pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3197: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3199: tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3204: tatra sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī adhikaraṇāny utpādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3206: sā saṃghaṃ ākrośati saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:3216: mā ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpaya /
V05bhivin_u:3219: yāvan na mohan niśrāya yāvad āryā evaṃ chandagāmī /
V05bhivin_u:3220: mā ārye chandan niśrāya saṃgham ākroṣitavyam manyasi paribhāṣitavyam manyasi /
V05bhivin_u:3221: sā tvam evam ucyamānī na pratikramasi dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam adhyucyamāni na pratikramasi /
V05bhivin_u:3226: tṛṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3228: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3229: alam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3230: yāvat khalu te ārye mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3235: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3238: sā tāva saṃghamadhye pi vaktavyā peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3240: anubhāṣṭā bhagavan āryā nandā triṣkṛtvā kuvege triṣkṛtvā mahājane triṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye etasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3249: nanv ahaṃ nande anekaparyāyeṇa daurvacasyaṃ vigarhāmi yāvan naivaṃ kurvato vṛddhir bhavati kūśaleṣu dharmeṣu atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3264: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3273: ārye ca chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃgham ākrośitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3274: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamāna tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3275: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3276: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamānā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etat kuślaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3279: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī triṣkṛtvā kuvege samanugrāhiyamānā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:3281: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3284: evam dvitīyātṛtīyām vā vācāyāṃ yāvad vyavaropitāyāṃ saṃghātiśeṣaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3289: sthūlātyayāḥ sarve te pratiprasrabhyanti sthāpayitvā aṣṭau sthūlātyayāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3292: kathaṃ tāvat pratiniḥ sargārhaṃ katham apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3293: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpayāmi prāpayiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3295: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpitañ ca /
V05bhivin_u:3296: na khalv idānīṃ prāpayāmi na ca prāpayiṣyāmīty apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3302: saṃgho doṣagāmī ca bhayagāmī ca saṃgho /
V05bhivin_u:3304: chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya samākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3305: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3311: na ca saṃgho chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya āryām ākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3312: āryā evaṃ chandagāminī doṣagāminī bhayagāminī mohagāminī /
V05bhivin_u:3313: āryā eva chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃegham ākrośitavyaṃ roṣitavyaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3315: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam evi vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhet /
V05bhivin_u:3317: sā bhikṣuṇ bhikṣunībhir yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3319: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3326: sā uddeśaparyavasānehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā /
V05bhivin_u:3331: sā uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3333: mā me āryamiśrikāyo kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇam vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V05bhivin_u:3334: aham apy āryamiśrikāṇān na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā /
V05bhivin_u:3336: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3337: mā ārye uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:3339: āryā pi bhikṣuṇīyo vadantu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V05bhivin_u:3340: āryam api bhikṣuṇīyo vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V05bhivin_u:3341: evaṃ saṃvṛddhā khalu punar ārye tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyavacanīyā anyamanyāpattivyutthāpanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3342: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3344: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3345: yāvāttṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇa vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3346: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3350: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā hi viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3354: kinti dāni kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3359: māryamiśrikāyo kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharatha mā vācikena mā kāyikavācikena /
V05bhivin_u:3362: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramanti /
V05bhivin_u:3363: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tā bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3366: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu punar dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3368: tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3371: nānā vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3373: evaṃ ca tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3375: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3376: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ itya etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3377: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tam evam vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3379: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:3382: tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:3388: yāvat tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3389: yaṃ taṃ vastuṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:3390: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhitā /
V05bhivin_u:3391: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:3392: trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahājane trikkhutto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3393: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3394: no ca pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:3397: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastun na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3398: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3401: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3410: abhūṣi khalu mo saṃsṛṣṭā vihariṣyāmo anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti te dānīm viharāmo vihariṣyāmo na vihṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3413: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭāyo viharanti anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā /
V05bhivin_u:3420: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi saṃsṛṣṭā viharitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:3421: nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3425: tāsāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3429: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:3430: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3432: mā ārye nande etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada saṃsṛṣṭā eva āryamiśrikāyo viharatha /
V05bhivin_u:3436: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3437: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:3440: yady eṣā sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī nandāṃ śākyakanyāṃ uttarāṃ ca māśorakadhītām evam āha /
V05bhivin_u:3444: dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3445: tena hi gacchatha nantrikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhayatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3447: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evam vadasi yāvad āmo ty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3449: mā ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada /
V05bhivin_u:3451: yaṃ khalu te ārye nande mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāye hitaiṣiṇīye anukampikāya anukampām upādāya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3452: taṃ mitrā ekā vācā gacchati dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsarāmity āha /
V05bhivin_u:3455: evaṃ eva yāvad anubhāṣṭā na pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:3457: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3464: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:3465: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharantīyo evam vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3467: saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3469: kiṃ punar yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃghe /
V05bhivin_u:3471: na ca tāsāṃ saṃgho kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:3472: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhāvena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3473: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3474: mā ārye nande itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīṃ nānā viharantīṃ anuvicārehi /
V05bhivin_u:3477: nānāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3479: kim punar yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃsṛṣṭā saṃghe /
V05bhivin_u:3481: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:3482: yuṣmākam eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3483: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratinissareya /
V05bhivin_u:3484: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3485: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3489: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:3491: saṃsṛṣṭā eva yūyam āryamiśrikāyo viharatha anyamanyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti kāyikena vācikena kāyikavācikena saṃsargeṇa /
V05bhivin_u:3492: mā nānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo 'dhiviharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi na parihāṇiḥ / peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3494: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3498: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakam ti trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:3500: satyaṃ tvam ārye itthannāme itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīm yāvad āmo ty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3502: mā ārye itthannāmāñ ca itthannāmāñ ca bhikṣuṇīṃ nānā viharantīṃ anuvicārehi /
V05bhivin_u:3506: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3507: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3510: yāvat kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3511: abhūṣi khalu ime itthannāmāyo bhikṣuṇīyo vadiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3516: abhūṣi khalu me itthannāmāyo bhikṣuṇīyo vadiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3519: vaditaṃ khalu me idānīm vadāmi na vadiṣyāmi ceti evam apratiniḥsargārham draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3521: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharantīyo evam vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3523: yāvad ayaṃ pi dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako /
V05bhivin_u:3528: tahiṃ dānī dve mātādhītare agārasyānagārikāṃ pravrajite /
V05bhivin_u:3532: kiṃ vayaṃ jīvantikā eva anyamanyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3536: na mayā yathā vā tathā vā śakyam āgantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3538: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi saha vāco vācikaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3539: sā yadā paryādinnā bhavati tadā āha /
V05bhivin_u:3541: evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3547: mā ārye buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvat mā śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3548: asādhu ārye buddhapratyākhyānaṃ yāvad asādhu śākyaputrīya bhāvapratyākhyānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3550: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam pi uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3551: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3561: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3563: tāṃ trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3565: satyaṃ tvam ārye itthannāme śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsi /
V05bhivin_u:3566: sā tvam evam vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3568: yāvat kiṃ punar etā eva śramaṇikā śākyaputrīyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3572: sā tvaṃ kuvege vuccasi mā tvam ārye itthannāme buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvac chākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3575: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣīṇīye karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3577: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratinissarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3579: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo bhagavato ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3588: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3593: dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3597: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3600: mā dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇibhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3606: evañ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3607: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3608: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3612: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:3613: śikṣāpratyākhyāyikā ti sā evam āha buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3619: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3620: mā ārye buddhaṃ praytākhyāhi yāvad asādhu ārye śākyaputrīya bhāvapratyākhyānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3621: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3623: sā bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhato saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:3625: satyaṃ tvam itthannāme evaṃ vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi yāvac chākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3630: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3633: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3636: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3637: no ca pratiniḥsareya ayam api dharmo yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3638_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhiyamāṇā
V05bhivin_u:3638_1: vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ
V05bhivin_u:3639: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3642: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayam /
V05bhivin_u:3644: yadā saṃghātiṣeśam āpattim āpannā bhavati tadā ye ca kuvege ye ca mahājane ye ca saṃghamadhye thūl'-accayā ca vinayātikramā ca sarve te pratiprasrabhyante /
V05bhivin_u:3645: ekā gurukā āpattiḥ saṃsthihati yad idaṃ saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:3647: kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3649: na khalu me pratyākhyānaṃ prtiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3651: abhūṣi khalu me śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:3652: pratyākhyātam dāni na pratyākhyāsi pratyākhyāmi ceti /
V05bhivin_u:3660: uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3664: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3669: mā uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3677: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vuccamānā taṃ eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3679: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3680: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamānā vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3685: uddiṣṭā me āryamiśrikāyo ekūnaviṃśati saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3687: yeṣāṃ bhikṣuṇī ity anyatarānyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā ardhamāsaṃ ubhayato saṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3689: āhvayanapratibaddhā yatra syād viṃśatigaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tatra sā bhikṣuṇī āhvayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:3690: ekenāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āhveya /
V05bhivin_u:3692: te ca bhikṣavo tāś ca bhikṣuṇīyo garhyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3698: pariśuddhā atrāryamiśrikāyo yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi / uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3730: tā dāni striyo kācin māñcasya mūlyan denti /
V05bhivin_u:3737: āryāye nandāye mayā mañcasya mūlyaṃ dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3741: khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3744: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3750: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3758: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3760: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3763: śayyāsanaṃ nāma mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ bisi caturasraṃ kuccaṃ bimbohanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3766: pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3767: nissargikapācattikaṃ ti saṃghe nissariya pācatikaṃ deśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3774: tam vastuṃ na darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3775: khaṇḍaṃ pralugnaṃ vā vā lepanikām vā kartuṃ kumbhiyo upasthāpayituṃ bhikṣur api śayanāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3776: vastun darśetvā labhyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pralugnādi kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3778: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyaṃ vā cetāpaye niḥsargikapācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:3782: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī omalinamalinehi cīvarehi pāṭitavipāṭitehi khaṇḍena pātreṇa chidravichidreṇa piṇḍapātam aṇvati /
V05bhivin_u:3788: ahan te ārye pātrasya mūlyaṃ demi /
V05bhivin_u:3796: sā khādati ca pibati ca naiva pātraṃ na cīvaraṃ jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3799: mayā āryāye nandāye pātrasya mūlyan dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3804: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:3809: satyaṃ nande evan nāma tvaṃ nande anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3813: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad evaṃ nāma tvam anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3814: tena hi na kṣamati anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3815: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3816: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3819: anyaṃ cetāpayed iti bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3821: eṣo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kācit pātram vā cīvaram vā ghṛtam vā tailam vā cetāpayituṃ mūlyan deti /
V05bhivin_u:3826: atha aniyataṃ deti yaṃ icchati taṃ jānāpeti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3830: bhikṣavor apy evam eva āpattis tu vinayātikaramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3832: yam vā icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti taṃ gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3834: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśakenānyaṃ cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3838: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktakāni samādāyeti /
V05bhivin_u:3842: tā dāni striyo chandakaṃ prajantīntīyo jalpanti /
V05bhivin_u:3845: atha sā khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3846: tāya khāditāvaśeṣeṇa yādṛśaṃ vā bhaktaṃ kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3856: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3861: satyaṃ nande evannāma tvam anyeṣām arthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3865: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajapatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3866: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:3867: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān vā cetāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:3870_0: anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā saṃghasya bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā yācitvā
V05bhivin_u:3870_1: ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān
V05bhivin_u:3871: atha khalu yasyārthāya yācati tam eva jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3872: atha dāni vastraṃ vipraṇāmeti bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā arthāya yācayitvā vaibhaṅgikaṃ dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:3873: śayyāsanam vā upasthāpeti vārṣikam vā hemantikam vā deti /
V05bhivin_u:3875: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktaṃ dāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3877: yadi tahiṃ kiñcic cheṣaṃ bhavati odanam vā sūpam vā yāvad bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā upadarśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3888: bhikṣor api evam eva āpattis tu vinyātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3890: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārān vā cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3896: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāva pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3897: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3906: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:3915: evañ ca nāma yūyaṃ pātrasannicayaṃ karotha /
V05bhivin_u:3916: tena hi na kṣamati pātrasannicayaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3917: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3918: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:3919: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3921: pātrasannicayan ti pātran nāma sumbhakaṃ upasambhakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3925: sannicayaṃ kuryād iti saṃgrahaṃ kuryān nissargikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3933: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhaṃ pātradhāraṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3934: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bahukāny api pātrāṇi vikalpetvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3936: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
V05bhivin_u:3942: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāvac cīvarāṇi saṃkrāmemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3943: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3953: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3961: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhañ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3962: kiñcāpi bhikṣu bahukāni cīvarāṇi mitrāṇāṃ vikalpayitvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3968: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī cīvarāṇi naiva dhovati na sīveti na rañjeti /
V05bhivin_u:3970: upāśraye nikṣiptā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:3973: ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhoviya sīviya phoṣiya prāvṛtā /
V05bhivin_u:3975: ānehi ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ mahyaṃ eṣā saṃghāṭī /
V05bhivin_u:3976: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo na kiñcic chakyate upāśraye nikṣipituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3978: dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca sā dāni tāya saṃghāṭī ācchinnā /
V05bhivin_u:3979: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3982: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇyupāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:3983: uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādiyeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3990: yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti paścāt svayam eva upādīyeta niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3991: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīupāśraye cīvaraṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti yadi kāci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3993: atha dāni na kāyaci upādinnam bhavati tasyā eva ca tāya artho bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3994: atha dāni kṣudrānukṣudrakaṃ pariṣkāraṃ nikṣiptam bhavati yadi kāyaci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3996: bhikṣur api bhikṣuvihāre pātram vā cīvaram vā upānaham vā kṣudrānukṣudrakam vā pariṣkāraṃ nikṣipitvā yo icchati so upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:3997: yadi kenacid upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchincituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3999: atha na kenacid gṛhītam bhavati so eva tenārthiko bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4001: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy upāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādīyeya niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4005: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya purāṇasaṃghāṭī omalinamalinā dhovitvā niḥsīvitvā ātape dattvā vāto ca pravāpito /
V05bhivin_u:4008: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:4010: evan nāma tvaṃ purāṇasaṃghāṭīṃ niḥsīvitvā na pratisaṃdhaisi na pratisandhāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:4013: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo lecchavi kanyāyo sukumārāyo bhārikāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhovantīyo kilamyanti /
V05bhivin_u:4014: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4018: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīm gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4020: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ niḥsīvitvā niḥsivāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātram agilānā na pratisandhāye na pratisandhāpayena niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4026: uttarīti ṣaṭpañcarātram iti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca /
V05bhivin_u:4027: atha khalu paramaṃ ṣaṭrātran na pratisandheyaiti svayaṃ na pratisandhāpeyā ti pareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:4031: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye saṃghāṭī malinā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4032: yadi tāva lahukā bhoti tathā yeva dhovitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4034: atha dāni sārikā bhoti niḥsīvetvā niḥsīvitvā dhovitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4036: sāharitvā gopiṭake vā kuṇḍake vā paṭalake vā sthāpayitvā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā ākramitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4038: atha dāni bhājanan na bhavati ekasthāne ākramiya iṣṭakena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā sthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4039: paścād antevāsiṇīya vā samānopādhyāyinīyā vā bhikṣuṇīya pratisandhāpayitavyā svayam vā pratisandhetavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4040: atha dāni jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati kiñcāpi cireṇa pratisandheti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4042: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭīn niḥsīvitvā vā niḥsīvāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātraṃ aglānā na pratisandhe vā na pratisandhāpeya vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4050: yadi cīvaram desi tato ham upasampādemi /
V05bhivin_u:4056: evam eva yāva sā vilakṣeti nopasampādeti /
V05bhivin_u:4057: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4060: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evam uktvā yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyāmīti tāye cīvaraṃ gṛhya nopasampādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4063: yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:4064: cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma kambalaṃ karpāsaṃ yāvat saṃkakṣikā /
V05bhivin_u:4066: sā taṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇitvā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī na upasampādayed iti svayan na upasampādayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4068: eṣā tāva bhikṣuṇī śikṣyamāṇāyā cīvaraṃ gṛhṇāti /
V05bhivin_u:4071: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4072: vaktavyā etasyā mayā cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā imām upasthāpehi /
V05bhivin_u:4073: atha sā necchati taṃ cīvaraṃ pratidātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4075: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na upasthāpeti na cīvaraṃ pratidadāti niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4078: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamānām evaṃ vaditvā yadi me cīvararaṃ desi tato ham upasaṃpādayiṣyan ti tasyāś cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇītvā na upasaṃpādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4082: aparo dāni vāṇijako śatasahasramūlyaṃ kambalaratanam ādāya uttarā pathāto āgato /
V05bhivin_u:4083: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito kim asya mūlyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4086: naiva rājā krīṇāti na rājaputrāḥ na vaṇijāḥ na sārthavāhāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4087: so dāni vāṇijako vīthīm abhiruhitvā cintāsāgaram anupraviṣṭo āsati /
V05bhivin_u:4088: imaṃ mahārghaṃ mūlyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ bahuśulkaṃ na vikrāyati /
V05bhivin_u:4096: gaccha eṣā bhadrā nāma śramaṇikā sā krīṇīṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:4097: so dāni taṃ ceṭakasya skandhe āropayitvā bhikṣuṇī vihāraṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:4110: sā dāni na paṇeti na paṇāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:4112: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya śatasahasraṃ vīthīkāto dāpehīti /
V05bhivin_u:4124: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4129: tad eva sarvaṃ yāvad ām bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:4131: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4132: tena hi na kṣamati uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4134: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayati ṅissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4135: uttari catuṣkarṣeṇeti karṣo nāma catvāraḥ purāṇāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4139: tad uttariṃ paraṃ ṣoḍaṣehi purāṇehi cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4141: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayitukāmā bhavati catuṣkarṣamūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4142: pratyavaro vā tad uttariṃ na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:4143: atha dāni kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārghamūlyaṃ pi dadāti pratigṛhṇāty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4145: kiñcāpi bhikṣur mahārghamūlyaṃ pi jānāpayitvā paribhuñjāty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4147: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣkarṣamūlyāto guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4161: so dāni tam ādāya bhikṣuṇīvihāraṃ gato /
V05bhivin_u:4175: sā na svayaṃ paṇeti na paṇāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:4177: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya pīṭhikāto daśapurāṇasahasrāṇi dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:4178: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito vikrītaṃ te bhāṇḍaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4187: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4190: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4191: tena hi na kṣamati uttari aḍḍhātiya karṣamūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4192: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:4193: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiyakarṣamūlyāto sūkṣmaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4199: niḥsargika pācattikaṃ yāvat yā puna bhikṣuṇī sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ jānāpayati daśapurāṇamūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4202: atha dānī kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārghamūlyaṃ pi dadāti śatikam vā sāhasrikam vā yadi kiñcāpi paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4203: kiñcāpi bhikṣu śatasahasramūlyaṃ pi jānāpayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4205: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiyakarṣamūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ / uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4217: so dāni kāṣṭhavāham ādāya antarāpaṇam okasto /
V05bhivin_u:4236: so dāni manuṣya paśyati yady ahaṃ dvau kārṣāpaṇā labhāmi mah'argham mayā vikrītaṃ bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:4237: so taṃ adhikaritvā kāṣṭhavāhamūlyaṃ gṛhṇiya śakaṭam āruhitvā tasyāpaṇikasyāgratenopayāti /
V05bhivin_u:4255: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:4256: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4258: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śramaṇena /
V05bhivin_u:4263: etaṃ dāni āpaṇikasya vā prāvarikasya vā kiñcid bhāṇḍam upagatam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4264: tena ca bhikṣuṇī arthīkā bhavati na dāni kṣamati tahiṃ antarāyayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4266: atha khu ekā śca sthitvā pratipālayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4276: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kiñcid upakreyam bhavati pātram vā cīvaram vā na kṣamati antarā yatituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4278: atha dāni saṃghamadhye vaḍḍho vaḍḍhikāya jānāpayati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4279: bhikṣur api paropagataṃ cetāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4281: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4293: caturthaṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratigrahaṃ uddharitvā na jātarūpaṃ samodahet /
V05bhivin_u:4299: tatra nirdiṣṭā triṃśad daśa ca anūnāḥ kāraṇe samutpanne naiḥsargika bhagavatā nirdiṣṭā bhikṣuṇīsūtre //
V05bhivin_u:4302: 183. ime kho punar āryemiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4357: yathā yeva bhikṣuṇā tathā yeva kartavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4361: atha bhadrā kāpileyī antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭiṃ prāvaritvā jñātikulaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:4367: sā dāni mārgayati ātmanaḥ saṃghāṭin na paśyati /
V05bhivin_u:4368: tāye dāni bhavati avaśyam āryāya saṃghāṭī prāvaritā /
V05bhivin_u:4369: arhati āryā mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā gantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4371: gacchatha yūyaṃ āryamiśrikāyo nāhaṃ gacchāmi kim arthaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4379: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4383: sā dāni śabdapitā yāvat satyaṃ bhadreti /
V05bhivin_u:4386: yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:4388: tena hi na kṣamati cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4389: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4391: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4393: peyālaṃ cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma saṃghāṭi yāvat dakaśāṭikā /
V05bhivin_u:4396: na dāni kṣamati antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭīṃ prāvarituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4397: atha dāni prāvarati vaktavyā iyam mayā saṃghāṭī prāvaritā /
V05bhivin_u:4398: yadi praviśeṣi mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā praviśesi /
V05bhivin_u:4402: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī saṃghāṭiṃ dhoveti vā sīveti vā rañjeti vā /
V05bhivin_u:4403: yadi pratibalā bhavati tasyā api saṃvibhāgaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4405: tiṣṭha tvaṃ iheva ahan tava piṇḍapātasaṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:4409: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4417: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca āgarasyānāgariyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4418: gartodarapitā gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodaro tīrthikehi /
V05bhivin_u:4419: so dāni hastakambalena prāvṛto śītena khaṇakhaṇāyanto dantavīṇikāṃ vādayanto vihāram āgato /
V05bhivin_u:4425: tāya tasya uttarāsaṅgo surabho suphoṣito dinno prāvaraṇāya /
V05bhivin_u:4426: so dāni prāvaritvā pānāgāraṃ gatvā pibanto āsati /
V05bhivin_u:4427: jano dani ojjhāyati kim eṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭikānāṃ vinipatitānāṃ yānagardabhānāṃ surābhraṣṭānāṃ ṛṣidhvajanena dinnena bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4428: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4437: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4438: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4440: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ pramāṇacīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4447: na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4448: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī bhavati kṛtapuṇyā striyo dāni maṅgalārthāya dārakasya dārikāye vā kāṣāya khaṇḍaṃ yācanti /
V05bhivin_u:4449: na kṣamati svahastaṃ dātuṃ kalpiyakārikāya dātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4450: bhikṣur api āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4451: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ kṛtapuṇyo bhavati yāvat kalpiyakārakeṇa dātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4455: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4463: tena hi na kṣamati kumārīnivastena antaragṛhaṃ praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4465: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni yathāgatān paṭān navān tantrodgatān puṣpadaśān antaravāsaṃ kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:4468: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4470: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇiko kārāpayitavyo tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaso catvāri vitastiyo /
V05bhivin_u:4472: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4475: bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīyeti svayaṃ vā kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:4478: sugatavitastinā ti tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvyardho mañcakapādo tad uttarim kārāpayed iti paraṃ pramāṇato cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4480: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī dīrghaśo karoti prāmāṇikaṃ tiryak karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4483: evaṃ tiryak karoti prāmāṇikaṃ dīrghaśo karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4484: ante karoti prāmāṇikaṃ madhye karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4485: madhye karoti prāmāṇikaṃ ante karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4486: dviguṇaṃ māpeti udakena saṃkucati saṃkucitaṃ māpeti udakena phoṣeti śuṣkaṃ vaḍḍhiṣyatīti pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4488: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4491: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:4496: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4498: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikāya kīdṛśaṃ cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4499: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4504: bhikṣuṇīyo tathāgatān paṭān puṣpadaśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:4505: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati tathāgatān paṭān puṣpadaśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4509: saṃkakṣikāṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4516: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī sarpiṇikāṃ nadīṃ snānāya gatā /
V05bhivin_u:4518: pañca licchavikumārāḥ tāye pratibaddhacittāḥ nadītīre sthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4520: sā dān āha dīrghāyuḥ gacchatha gacchatha yāvad aham uttarāmi /
V05bhivin_u:4525: dirghāyuḥ kim anena pūtikāyena navadvāreṇāśucipragharantena dṛṣṭena /
V05bhivin_u:4530: te dāni yadā na gacchanti cirañ ca bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4531: sā dāni andho bālajano ti kṛtvā ekaṃ hastam agrato kṛtvā aparaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā uttīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:4532: te tāṃ vivasanāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4538: paśya bhagavan katham iya pañca licchavikumārāḥ pratibaddhacittāḥ bhadrāyāṃ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4540: naitarhi yeva ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddhacittāḥ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4541: anyadāpy ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddhacittāḥ anyadāpi bhagavan anyadāpi bhikṣuṇīyo /
V05bhivin_u:4542: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ yāvat triṃśabhavane /
V05bhivin_u:4543: anyatarasmiṃ bhavane bharaṇī nāma apsarā upapannā /
V05bhivin_u:4544: prāsādikā darśanīyā atirivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate /
V05bhivin_u:4545: atirivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virājate /
V05bhivin_u:4553: na tāvad eṣā śakyā asmābhiḥ pañcadhā kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4555: yo 'tra sarvasuṣṭhu adhyavasito bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:4557: utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā āsane na labhate sukhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4558: śayito ca sukhaṃ labhe yadā kāmā jahanti mā // [1] //
V05bhivin_u:4560: sukhaṃ tvam asi devendra yaṃ supto labhase sukhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4561: bheryā saṃgrāmaśīrṣe vā sadā kāmā hananti māṃ // [2] //
V05bhivin_u:4563: bheryās tu hanyamānāyā bhaved vīcī muhur muhuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4564: kāṣṭhasrotā upapannaṃ vā sadā kāmā hananti me // [3] //
V05bhivin_u:4569: sarve bhavanto sukhitā yeṣāṃ gāthā pratibhānti /
V05bhivin_u:4570: ahaṃ khalu na jānāmi kiṃ jīvāmi marāmi vā // [5] //
V05bhivin_u:4572: tvaṃ suṣṭhu adhyavasito tathaiva eṣā bharaṇī /
V05bhivin_u:4575: syād vo bhikṣuṇiyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā bharaṇī nāma apsarā abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:4578: anye te devaputrāḥ etad eva te pañca licchavikumārāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4582: kasya bhagavan karmaṇo vipākena bhadrā prāsādikā darśanīyā mahākulīnā maheśākhyā mahābhogā kṣiprādhigamā ca /
V05bhivin_u:4583: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrāṃ kāpileyīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4584: pratibhātu te bhadre bhikṣuṇīnām ātmopanāyikāṃ pūrvenivāsapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4585: atha khalu bhadrā anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmarantī bhikṣuṇīyo āmantreti /
V05bhivin_u:4586: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhaginyaḥ atītam adhvānaṃ nagaraṃ vārāṇasī kāśījanapado /
V05bhivin_u:4588: sā dāni anyatarāya śreṣṭhibhāryāya śabdāpitā keśān prasādhanāya /
V05bhivin_u:4591: atha śuṇṭhīka nāma pratyekabuddho piṇḍapātāya caranto tasmin gṛhe piṇḍāya praviṣṭo /
V05bhivin_u:4594: sā dāni strī tāṃ śreṣṭhibhāryāṃ āha /
V05bhivin_u:4597: kā imasyaivaṃ durvarṇasya alpeśākhyasya bhikṣān dāsyati /
V05bhivin_u:4603: āryadhīte dehi me yan mamādyabhaktaṃ tvayā dātavyam tam aham imasya dadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:4605: yan tavādyabhaktaṃ prāpuṇati taṃ gṛhītvā udake prakṣipāhi etasya vā dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:4607: hastasyaivaṃ kṛtvā prasādena tasya pratyekabuddhasya dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4608: sa pratyekabuddhas vata eva vaihāyase prakrāntaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4609: sā dāni dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:4610: śreṣṭhinā ca dṛṣṭo gṛhāto ṛṣī vaihāyasena prakrānto /
V05bhivin_u:4619: imāya daridrastriyāya dattaṃ śreṣṭhī utkaṇṭhito īdṛśo dakṣiṇīyo mama gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo na ca saṃmānito /
V05bhivin_u:4620: so dāni śreṣṭhī tāṃ striyam āha /
V05bhivin_u:4621: dehi me etaṃ puṇyaṃ yaṃ tvayā adya sañcitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4622: dadāmi te prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ / sā dān āha / sā dān āha /
V05bhivin_u:4623: kṣīyati sarvaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ ca /
V05bhivin_u:4624: na kṣīyante puṇyephalaṃ dattaṃ munīnāṃ sarvathā / [7] //
V05bhivin_u:4625: yad aham evaṃ daridrā para vaktavyā anyathā /
V05bhivin_u:4627: durvarṇatāya mucye haṃ avaikalyatā ca bhogehi /
V05bhivin_u:4629: evaṃ caṅkrameyaṃ na bhe yathā caṅkramase vīra /
V05bhivin_u:4632: bhavāmi muditā [ḥ ḥ] dattvā ṛṣisya āhāraṃ / [11] //
V05bhivin_u:4639: syād vo bhaginyaḥ anyā sā daridrā strī naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4641: yaṃ so mayā pratyekabuddho piṇḍapātena pratimānito prasannacittāya tasya karmaṇo vipākenāhaṃ prāsādikā /
V05bhivin_u:4643: api tu bhaginyaḥ naitad evaṃ mayā kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ yenāhaṃ prāsādikā darśanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:4646_0: 189. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhaginyo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasīyaṃ nagare kāyaci striyāya lohacakraṃ
V05bhivin_u:4646_1: paṭalake kṛtvā puṣpehi okiritvā kāśikena vastreṇa praticchādeyitvā bhagavato kāśyapasya dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4648: rathasya cakraṃ sanābhinemikaṃ vastrottamena praticchādayitvā ye munivarasākṣikṛtā hi dharmā aham api taṃ sākṣikaromi dharmaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4649: sā dāni kenacit kāryeṇa aparādhinī svāminā avasāditā /
V05bhivin_u:4656: tatra ca nātidūre bhagavato kāśyapasya stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātā /
V05bhivin_u:4660: sā prasannacittā tāni alaṅkārāṇi muñcitvā stūpe avakiritvā kāśikena vastreṇācchādayitvā candanenānulimpitvā praṇidhānaṃ akārṣīt /
V05bhivin_u:4662: sa ca me dharman deśeya tasyāhaṃ dharman deśitam ājāneyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:4665: apsarasahasraparivṛtā sā tahiṃ yāvadāyuḥ sthitvā tataś cyavitvā manuṣyeṣūpapannāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4667: tāye dāni jñātikehi bhadreti nāma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4668: anarthikā kāmaguṇehi pañcahi yā niṣkramitvā pravrajitā sarvāsravakṣayam akārṣīt /
V05bhivin_u:4669: kāśikāni vastrāṇi pratyagraṃ cānulepanaṃ bhagavato kāśyapasya yā prasannābhiropayet /
V05bhivin_u:4670: sā kāpileyī bhagavato pādāṃ vandati śāstuno /
V05bhivin_u:4674: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ bhadrā sthaviramahākāśyapena sārdhaṃ pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:4676: na etarhi yeva ete ubhaye pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:4679: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ catvāro rājaṛṣayaḥ kumbhakārakule vāsam upagatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4681: nimī rājā videhānāṃ ugrasenaś ca kṣatriyaḥ // [13] //
V05bhivin_u:4682: ete catvāro rājaṛṣayaḥ ugratejā mahābalā kumbhakārakule vāsa ekarātram upāgamat /
V05bhivin_u:4684: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā pravrajyām ārocatha /
V05bhivin_u:4689: śabda dvitīyā tu samāgatā yato ramāgatā yato
V05bhivin_u:4715: ayam eva kālo nahi anyad asti /
V05bhivin_u:4719: āmaṃ pakvan na jānanti atha loṇam aloṇakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4724: nimī rājā bodhisattvaḥ kaliṅga pi śārisutaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4725: ugrasenaś ca maudgalyo ānando āsi bhārgavo /
V05bhivin_u:4726: kumbhakāraḥ kāśyapo āsi bhadrā sā kumbhakārikā // [26] //
V05bhivin_u:4730: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni tathāgatān paṭān dakaśāṭikāṃ kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:4732: tena hi na kṣamati yathāgataṃ paṭaṃ dakaśāṭikāṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4738: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpaye cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4739: dakaśāṭikā ti yā sā bhagavatā anujñātā /
V05bhivin_u:4740: kārāpayantīye ti svayaṃ kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpaye /
V05bhivin_u:4741: prāmāṇikan ti tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ catvāri vitastiyo /
V05bhivin_u:4742: sugatavitastinā ti sugato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvy ardho mañcakapādo tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpaye pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4743: atha dāni ekānte nikuñje pradeśe snāyanti vinā dakaśāṭikāya anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4744: bhikṣur api vinā dakaśāṭikāya snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4745: atha nikuñjapradeśe snāyati vinā dakaśāṭikāya anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4757: śakyasi ārye saṃghasya kṛtena paṭān yācituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4773: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:4774: yā puna bhikṣuṇī durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4777: cīvarapratyāśāyeti cīvaraṃ nāma kālaṃ yāvat kṣaumunikā /
V05bhivin_u:4779: vyatināmayed iti atikrāmayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4784: atha khalu ye pratibalāḥ pitā putrā vā bhrātarau vā bhaginīyo vā jñātisambandhā vā gotrasambandhā vā te yācitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4786: atha dān āhaṃsuḥ jñāsyāma jñāsyāma iti vaktavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4788: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati utsāhayitavyā sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya kaṭhinavivarārthāya /
V05bhivin_u:4789: utsahayitvā naiva yācati naiva yāvayeti na bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyārocayati na labhyatīti pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4791: bhikṣur api durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4793: yā puna bhikṣuṇī durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayet pācattikaṃ / phu //
V05bhivin_u:4797: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo sāntararottareṇa prāvṛtā bhagavato pādavandikā āgatā tāsāṃ nirgatānāṃ agnidāha utpannaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4799: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4803: etaṃ va ta dāni yūyaṃ pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharatha /
V05bhivin_u:4807: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīyakanyāyo ca mallakanyāyo ca kolitakanyāyo ca sukumārapravrajitā ca /
V05bhivin_u:4809: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4813: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4816: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4818: pārihārikaṃ cīvaran ti saṃghāṭī yāvat dakaśāṭikā /
V05bhivin_u:4820: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ padaṃ bhagavatā anāpattiḥ gilānāya /
V05bhivin_u:4821: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4822: atha dāni cetiyaṃ vandati caṅkramati vā anto sīmam vā gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4823: bhikṣur api pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4825: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4829: bhadrāye dāni kāpileyīye jñātikulāto devasikaṃ bhaktam ānīyati /
V05bhivin_u:4842: asmākaṃ gṛhe na evaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ pacyati /
V05bhivin_u:4847: te dāni gṛhaṃ gatvā tā dāsīyo daṇḍakaśāhatāyo kṛtāyo /
V05bhivin_u:4848: itikitikāye dhītaro evam ettakam upakaraṇaṃ dadāmo yūyam asphātikaṃ karotha /
V05bhivin_u:4856: tena hi na kṣamati parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā pacitum vā pacāyitum vā bhṛjjitum vā bhṛjjāpayitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:4859: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo ca kolitakanyāyo ca piṇḍāya carantīyo /
V05bhivin_u:4866: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4868: yāvat labhyaṃ bhagavan bhikṣuṇīya tūṣṇīṃ kṛtvā bhoktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4870: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4872_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyam vā puno puno pacitvā vā pacāpetvā
V05bhivin_u:4872_1: vā bhṛjjitvā vā bhṛjjāpetvā vā kaṭhitvā vā kaṭhāpetvā vā agilānā khādaye vā bhuñjeya vā pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:4875: parāhṛtan ti grāmato vā ānītaṃ nagarato vā ānītaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4876: khādanīyan ti khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyan ti bhojanīyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4883: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattir gilānāye /
V05bhivin_u:4885: jarādurbalā vā bhoti vyādhidurbalā vā bhuktvā vā vamati /
V05bhivin_u:4886: aphāsuṃ vā bhoti idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4887: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rasagṛdhyā parāhṛtaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ puno puno paceya vā pacāpeya vā pācāttikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4888: atha dāni śītalam bhavati labhyā uṣṇīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4889: na dāni thālikāya vā piṭharikāya vā /
V05bhivin_u:4890: atha khalu tāmrapātreṇa vā kupātreṇa vā kāṃsikāya vā uṣṇīkartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4891: bhikṣur api svayaṃ pacati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4893: atha dāni śītalo bhavati piṇḍapāto uṣṇīkaroti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4895_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam va puno pacitvā vā pacāpetva
V05bhivin_u:4895_1: vā bhṛjjitvā vā bhṛjjāpayitvā vā kaṭhitvā vā kaṭhāpayitvā vā agilānā khādeya vā bhuñjeya
V05bhivin_u:4899: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca agārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4900: gartodarapitā ca gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodara tirthakeṣu /
V05bhivin_u:4901: gatodarapitā bhuñjati gartodaramātā vījayantī agrato tiṣṭhati pānīyamallakaṃ dhāreti /
V05bhivin_u:4902: so dāni tāye kānicit kānicit pūrvacaritāni jalpati /
V05bhivin_u:4911: agrapariṣā eṣā na labhyā evaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4913: ayaṃ khalu akhalla akuśalo aprakṛtijño adyāpi yāni tāni ajalpitavyāni jalpati /
V05bhivin_u:4914: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4918: evaṃ ca dāni bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthihasi /
V05bhivin_u:4919: tena hi na kṣamati dakavījanena upasthihituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4921: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthiheya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4926: bhuñjantaṃ ti pañcajātakam vā pañcajātakasaṃsṛṣtam vā yad vā kiñcit khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4930: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udakamallakan dhārayati nīvījanaṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4931: vījayati na udakamallakan dhāreti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4934: sā eṣā āpattiḥ ekasya bhikṣusya ekabhikṣuṇīye /
V05bhivin_u:4935: atha dāni saṃbahulā bhikṣū bhavanti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4936: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye pitā vā bhrātā vā bhikṣur bhavati kiñcāpi vījayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4938: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthiheya pācattikaṃ // 0 //
V05bhivin_u:4944: tā dāni ṣaḍvargiṇīyo khādanti pi mardenti pi ujjhenti pi viśrāṇenti pi ādāya pi gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:4945: so dāni kadācit vāṭaṃ pratyavekṣituṅ gataḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4946: tena dāni so dṛṣṭo vāṭo vidhvasto /
V05bhivin_u:4950: laśunena tāyo dāni khādanti mardenti pi ujjhenti pi viśrāṇenti pi ādāya pi gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:4955: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4957: yā puna bhikṣuṇī laśunaṃ khādeya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:4958: laśunan ti laśunaṃ nāma jātimaṃ sevimaṃ nāgaraṃ kaccharuhaṃ pārvateyaṃ brahmadeyaṃ āvarantakaṃ māgadhakaṃ kosalakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4959: yaṃ cā punar anya pi kiñcil laśunaṃ sarvaṃ laśunaṃ na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:4960: āman na kṣamati pakvan na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:4963: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīya gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati labhyan taṃ mrakṣituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4964: mrakṣayitvā na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4965: atha khu pratigupte pradeśe sthātavyaṃ yāvad varttā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4968: yā puna bhikṣuṇī laśunaṃ khādeya pācattikaṃ // 1 //
V05bhivin_u:4982: sā dāni tāsāṃ bhāgineyakānāṃ nānāprakāraṃ khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ bhakṣayitvā deti /
V05bhivin_u:4984: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā śraddhādeyaṃ gṛhiṇān dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:4985: etam prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4988: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:4992: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4994: gartodaro ca gartodarapitā ca gartodaramātā ca agārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:4997: yāvat sa gartodaramātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrānto tāya gartodaramātāya tasya nānāprakārasya khajjakasya pūraṃ pātraṃ dinnaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4998: so dāni taṃ gṛhya pānāgāraṃ gatvā ātmanā ca khādati pārāṃś ca chandeti /
V05bhivin_u:5012: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5015: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5026: yadi tāvad asya kiñcid dātuṃ bhavati na kṣamati svahastaṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5028: atha dāni kalpiyakārī na bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5037: atha dāni pravrajitako āgacchati na kṣamati svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5039: atha dāni kalpiyakārī na bhavati ato yeva gṛhṇīya khādāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:5041: sālohite kim asmākaṃ caṇḍālehi viya pravartasi /
V05bhivin_u:5044: atha dāni grāmāntaraṃ gacchati labhyan tena kalpiyakṛtyaṃ kārāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5045: ato ātmā ca khādatha asmākañ ca pratigrāhatha /
V05bhivin_u:5049: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5055: sā dāni rājakulehi amātyakulehi āpaṇikakulehi śreṣṭhikulehi strīṇāṃ bastiṃ sthapeti /
V05bhivin_u:5057: añjanaṃ pratyañjanaṃ vamanaṃ virecanaṃ svedakarma nastakarma śastrakarma bhaiṣajyām anuprayacchati /
V05bhivin_u:5058: sā upasarpaṇaṃ bhavati khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ labhati /
V05bhivin_u:5061: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5070: tena hi na kṣamati cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5073: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5074: cikitsitavidyā nāma ahividyā viṣavidyā yāvad grahacaritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5079: bhikṣur api cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5081: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5091: na kṣamati cikitsituṃ bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5092: api tu eṣa detha mama kiñcid vāciṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5093: sā āgārikāṃś ca parivrājakāṃś ca cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayati /
V05bhivin_u:5097: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5102: cikitsitavidyām iti ahividyā viṣavidyā yāvad grahacaritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5105: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5107: bhikṣur api cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
V05bhivin_u:5109: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5113: viśākhāya dāni mṛgāramātāya ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito /
V05bhivin_u:5114: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalyato yevāgatvā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5115: upāsike yaṃ dāni tvayā ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito kin dāni vayam upāsikāya upakāraṃ karoma /
V05bhivin_u:5121: evam etad api tu upakāraṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5122: tāyo dāni talakam abhiruhitvā karpāsaṃ gṛhītvā anyāhi cikitsitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5130: naiṣa mama upakāro yaṃ mamāryamiśrikā piñjeyur vā loḍheyur vā vikaḍḍheyur vā karteyur vā /
V05bhivin_u:5131: eṣo mamopakāro yam āryamiśrikā matsakāśād bhuktvā uddiśatha svādhyāyetha yāvad buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyetha /
V05bhivin_u:5132: yat tāya upāsikāya avadhyāpitaṃ taṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5133: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5137: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kartuṃ / yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:5138: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5141: vaiyāpṛtyam iti karteya vā piñjeya vā yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:5142: ohaneya vā pīṣeya vā paceya vā sīveya vā /
V05bhivin_u:5143: yā punar anya pi kiñcid gṛhivaiyāpṛtyam kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5149: āryamiśrikāhi sāhāyyaṃ kartavyam iti kiñcāpi gandham vā pīṣayati /
V05bhivin_u:5151: bhikṣur api gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5153: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ // 4 //
V05bhivin_u:5157: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī madhyāhne vighane aparaṃ kulam upasaṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:5158: tahin dāni dve bhāryāpatikā kleṣotpīḍitā raho saṃjñino maithunaṃ pratiṣetukāmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5159: sā dāni apratisaṃviditā sahasā tahiṃ praviṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:5160: so dāni manuṣyo uddhāvito utkaṇṭhito karmaṇy enāṃ rājā tena parivāteti /
V05bhivin_u:5161: imān tāvad itikitikāya dhītāṃ śramaṇikāṃ viṭṭālayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:5164: manāsmi āryamiśrikāyo brahmacaryāto cyāvitā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5167: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī sambhojanīyaṃ kulan divā pūrve apratisaṃvicitā upasaṃkrāmasi /
V05bhivin_u:5168: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5171: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulaṃ divā pūrve apratisaṃviditā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5173: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:5175: yahiṃ strīpuruṣakaṃ sthālīpiṭharakaṃ kaṇṭikāmusalakaṃ sūpellakaṃ yavaprasthakaṃ imaṃ paścimakaṃ kulaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5176: sambhojanīyan ti strī puruṣasya bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5177: yadi vigate madhyāhne pūrve apratisaṃviditā ti aśabdakarṇikāya /
V05bhivin_u:5178: anāhūtā upasaṃkrameyā ti praviśet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5179: yaṃ dāni jñāyate etaṃ saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulan ti nahi kṣamati tahiṃ pūrve apratisaṃviditaṃ anāhūtāya upasaṃkramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5186: yadi praviśitvā na niṣkrāmati na kṣamati praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5187: atha dāni tuṇutuṇā śabdo bhavati acchaṭikā dātavyā utkāśitavyaṃ vā /
V05bhivin_u:5188: yadi tāva tūṣṇīkā bhavati na kṣamati praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5189: atha dāni pratyudgacchanti svāgatam āryāyeti praviśeti praveṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5190: bhikṣur api saṃvidito upasamkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5192: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule divā upasaṃkrameya pūrve apratisaṃviditā anāhūtā pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5196: yā dāni sā kālīyan triyantarā licchavidhītā pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:5197: sā dāni āgārikehi ca prāvrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
V05bhivin_u:5198: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5201: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5203: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā saṃsṛṣṭā vihareya divasaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇoddeśehi pācattikam //
V05bhivin_u:5210: saṃsṛṣṭā vihared iti kāyikena saṃsargeṇa vācikena saṃsargeṇa /
V05bhivin_u:5212: divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato tatkṣaṇantallavaṃ tanmuhūrtam vā antamasato /
V05bhivin_u:5215: śramaṇ'uddeśā iti pañcadaśavarṣān upādāya yāvat saptatikāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5216: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ārāmikehi vā parivrājakehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā viharati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5217: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīyo anyamanyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti viharanty abhiratā vivecayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5219: trir api bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5221: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharet divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇ'uddeśakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pācattikaṃ // 6 //
V05bhivin_u:5225: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:5226: sā dāni yādā parājītā bhavati tadā upasampati /
V05bhivin_u:5242: yā pi bhadrāyaṇī mām evam āha sā py evam bhavatu /
V05bhivin_u:5243: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5248: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:5249: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī viharet ātmānaṃ sandhāya parām vā sandhāya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5255: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ sandhāya param vā upaśapati pācattikam /
V05bhivin_u:5258: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī vihared ātmānaṃ vā sandhāya paraṃ vā pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5262: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:5263: sā yadā parājitā bhavati tadā ātmānaṃ khaṭacapeṭamustakehi piṭṭāyati /
V05bhivin_u:5266: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5268: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande evaṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:5273: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande naiṣa dharmo yāvat tena hi na kṣamati ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5274: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5275: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5278: ātmānaṃ hanitvā ti khaṭehi vā pāṣāṇehi vā yāvad anyena vā kenacit /
V05bhivin_u:5279: rodeyā ti aśruṇi vā pravartayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5281: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanti na rodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5283: hanati ca rodati ca pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5285: bhikṣur api ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5287: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ // 8 //
V05bhivin_u:5291: sthūlanandāya dāni bhikṣūṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī kulehi saṃvarṇitā /
V05bhivin_u:5292_0: sā jetā bhikṣuṇī bhadrikā kulāny upasaṃkramati prāsādikenātikrāntena pratikrāntenāvalokitena
V05bhivin_u:5292_1: vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena prasāritena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena anuddhatā anunnaḍā
V05bhivin_u:5297_0: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī anākalpasampannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi
V05bhivin_u:5297_1: pāṭitavipaṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā
V05bhivin_u:5298: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5300: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo mamaivāryā jetā kulehi saṃvarṇitā mahy'evāvarṇaṃ bravīti /
V05bhivin_u:5304: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5308: yāvad eva nāma tvaṃ duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5309: tena hi na kṣamati duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5310: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5312: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇīnām evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:5314: tato itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto apratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5316_0: bhikṣuṇīnāṃ evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī yāvad āham ārye amukaṃ kulan
V05bhivin_u:5316_1: ti kulan nāma kṣatriyakulaṃ kulan nāma kṣatriyakulaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ rājanyakulaṃ yāni
V05bhivin_u:5317: tato itthannāmāye ti yathā jetā pi bhikṣuṇīye /
V05bhivin_u:5318: bhagavaty āghāta iti na ca āghātavastūni asthānaprakopadaśamāni /
V05bhivin_u:5319: apratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāriteneti na ākāravantena darśanena na ākāravantena śramaṇena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeyā ti avadhyāpeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5320: yāvat prajñaptiḥ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5322: bhikṣur api duḥśrutena dur avadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5324: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnām evam vadeya yadāham ārye amukaṃ kulaṃ upasamkramāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5325: tato itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto 'pratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ // 9 //
V05bhivin_u:5329: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya mahātmehi kulehi dvārakoṣṭhakehi tiṣṭhati /
