V05bhivin_u:5331: praviśantu āryāḥ praviśantu āryamiśrāḥ asmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati /
V05bhivin_u:5332: agrapiṇḍan tāvad dattvā yuṣmākaṃ prathamānām eva paścād ātmanā paribhuñjiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:5340: surābhrastā yānā gardabhāḥ nagnāḥ ahrīkāḥ anotrāpiṇo mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ vinipatitāḥ praviśatha yuṣmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati /
V05bhivin_u:5341: yuṣmākam agrapiṇḍan tāvad dattvā prathamānām eva paścād ātmānaṃ paribhokṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:5346: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5355: duṣkṛtan te nande yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ kulamātsaryaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:5356: tena hi na kṣamati kulamātsaryaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:5357: tena hi na kṣamati kulamātsaryaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5358: atha khalu bhagavān māhāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5361: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kulamātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5363: kulamātsaryan ti āvaraṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5366: yadi tāvad bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā pṛcchati bhūto guṇo vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5367: atha dāni anyatīrthikā pṛcchanti mā ete mithyādṛṣṭiṃ grāhayiṣyantīti bhṛkuṭiṃ karoti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5368: bhikṣur api kulamātsaryaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5370: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kulamātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ / ḷṃ // uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5380: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca āgārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāh /
V05bhivin_u:5384: so dāni tāye kānicit pūrvacaritāni jalpati strīutsadadauṣṭhulyāni yāni tasyā amanaāpāni /
V05bhivin_u:5390: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5396: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ paribhāṣituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5398: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośayed roṣayed paribhāṣayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5401: ākrośayed iti akāraśakāraekāraiḥ roṣayet paribhāṣayet caṇḍālu /
V05bhivin_u:5403: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ roṣituṃ paribhāṣitum /
V05bhivin_u:5405: atha bhikṣuṇyā pitā vā bhrātā jñātiko vā pravrajitako bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:5406: so ca bhavati uddhato unnaḍo asamāhito labhyā dāni so vaktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5410: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā tvaṃ śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5413: idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yadā maṇḍaladvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5414: bhikṣuṇāpi bhikṣuṇīyo na kṣamati sammukham ākrośituṃ muṇḍastrī veśyastrī ti /
V05bhivin_u:5416: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ samukham ākrośati pācattikaṃ //1 //
V05bhivin_u:5420: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni ekavarṣā dvivarṣā yāvat ṣaṭvarṣā upasthāpenti /
V05bhivin_u:5422: tā indragavā iva vardhanti śivacchagalā viya vardhanti /
V05bhivin_u:5423: anākalpasampannā anīryapathasampannā na jānanti katham upādhyāyinīye pratipattavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5430: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5435: etad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:5438: tena hi na kṣamati ūnadvādaśodakavarṣāya upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5439: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5440: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5441: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5443: ūnadvādaśavarṣā ti ūnadvādaśavarṣā nāma ūnadvādaśodakavarṣo ūnadvādaśo samvatsaro ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5445: ūnadvādaśodakavarṣo atireko dvādaśo samvatsaro ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5452: akṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi upasampādeti ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5456: hemante upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5458: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyām upasampādeti pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5459: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5461: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5462: bhikṣur api ūnadvādaśavarṣo upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5464: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5470: tena dāni kālena tena samayena ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:5475: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5478: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:5481: tena hi na kṣamati anaṅgopetāya upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5482: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5484: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati sā ca anaṅgopetā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5486: sā ca anaṅgopetā iti aṅgopetā nāma yasyā daśāṅgāni samvidyante saṃyathaīdaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5499: pratibalā bhavaty āpattim āpannāṃ vyutthāpayitum vā vyutthāpāyayitum vā //
V05bhivin_u:5501: pratibalā bhavaty āpadāsu vyupakarṣayituṃ vā vyupakarṣāpayitum vā //
V05bhivin_u:5503: pratibalā bhavati gilānam upasthihitum vā upasthāpayitum vā //
V05bhivin_u:5506: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni samvidyante iyam ucyate aṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:5511: sā eṣā anaṅgopetā pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5513: bhikṣur api anaṅgopeto pravrājayati upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5515: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati sā ca anaṅgopetā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ // 3 //
V05bhivin_u:5521: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetāyo upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5523: asty eṣā dvādaśavarṣā na punar jñāyate /
V05bhivin_u:5525: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5530: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā bhikṣunī dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:5532: yaciṣyati āryamiśrikā itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetā upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ saṃghaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5533: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5538: sādhu bata me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsammutin detu /
V05bhivin_u:5543: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:5548: tāye saṃgho itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutin deti /
V05bhivin_u:5549: yāsām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsammutin dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5554: dinnā aryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsammuti saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5555: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5556: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5557: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati aṅgopetā sā ca asammatā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5558: aṅgopetā iti daśabhir aṅgehi bhikṣuṇī aṅgopetā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:5561: anaṅgopetā ca asammatā tam ca se karma kurvanti jñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ evam eṣā asammatā /
V05bhivin_u:5563: sā eṣa bhikṣuṇī asammatā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5566: pūra dvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati aṅgopetāsā ca asammatā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //4 //
V05bhivin_u:5570: yā sā kālīya bhikṣuṇīya triyantarā lecchavidhītā pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:5572: pratitālakehi pratikuñcikāhi ca paravihārān udghāṭiya āgārikehi parivrājakehi ca saha tiṣthati /
V05bhivin_u:5575: kim imāya duḥśīlāya pratitālakinīya puruṣasahāyikāya upasthāpitāya /
V05bhivin_u:5576: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5579: bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:5582: naiṣa kāli dharmo yāvad eva nāmā tvaṃ duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:5583: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5584: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5585: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5587: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:5589: pratitālakinīti pratitālakehi pratikuñcikāhi ca anyātakān vihārakān udghāṭayati /
V05bhivin_u:5591: āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
V05bhivin_u:5592: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ yā dāni eṣā āgārikehi parivrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati sā na kṣamati upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5593: atha dāni śaknoti brahmacaryaṃ saṃpādayituṃ labhyā tato saṃsargāto vivecayitvā upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5594: bhikṣur api jānan duḥśīlaṃ śrāmaṇeraṃ strīsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ apratyosārāyetvā upasampādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5596: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī duḥśilāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //5 //
V05bhivin_u:5602: na jānanti katham upādhyāyīye pratipadyitavyaṃ yāvat saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipadyitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5603: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5607: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:5609: tena hi na kṣamati ūnaviṃativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5610: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5611: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ upasthāpayet pācatikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5612: ūnaviṃśativarṣā ti ūnaviṃśodakavarṣo ūnaviṃśo samvatsaro ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5615: hemante jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti akṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5617: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5618: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti /
V05bhivin_u:5621: kumārībhūtām etām ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvā ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāyo pācattikam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5623: tām etām ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ eka ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti ekā pūrasamjñinīyo /
V05bhivin_u:5624: yā ūnasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti tāyo pācattikam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5627: ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvāyo ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāsām anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5629: pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvāyo ūnaviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvā vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5631: pūraviṃśativarṣām ekā ūnaviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo ekā pūraviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti /
V05bhivin_u:5635: pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvā pūrasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāsām anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5641: yā eṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasampadaṃ sā dāni samanugrahitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5645: atha dāni te pi na jānanti pṛcchitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5650: na uddhikasya vā citrikasya vā vaśena gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5653: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //6 //
V05bhivin_u:5658: na kṣamati ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām upasthāpayitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:5659: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām adeśitaśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5661: ko jānāti pūraviṃśativarṣā vā eṣā na vā ti /
V05bhivin_u:5662: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5667: tāya saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5670: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5671: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yāceyyā /
V05bhivin_u:5672: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ saṃghaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5673: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5676: aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5678: sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣāpadāni sammutiṃ detu /
V05bhivin_u:5681: iyam itthannamā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5682: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:5683: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:5686: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5687: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:5688: tasyāḥ saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varsāṇī śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ deti /
V05bhivin_u:5689: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5694: dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiḥ samghena /
V05bhivin_u:5695: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5696: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmāntrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5697: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5706: taṃ ca se karma kurvanti jñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5718: asty eṣā deśitaśikṣā na jñāyate paripūraśikṣā vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:5719: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5721: tena hi na kṣamati deśitaśikṣām api aparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5722: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5724: deśitaśikṣā pi ca bhavati kumārībhūtā tāṃ cāparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5726: deśitaśikṣā tañ ca se karma kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:5727: jñaptisampannaṃ gaṇasampannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāsampannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena anupakliṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5729: aparipūraśikṣā ti aṣṭādaśahi varttehi dve varṣāṇi aśikṣitaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5730: katamehi aṣṭādaśahi sarvabhikṣuṇīnāṃ navikety ādi pūrvavat yathā gurudharmeṣu /
V05bhivin_u:5731: na ca tāye kṣamati ekākinīya grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5732: atha khu bhikṣuṇīya vā śramaṇerīya vā saha piṇḍāya praviśitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5734: yadi sā aṣṭānām anyatarānyarāpattim āpadyati punaḥ śikṣā deśitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5735: ekānnaviṃśatim ārabhya sarvaṃ duṣkṛtena kārāpayitavyā yāni ūnakāni dve varṣāṇi śikṣati sāparipūraśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5745: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo viṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ deṣitaśikṣāṃ paripūraśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5748: no tu jānāma paripūraśikṣā vā na vā ti /
V05bhivin_u:5749: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5752: tena hi yā eṣā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ tāya saṃgho upathāpanāsammutiṃ yācitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5754: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5755: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsammutiṃ yāceyyā /
V05bhivin_u:5756: yāciṣyati āryā saṃgho iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsammutiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5757: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5760: aham itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā desitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5762: sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsammutiṃ detu /
V05bhivin_u:5763: evaṃ dvir api trir api yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5765: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5767: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ samgho itthannāmāye upasthāpanāsammutiṃ dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:5770: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5773: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye viṃśativarṣāye upasthāpanāsammutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5777: dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye viṃśativarṣāye kumārībhūtāye deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāya upasthāpanāsammutiḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5778: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5779: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5780: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5781: [1] paripūraśikṣā pi ca bhavati tāṃ cāsaṃmatām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5782: paripūraśikṣā pi ca bhavatīti aṣṭādaśavarttehi dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5783_0: tāṃ cāsaṃmatām iti asaṃmatā evam asaṃmatā aparipūraśikṣā pi asaṃmatā tam ca se karma
V05bhivin_u:5783_1: karonti prajñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5788: / [2] pūraviṃśativarṣā pi ca bhavati kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā ca paripūraśikṣā ca /
V05bhivin_u:5793: tā dāni śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo kolīyakanyāyo gṛhicaritāyo pravrajitāyo paṭu kāyo uccakṣukāyo kṣipraniśāntikāyo /
V05bhivin_u:5795: labhyā dāni bhagavan ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5803: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5804: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5805: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5809: yā eṣā gṛhicaritā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ sā tāya anugrāhitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5813: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //10 //
V05bhivin_u:5827: na kṣamati ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:5828: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5830: ko jānāti pūradvādaśavarṣā vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:5831: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5833: yathā kumāribhūtāya aṣṭādaśavarṣāya dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutir yācitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5836: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati gṛhicaritā tāṃ cādeśitaśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //1 //
V05bhivin_u:5848: āryamiśrikāyo yato haṃ pravrajitā nāmabhijānāmy ahaṃ etad dharmam pratiṣevituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5849: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5852: na eṣā jānāty etaṃ dharma pratiṣevituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5854: yā dāni eṣā īdṛśī bhavati na kṣamati upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5855: atha khalu yadi tāvad dārikāṃ janayati yadā stanikā gṛhān nirgatā bhavati tato upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5856: atha dārakaṃ janayati yadā ayaṃ stanībhūto bhavati tato upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5857: atha dāni tāye sālohito bhavati jñātiko vā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5858: vayaṃ etan dārakam upasthāsyāma iti upasaṃpādayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5859: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5862: deśitaśikṣā pi ca bhavati gṛhicaritā nāṃ aparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //2 //
V05bhivin_u:5867: na kṣamati ūnadvādaśavarṣām gṛhicaritām upasthāpayitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:5868: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritāṃ deśitaśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5870: asty eṣā deśitaśikṣā na tu jānāma paripūraśikṣa vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:5871: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5873: yathā kumārībhūtāye yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:5879: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpiya upasthāpiya nāvavadanti nānuśāsanti /
V05bhivin_u:5880: tāyo dāni indragavā iva vardhanti yāvat kathaṃ saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipattavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5883: duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evañ ca nāmā yūyaṃ upasthāpayitvā nāvavadatha nānuśāsatha /
V05bhivin_u:5884: tena hi dve varṣāṇi ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5885: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5887: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāvavadeya nānuśāsayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5893: nāvavaded iti abhidharme vā abhivinaye vā /
V05bhivin_u:5896: nānuśāsed iti ācāram akurvantīm anācāraṃ kurvantīṃ na nirddhameyā na daṇḍakarma dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5897: atha dāni sā upasthāpitā durvacā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā nirddhamitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5898: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihārinaṃ nāvāvadati nānuśāsati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5900: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāvavaden nānuśāset pācattikaṃ //4 //
V05bhivin_u:5904: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:5910: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5916: duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ nāma yūyam upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchatha /
V05bhivin_u:5917: tena hi upasthāpitāya upasthāyikā dve varṣāṇi anubandhitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5918: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5919: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5920: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇi nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5926: nānubandhed iti yena gacchati tena na gacchati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5928: atha dāni sā upasthāyikā aśikṣākāmā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā /
V05bhivin_u:5930: sā me brahmacaryāntarāyo bhaveya dṛṣṭvānukṛtim āpadyantīyeti anyena gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5932: bhikṣur api upādhyāyaṃ dve varṣān nopasthihati nānubandhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5934: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇī nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ //5 //
V05bhivin_u:5940: kin nu khalv etaṃ labhyaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5944: tena hi na kṣamati anuvarṣam upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5946: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5951: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayeti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5954: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī kṛtapuṇyā bhavati ekaṃ varṣaṃ śikṣā deśayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5958: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayet pācattikam //6 //
V05bhivin_u:5963: sā antevāsinīṃ bhikṣuṇīhi upasaṃpādīyāna sthūlanandāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āha /
V05bhivin_u:5964: ārye mama antevāsinī upasampādyā sādhu ārye āryamiśrikānāṃ gaṇaṃ paryeṣehi /
V05bhivin_u:5968: tāya dāni aparaṃ divasaṃ bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ gaṇaṃ samudānayitvā upasaṃpādayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:5969: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo majāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5971: duṣkṛtaṃ te jete evan nāma tvaṃ ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:5973: tena hi na kṣamati gaṇam avajānituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5976: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5980: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayen na bhikṣugaṇena pārājikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5984: atha khalu pratikṛty eva tāva bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇo samudānayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5985: atha dāni anye bhadrakāḥ anye abhadrakāḥ tathā kartavyaṃ yathā bhadrottarāṇi karmāṇi bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:5987: atha dāni gaṇam avajānāti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5988: atha dāni senābhayaṃ vā bhavati paracakrabhayaṃ vā nagaroparodho vā kiñcāpi pārivāsikinīm upasthāpayety anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5990: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ pārivāsikīnīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //7 //
V05bhivin_u:5994: yā sā kālīya triyantarā lecchavidhītā upasthāpitā /
V05bhivin_u:5995: sā dāni āgārikehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
V05bhivin_u:5997: ārye kāli yā dāni upasthāpitā tvaṃ jānāsi āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca saṃṣṛṣṭāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5998: kim arthaṃ na vyapakarṣasi na vyapakarṣāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:5999: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6001: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
V05bhivin_u:6002: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathārūpāsu āpadāsu na vyapakarṣen na vyapakarṣāpayed antaśaḥ ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6006: tathārūpāsu āpadāsū ti svayam vā pratyodhāvitukāmā jñātikā vā pratyodhāvayitukāmā anyehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6007: na vyupakarṣatīti svayaṃ na vyupakarṣāpayatīti parehi /
V05bhivin_u:6008: antamasato ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca paramaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6011: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye sārdham vihāriṇī vā antevāsinī vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati vyapakarṣitavyā vā vyapakarṣāpayitavyā vā cārikāya varṇo bhāṣitavyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6012: atha dāni jarādurbalāvā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti anyāhi bhikṣuṇīhi vyakpakarṣayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6016: yadā vayaṃ taruṇīyo āsi evam asmābhir aṭitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6017: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihāriṃ utkaṇṭhitan na vyapakarṣayati na vyapakarṣāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6019: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathārūpāsv āpadāsu na vyapakarṣayet na vyapakarṣāpayet antamasato ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ //81 //
V05bhivin_u:6025: tā indragavā viya vardhanti śivacchagalā viya vardhanti /
V05bhivin_u:6028: sā dāni bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpitena yaṃ āryāmevaṃ vaktavyā anuśāsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6030: kiṃ bhadrāyiṇīyo irṣyāpathā mama parṣām upasthāpayantīyo /
V05bhivin_u:6031: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6033: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ kṣiyādharmam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:6034: tena hi na kṣamati kṣiyādharmam āpadyituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6035: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:6038: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam ucyamānā /
V05bhivin_u:6040: yaṃ āryā evam vaktavyā anuśāsitavyety uktā samānā kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6043: kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye ti daśahi aṅgehi samanvāgatā aṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:6049: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni na samvidyante sā bhavati anaṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:6050: kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya ti vivācayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6051: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yucyamānā kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6052: bhikṣur api bhikṣūhi vucyamāno kim punar āyuṣmato anaṅgopetasya upasthāpiteneti kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6054: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evaṃ vucyamānā kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti uktā kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ //9 //
V05bhivin_u:6059: sādhu me ārye nande upasaṃpādaya māṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6064: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6072: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evaṃ vādet /
V05bhivin_u:6073: yadā pūraśikṣā bhaviṣyasi tato ham upasthāpayiṣyan ti vaditvā naivopasaṃpādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6076: śikṣamāṇeti aṣṭādaśehi varttehi dve varṣāṇi deśtitaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:6077: evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:6079: atha dāni na pratibalā bhavati anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6080: atha dāni naivātmanā upasthāpayati nāpy anyāṃ adhyeṣayati na visarjayati /
V05bhivin_u:6082: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām uktvā ahan te upasthāpayiṣyan ti paścān nopasampādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ //10 //
V05bhivin_u:6086: atha bhadrā kāpileyī caturyuktaṃ yānam abhiruhitvā jñātikulaṃ gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:6089: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6091: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yānam abhiruhyet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6094: tā dāni śākīyakanyāḥ kolīyakanyāḥ lecchavikanyāś ca prakṛtisukumārāḥ pravrajitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6096: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6099: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6100: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6102: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ gilānāye /
V05bhivin_u:6103: glānyaṃ nāma jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā prakṛtisukumārā vā na śaknoti pada āgacchantu idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6104: yānan nāma hastiyānaṃ aśvayānam uṣṭrayānaṃ goyānaṃ gardabhayānaṃ nāvāyānaṃ śivikāyānaṃ yānayānam eva aṣṭamaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6107: yatra uṣṭrā vā goṇā vā yuktā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:6109: yahiṃ uṣṭrīyo vā goṇīyo vā yuktā bhavanti tahiṃ āruhitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6110: atha dāni asaṃjñikā bhavati na strīṃ na puruṣaṃ jānāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6111: atha dāni nāvāya aparāt param uttaraty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6112: ūrdhvaṅgāminīyam vā adhogāminīyam vā pratyayo adhiṣṭhihitavyo mā mariṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:6113: bhikṣur api agilāno yānamabhiruhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6116: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ /rā //
V05bhivin_u:6120: bhadrā kāpileyī chatreṇa gṛhītena upānahābhyām ābaddhābhyāṃ jñātikulaṃ gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:6122: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā adyāpīyaṃ pravrajitā pi mahacchandā /
V05bhivin_u:6123: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6128: tā dāni śākīyakanyāḥ lecchavikumārāḥ pravrajitā gacchantīyo ātapena dahyante /
V05bhivin_u:6129: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6132: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6134: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattir gilānāye /
V05bhivin_u:6136: jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā va prakṛtisukumārā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6138: chatropānaha iti chatran nāma bhūrjachatraṃ tālachatraṃ veṇuchatraṃ parṇachatraṃ cailachatram /
V05bhivin_u:6142: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatran dhāreti na upānahāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6143: upānahān dhāreya na chatraṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6146: bhikṣur api picumastakādi chatraṃ dhāreti saṃpuṭām vā anirmokāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6148: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6153: teṣāṃ śayyā āstṛtapratyāstṛtā dvikaḍevara trikaḍevarehi niśreṇīya āruhyati /
V05bhivin_u:6157: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6160: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:6163: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdasi abhinipadyasi /
V05bhivin_u:6164: tena hi na kṣamati atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdituṃ vā abhinipadyitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:6165: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6166: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6169: mañce vā pīṭhe vā ti caturdaśa mañcāḥ caturdaśa pīṭhāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6171: abhinipadyeya vā ti śayyāṃ kalpayet pācatikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6173: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sakṛn niṣaṇṇā divasaṃ pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6174: atha puno puno niṣīdati tāvatyaḥ pācattikāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6175: atirekapramāṇaṃ bhūmau nikhanitvā upaviśati vā nipadyati vā anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6176: bhikṣur api atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā niṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6178: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ //2 //
V05bhivin_u:6182: tā dāni ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo ekāstaraṇaprāvaraṇāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6183: tāyo mañcāṃ bhañjanti biśikāṃ pāṭenti caturasrakāṃ pāṭenti /
V05bhivin_u:6184: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6189: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekāstaraṇaprāvaraṇāṃ sahaśayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6193: śeyyā ti paṅgulamañco paṅgulapīṭho yāvat kaṭakilañjādayo /
V05bhivin_u:6198: trihi pīṭhehi dvihi janāhīti pādāṃ prāsārayantīhi tathā prasārayitavyāḥ yathā anyamanyasya jānukā nākrameyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6200: tiryak prajñaptāyā tṛhi janehi śayitavyaṃ pāṭiyakapāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi yathā caturasrake yathā pīṭhe /
V05bhivin_u:6201: atha dāni tṛṇādi saṃstaro bhavati na kṣamati atibahuṃ ākramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6202: atha khu nirmuṣṭikaṃ samaṃ prajñāpayitavyaṃ pāṭiyakapāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi /
V05bhivin_u:6203: atha dāni śītam bhavati svakasvakāny antarīkaraṇāni kṛtvā ekaṃ saṃcelī kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6204: bhikṣur api sahaśayyāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6206: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sahaśayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //3 //
V05bhivin_u:6210: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī sāṃghike vihāre śayyāsanaṃ rundhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:6212: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo yathāvṛddhikāya utthāpīyanti tasmin vihāre sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6214: kim asya dāni sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ nirundhiya cārikāṃ prakramīyati /
V05bhivin_u:6216: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6219: etad eva pṛcchiyati yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:6221: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakaramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6222: tena hi na kṣamati sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsarivtā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6223: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6224: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6226: sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanan ti mañcam vā pīṭham vā bisikām vā caturasrakām vā kuccam vā bimbohanam vā /
V05bhivin_u:6228: cārikāṃ prakrameyā ti anyatra gacchet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6229: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6230: prakramantīya vaktavyaṃ yathā paliguddhaṃ śayanāsanaṃ niḥsarāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:6232: atha dāni ekavastuko saṃghārāmo bhavati aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6234: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ /ṇàüka //
V05bhivin_u:6246: kas tāvad atra doṣo 'yaṃ dāni ahaṃ anyadāpi anyadāpi snāpayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:6249: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6251: sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6257: duṣkṛtan te gartodaramāte yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī pūrve apratisamviditā anāhūtā upasamkramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6258: tena hi na kṣamati yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:6259: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sabhikṣukaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ pūrve apratisamviditā anāhūtā upasamkrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6261: sabhikṣukan ti antamasato yahiṃ ekabhikṣur api bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6262: saṃghārāman ti āraṇyakam vā grām'antikam vā /
V05bhivin_u:6268: etā dāni yo bhikṣuṇīyo pariveṇaṃ gacchanti dvārakoṣṭhake sthitvā nivedayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6270: tenāpi dāni bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo jānāpayitavyā mā dāni bhikṣū viprakaṭā bhaveṃsū ti /
V05bhivin_u:6271: yadi viprakaṭā bhonti mṛttikākarmeṇa vā iṣṭakākarmeṇa vā /
V05bhivin_u:6284: bhikṣur api apratisaṃvidito bhikṣunīupāśrayaṃ praviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6285: atha khu dvārakoṣṭhake sthitvā acchaṭikā kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6287: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sabhikṣukaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ pūrve apratisaṃviditā anāhūtā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ //tṛ //
V05bhivin_u:6291: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ carantīyo grāmavāsake vāsam upagatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6292: tehi dāni aparā strī vipravastapatikā uktā /
V05bhivin_u:6298: kaḥ punar evaṃ jñāsyati āgamiṣyati vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:6299: tāya dinno pratiśrayo tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratikrāntānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6301: so dāni khāditvā pibitvā kleśe pīḍito bhāryāya sārdhaṃ mśrībhūto /
V05bhivin_u:6302: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo tena śabdena pratibuddhāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6303: yā dāni avigatarāgāḥ tāsām asparśasaṃjñā utpannā /
V05bhivin_u:6304: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6312: evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ jānantīyo saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjāsanaṃ śayyāṃ kalpayatha /
V05bhivin_u:6316: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ carantīyo anyatarasmiṃ grāmavāsake vāsam upagatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6317: tāyo dāni sarvagrāmam aṇvitāḥ na kahiñcid apuruṣaṃ gṛhaṃ labhanti /
V05bhivin_u:6318: tā dāni rathyāyāṃ pratikrāntāḥ rātrau vātavṛṣṭir utthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6320: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6327: imaṃ gṛhaṃsuḥ imaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśatha dhūrtakānām iha bhayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6331: na kṣamati sapuruṣake gṛhe śayyāṃ kārayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6332: tāyo tahiṃ rātrau dhūrtakehi viheṭhitāḥ tatrānyatarā brahmacaryāto cyāvitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6333: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6336: yā puna bhikṣunī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjeśayyāṃ kalpayed anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6337: tatrāyaṃ samayo vātasamayo vṛṣṭisamayo puruṣāśaṅkitasamayo ayam atra samayo //
V05bhivin_u:6339: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:6340: saṃbhojanīyan ti strīyā puruṣo bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6341: kulan ti brāhmakulaṃ yāvad rājakulaṃ yāni vā punar anyāny api kāñcit kulāni /
V05bhivin_u:6342: anupakhajja nāma vāsavastu yahiṃ bhāryāpatikā pratikramanti /
V05bhivin_u:6344: anyatra samaya iti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padam anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6353: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jānantīye saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajje śayyāṃ kalpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6354: atha dāni jñāyate ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ śrāddho ālaptako vā kiñcāpi anupakhajjo śayyāṃ kalpayanti anāpakhajjo śayyāṃ kalpayati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6356: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajje śayyāṃ kalpayed anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6362: bhikṣū dāni vaiśālīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ śrāvastīṃ prasthitāḥ bhagavato pādāvandāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6363: bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ bhikṣū kila bhagavato pādavandā gamiṣyantīti /
V05bhivin_u:6365: vandāmy ārya śruṇomaḥ āryamiśrāḥ śrāvastīyaṃ gamiṣyanti bhagavataḥ pādavandā /
V05bhivin_u:6371: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye saha adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyitum /
V05bhivin_u:6376: tāyo ekadvikāya divasāni gaṇayanti tadaho gamiṣyantīti /
V05bhivin_u:6377: tāyo dāni prakṛtyeva kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā pātracīvaram ādāya mārge sthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6378: te ca bhikṣavo tāṃ velāṃ prasthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6380: āyuṣmanto imāyo tāyo bhaginīyo śīghraśīghraṃ gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6384: tahiṃ dāni yā bhikṣuṇīyo taruṇīyo balavantīyo tāhi te bhikṣū anujavitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6385: yā taṃhi jarādurbalāyo vyādhidurbalāyo prakṛtisukumārāyo tāyo ce ehi muṣitāḥ paripiṭṭitāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:6386: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6388: evaṃ ca nāma tave tirorājyan tirojanapadaṃ asārthikā prakramatha /
V05bhivin_u:6389: tena hi na kṣamati tirorājyāṃ tirojanapadam asārthikā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6391: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirorājyaṃ tirojanapadaṃ asārthikā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6395: asārthikā ti sālo nāma gṛhi sārtho vā pravrajitasārtho vā śakaṭasārtho vā paryeṣitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:6398: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī asārthikā cārikāṃ prakramati /
V05bhivin_u:6401: samaṃ prasthitāḥ viṣamaṃ praviśanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6402: viṣamaṃ prasthitāḥ samaṃ praviśanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6404: viṣamaṃ prasthitāḥ viṣamaṃ praviśanti pācattikam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6405: bhikṣur api asārthiko sabhayaṃ sapratibhayaṃ sāśaṅkasammataṃ mārga pratipadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6407: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirorājyan tirojanapadam asārthikā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ // grā //
V05bhivin_u:6411: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni strībhiḥ saha udyānabhūmiṃ nirgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6413: tatra bhikṣuṇyaḥ strīveṣeṇa caṅkramanti ārāmagṛhakāni vanagṛhakāni citragṛhakāni nīrīkṣantīyo /
V05bhivin_u:6414: tāyo dāni gūḍhe pradeśe puruṣehi viheṭhitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6415: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6417: antorājyaṃ kaṃ pi ca bhavati antorāṣṭraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6418: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakāni vā vanagṛhakāni vā citragṛhakāni vā darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6421: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakānīti ete dāni bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:6422: caṃpakārāmā vā panasārāmā vā atimuktakārāmā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6424: nyagrodhavanā vā drākṣāvanā vā kadalīvanā vā dāḍimavanā vā mātuluṅgavanā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6425: citragṛhakānīti ete bhavanti sabhā vā kūṭāgārā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6429: na kṣamati ārāmagṛhaṃ vā vanagṛhaṃ vā citragṛhaṃ vā darśanāya gantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6432: atha dāni tatraiva strībhiḥ saha cañcūryate anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6433: bhikṣur api ārāmagṛhaṃ vā vanagṛhaṃ vā citragṛhaṃ vā darśanāya gacchati yatra kāmopabhoginaḥ krīḍanti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6435: antorājyaṃ kaṃpi ca bhavati antorāṣṭraṃ pi /
V05bhivin_u:6436: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakāni vā vanagṛhakāni vā citragṛhakāni vā darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ //8 //
V05bhivin_u:6440: sujātā nāma bhikṣuṇī āyuṣmato udāyiṣya purāṇadvitīyā /
V05bhivin_u:6444: yadā tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo gocaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ tadāyuṣmān udāyī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā pātracīvaram ādāya tahiṃ praviṣṭo /
V05bhivin_u:6445: te dāni vihārasya paścāt vastuke ambarīyakeṇa niṣaṇṇā raktacittā karmaṇyenāṅgajātena anyamanyasya aṅgajātāni nidhyāyattā āsanti /
V05bhivin_u:6446: aparā dāni bhikṣuṇī mahallikā uccārakarmāya vā prasrāvakarmāya vā paścād vastukaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:6449: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6453: duṣkṛtan te sujātike yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6454: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6456: ekā ekeneti sā ca bhavati anyo ca tatra bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:6457: supto matto unmattotkṣiptacitto vedanābhinno uttānaśayyāko amānuṣo tiryagyonigato /
V05bhivin_u:6465: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ sakṛn nisaṇṇā divasam pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6466: atha dāni puno puno ucchati ca niṣīdati ca tattikā pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6467: atha dāni dve janā bhavanti eko vihāraṃ praviśati kasyacid arthāya bhikṣuṇīya śīghram utthihitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6468: nāpi dāni sahasrām ājāneya māṃ eṣā viheṭhayitukāmā ti /
V05bhivin_u:6476: so āsādanāya na mocanāya kettāvatā antareṇāpattir bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6478: atha dāni ākīrṇajanamanuṣyo bhikṣuṇī upāśrayo bhavati niṣkramanti ca praviśanti ca sthapativardhakicitrakarāḥ kiñcāpi tehi kalpiyakārehi āsati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6479: atha dāni rathyāmukhaṃ dvāraṃ bhavati avīciḥ striyo ca puruṣā ca gacchanti akiñcāpi tehi kalpiyakārehi āsati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6480: atha dāni antarāvīciḥ chinnā bhavati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6482: atha dāni dve bhūmake kalpiyakāro tiṣṭhati trayāṇām anyatamānyataraṃ paśyaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6483: tatra vāyo vā vemāntareṇa trayāṇām anyatamānyataraṃ paśyaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6488: kin ti dāni asti darśanopavicāro na śramaṇopavicāraḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6489: prākṛtena cakṣuṣā paśyati bhikṣur eṣo āsati bhikṣuṇī veti no tu prākṛtena śrotreṇa tayor āyaṃ śṛṇoti /
V05bhivin_u:6492: grāme vāraṇye vā rātrau vā divā vā channe vā abhyavakaśe vā ekasya na mahājane santike na dūre /
V05bhivin_u:6494: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //0 //
V05bhivin_u:6498: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatā bhrātṛkehi bhrātṛputrakehi mātulehi mātulaputrakehi sārdhaṃ ekā ekena saha tiṣṭhati /
V05bhivin_u:6499: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni piṇḍapātaṃ aṇvantīyo dṛṣṭvā ojjhāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6500: kin tāvad imāye pravrajitāye puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekāya ekena raho niṣīdituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6501: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6509: ekāye ekena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ raho niṣīdituṃ yāvad bhagavān aha /
V05bhivin_u:6510: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6512: puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekeneti sā ca bhavati yāvad evam apy eṣā ekā ekena /
V05bhivin_u:6515: pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇā divasan niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6518: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ //lṛṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6522: atha bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:6523: bhrātṛduhitṛputrehi mātulaputrehi saha anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati saṃlapati upakarṇakaṃ jalpati /
V05bhivin_u:6525: kin tāvad imāye pravrajitāye upakarṇakaṃ jalpitena /
V05bhivin_u:6527: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āhaṃsuḥ yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6528: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣena sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭheya vā saṃlapeya vā upakarṇam vā jalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6530: puruṣeṇa sārdham iti gṛhasthena vā pravrājitena vā /
V05bhivin_u:6535: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhatum vā samlapitum vā upakarṇakam vā jalpitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:6538: atha dāni guhyaṃ jalpitavyaṃ bhavati bhittim vā kuḍyam vā stambham vā vṛkṣam vā yamanikām vā antarīkṛtvā jalpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6539: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdham anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati vā saṃlapati vā upakarṇakam vā jalpati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6540: bhikṣur api striyā sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati vā saṃlapati vā upakarṇam vā jalpati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6542: yā puna bhikṣuṇīpuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya santiṣṭheya vā saṃlapeya vā upakarṇaṃ vā jalpeya pācattikaṃ //1 // uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6553: atha bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatvā putrabhrātṛbhāgineyānāṃ raho gatānāṃ andhakāre apratisamviditā sahasā chatti praviśati /
V05bhivin_u:6555: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye guatamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6559: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsaṃ andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6560: tena hi na kṣamati etad eva yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
V05bhivin_u:6561: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6563: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:6564: sapuruṣo ti yahiṃ puruso ti yahiṃ puruṣo bhaveya andhakāre apradīpiketi yahin na syāt tailapradīpo vā kaṇḍolkā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6565: upasaṃkrameya ti praviśeta pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6566: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikāya upasaṃkramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6567: atha dāni kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati yadi tahiṃ uccaśabdo bhavati praviśaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6568: atha dāni agnir na bhavati pratisaṃvedayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:6571: sa eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratisaṃvedayati nācchaṭikāṃ karoti upasaṃkramati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6572: bhikṣur api sastrīkam āvāsam andhakāre apratisaṃvidito upasaṃkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6574: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6578: tāyo dāni ṣaḍvargiṇo bhikṣuṇīyo giryagrasamājaṃ gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6579: tā dāni tahiṃ gatvā pṛthag mañca gṛhṇanti naṭo nāṭayati saprahāsaṃ vastupadā nāṭitam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6581: tāyo dāni tūṣṇīkās tiṣṭhanti yogācarā iva /
V05bhivin_u:6582: yadā praśāntam bhavati nāṭakam avatāritaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6587: te dāni vicakṣu kṛtā nelāṭikaṃ na prayacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6590: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6592: tena hi na kṣamati viśokadarśanāya gantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6593: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6594: yā punar bhikṣuṇī viśokadarśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6596: viśokam iti naṭanartanakasallamallapāṇisvarikāḥ kumbhabhūmīrāḥ antamasato yahiṃ catvāro pi janāḥ sannipatanti krīḍyārthaṃ tahiṃ darśanāya gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6599: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati devayānaṃ niṣkramantaṃ rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ niṣkrāntaṃ dāni śakyam akṣīṇi nimīlayituṃ kiñcāpi paśyati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6600: atha dāni ābhogaṃ karoti ime paśyāmi ito paśyāmīti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6601: atha dāni bhagavato mālyāropaṇaṃ bhavati upāsakopāsikā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6604: atha dāni tahiṃ kocic cittasya vikāro bhavati na kṣamati sthātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6605: bhikṣur api viśokadarśanāya gacchati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6607: yā puna bhikṣuṇī viśokadarśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6611_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam
V05bhivin_u:6611_1: āpannānāṃ viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupaśamāpayati
V05bhivin_u:6616: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayasi na vyupasamāpayasi na vyupasamanāyautsukyaṃ karosi /
V05bhivin_u:6619_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ
V05bhivin_u:6619_1: viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samanā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayen na vyupasamāpayen na vyupasamanāyautsukhyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6621: kalahajātānām iti vācākalahaṃ kurvantīnāṃ vātayuktaṃ mama yuktam ity ādi /
V05bhivin_u:6622: bhaṇḍanajātānām iti anyamanyaṃ mama ghaṭanaṃ kurvantīnāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6626: gurukā laghukā sapratikarmā apratikarmā sāvaśeṣā niravaśeṣā /
V05bhivin_u:6627: dharmakarma adharmakarma samagrakarma vyagrakarma yāvat sthānārhaṃ karma iti viharantīnāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6631: na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6632: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalahajātā bhaṇḍanajātā vigrahavivādam āpannā viharanti na dāni kṣamati tāyo adyupekṣituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6634: autsukyaṃ kartavyaṃ upasamanāya pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ parasparaṃ kṣamāpayitavyāḥ prāptakālaṃ yathārūpaṃ paribhāṣayitavyāḥ samagrīkartvyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6635: atha dāni na śaknoti anyā bhikṣuṇī adhyesitavyā udyojayitavyā upāsakopāsikāyo bhikṣubhikṣuṇīyo /
V05bhivin_u:6636: atha tāny adhikaraṇāni karkkaśāni bhavanti durvyupasamāni teṣām eva adhikaraṇānāṃ kālam āgamayati samayam āgamayati paripākam āgamayati /
V05bhivin_u:6637_0: kālaṃ ca samayam ca paripākaṃ cāgamya vyupaśamayaty anāpattiḥ bhikṣur api bhikṣūṇāṃ
V05bhivin_u:6637_1: kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍaṇajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānām viharantānāṃ vṛṣabho samāno
V05bhivin_u:6637_2: adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupasamāpayati na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ karoti
V05bhivin_u:6639_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ
V05bhivin_u:6639_1: viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayen na vyupasamāpayen na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ
V05bhivin_u:6643: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ nīyate udvartanāya snāpanāya gṛhapatinīhi nīyate /
V05bhivin_u:6644: vayam āryām udvartayāmaḥ snāpayiṣyāmaḥ asmākaṃ puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:6648: varṇalolāṃ udvartayanti kāleyakena tuṅgeyakena svaṅgakena padmakena gandhacūrṇehi /
V05bhivin_u:6652: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6656: evan nāma tvaṃ gṛhiṇīnām udvartnaparimardanasnāpanasammatena udvartāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:6658: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6659: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatāni tathārūpehi bhikṣuṇī agilānā udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6660: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnam iti kṣatriyakanyakānāṃ brāhmaṇakanyakānāṃ gṛhapatikanyakānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6661: udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatānīti kāleyakam vā tuṅgeyakam vā cikkasam vā /
V05bhivin_u:6662: yady eko vā tehi bhikṣuṇīhi agilānā udvartāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:6663: kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati udvartāpayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6665: atha dāni gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā bhavati labhyā bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6666: atha dāni pittasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā cikkasenāliṃpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6667: atha dāni vātasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā godhūmacikkasenāliṃpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6668: atha dāni sannipāto bhavati saṃyuktehi bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayitavyaṃ parimardāpayitavyaṃ āliṃpitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6669: tāya pi dāni āliṃpiya na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6672: bhikṣur api agilāno cikkasenodvartāpayet parimardāpayed vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6674: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayeta parimardāpayeta pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6678: bhagavatā dāni śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6679: sā dāni bhadrā bhikṣuṇīhi udvartāpayati parimardāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:6683: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6686: agilānā ti kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:6689: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayati na parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6693: bhikṣur api agilāno bhikṣuṇā udvartāpayati parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6695: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // phu //
V05bhivin_u:6700: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā śrāmaṇerīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // phu //
V05bhivin_u:6704: śikṣamāṇā nāma aṣṭādaśahi vartehi dve varṣāṇi śikṣamāṇā yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6706: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā śikṣamāṇāya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ //grā //
V05bhivin_u:6713: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā gṛhiṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // hrā //
V05bhivin_u:6724: yāvatikā kā viśuddhā ahan tāsām anyatamāsāṃ tatra nāgacchāmi /
V05bhivin_u:6725: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6730: tvañ ca nāma poṣadhan na satkaroṣi /
V05bhivin_u:6731: kā anyā satkariṣyati ko ca poṣadhasya satkāro /
V05bhivin_u:6734: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6735: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃagilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6737: anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ ti cāturdaśikena vā cāturdaśikaṃ pāñcadaśikena vā pāñcadaśikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6740: eṣā bhavati jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā śirāviddhikā vā bhavati asukhā bhaiṣajyaṃ vā pītam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6743: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā poṣadhan na gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:6744: gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6745: bhikṣur api agilāno naiva poṣadhaṃ gacchati na cchandan deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6747: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ agilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsan na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6764: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvargikāḥ ovādakavāraṃ na labhanti /
V05bhivin_u:6769: āyuṣmāṃ cchāriputraḥ sa khilo ca mṛduko ca /
V05bhivin_u:6771: na kṣamati asammatena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīyo ovadituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6773: te dāni niḥsīmaṃ gatvā anyamanyaṃ saṃmanyitvā kalyato yeva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatvā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6776: yāyo yogācārāyo bhikṣuṇīyo tāyo na sannipatanti /
V05bhivin_u:6778: kim artham vayam eṣām avinītānām avavādaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6779: te dāni tāhi saha muhūrtam antaraṃ kākavaṃhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6780: āyuṣmān dāni śāriputro kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā ānandena paścāc chramaṇena sārdhaṃ vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:6794: ovaditā vayam āryamiśrakehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena /
V05bhivin_u:6795: athāyuṣmān śāriputro vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto prakrānto /
V05bhivin_u:6796: bhagavān jānanto yeva pṛcchati kin dāni gautamī mātā śīghram āgato si /
V05bhivin_u:6799: ahaṃ bhagavan kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā yāvad bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭo ovadituṃ mayoktaṃ sannipatatha bhaginīyo ovādo bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:6801: yāyo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo tā na sannipatanti /
V05bhivin_u:6810: na vayam āgamiṣyāmaḥ ovaditā vayam āryamiśrikehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena /
V05bhivin_u:6811: ahaṃ pi bhagavan vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto sannirgato /
V05bhivin_u:6815: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:6818: duṣkṛtaṃ vo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:6819: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha māsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6823: bhikṣusaṃghe ovadopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6824: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā ghṛtapītikā vā bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6826: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na gacchati gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6827: yadā poṣadho bhavati tadā cchandahārikāhi bhikṣuvihāraṅ gatvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6828: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādāṃ cchirasā vandati poṣadhañ ca pratīcchati avavādaṃ ca yācati evaṃ trikkhatto yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6829: yadi tāvat kocid bhikṣuṇīovādako bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6831: atha na kocid bhavati yo taṃhi aṅgopeto bhavati so saṃmanyitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:6833: nāsti bhaginīyo bhikṣuṇīovādako apramādena saṃpādetha āpattiñ ca poṣadhaṃ pratijāgratha sagauravā ca bhavatha sthavirehi bhikṣūhi madhyehi navakehīti /
V05bhivin_u:6835: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhipoṣadhaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6839: jetāye bhikṣuṇīye saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam utpannaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6846: so dāni pāṭayitvā dhovāyitvā upanāhayitvā gato /
V05bhivin_u:6848: tāhi dāni so pradeśo dṛṣṭo pūyamrakṣito /
V05bhivin_u:6854: sāhasam āryāya kṛtaṃ saṃbādhe pradeśe śastrakarma kārayantīya /
V05bhivin_u:6855: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6859: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ śastrakarma kārāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:6862_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam
V05bhivin_u:6862_1: vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pātāpayed vā dhovāpayed
V05bhivin_u:6866: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyan ti bhikṣuṇī vaktavyo śastrakarma kārāpayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:6867: anavalokayitvā saṃghā ti saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6868: śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma kārāpeya /
V05bhivin_u:6869: kārāpayiṣyati āryā saṃgho itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma /
V05bhivin_u:6870: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:6871: puruṣeṇeti gṛhasthena vā pravrajitena vā pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpeya vā ti yathā jetā bhikṣuṇīti pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6872: atha dāni saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati antevāsinīye vā samānopādhyāyinīye vā samānācāryāye vā yasyā viśvāso tāya ākhyātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6873_0: kaṇṭakena vā nakhena vā bhedāpayitavyaṃ bhaiṣajyena vā ālimpāpeyatavyaṃ atha dāni
V05bhivin_u:6873_1: adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām bhavati gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa
V05bhivin_u:6873_2: pāṭāpayati vā dhovāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā evam śirām vā vedhāpayati nelāṭikam
V05bhivin_u:6873_3: vā bāhuśirām vā gulphaśirām vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ākramitavyā tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:6874_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam
V05bhivin_u:6874_1: vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed
V05bhivin_u:6878: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā sāṃghikaṃ vihāraṃ bandhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6879: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6883: duṣkṛtam te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ varṣopagatānāṃ cārikāṃ prakramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6884: tena hi na kṣamati varṣopagatāya cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6885: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6886: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6889: upagatā ti purimikāṃ paścimikām vā varṣopanāmayikāṃ upagatā /
V05bhivin_u:6890: cārikāṃ prakrāmeyā ti anyatra gaccheya grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6891: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ekarātram pi vipravasati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6892: atha dāni rājabhayam vā senābhayam vā paracakrabhayam vā jīvitāntarāyo vā brahmacaryāntarāyo vā bhaveya kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6893: nāsti bhikṣuṇyā avalokanākarma saptāhaṃ vā kiñcāpi bhikuḥ avalokanākarma kṛtvā saptāhaṃ vā adhiṣṭhiheya gacchaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6895: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ //3 //
V05bhivin_u:6899: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni śrāvastīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ vaiśālīm āgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6908: idṛśī ca idṛśī ca evam ārāmaramaṇīyā /
V05bhivin_u:6914: yadi pravrajyā eṣā pravrajyā iyaṃ punar asmākam āryadhītā ihaiva jātā /
V05bhivin_u:6916: naiva kahiñci gacchati kūpamaṇḍūka iva tiṣṭhati aniḥkramā /
V05bhivin_u:6917: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6919: tena hi varṣāvustāyā bhikṣuṇīya cārikā prakramitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6921: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6923: varṣoṣiteti vārṣikāṃ trayo māsān cārikāṃ na prakrameyā ti antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6924: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī evaṃ rātraṃ pi prakramati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6925: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti na pratibalā gantuṃ kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6926: bhikṣur api varṣāvusto cārikāṃ na prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6928: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ // ṇka //
V05bhivin_u:6932: sthūlanandāya bhikṣuṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī rājagṛhaṃ gacchamānī nivāritā /
V05bhivin_u:6933: ihāryāya varṣā vasitavyā tāya sā kulehi samvarṇitā /
V05bhivin_u:6934: āryā jetā bhadrikā guṇavatī anubaddhā tā saṃvṛtā ca /
V05bhivin_u:6935_0: etāya adhikāraṃ karotha sā dāni kulāni upasaṃkramati prāsādikena atikrāntena pratikrāntena
V05bhivin_u:6938: pratyālapanti pratyutthihenti nimantrayanti pātreṇa cīvareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:6939_0: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇi anākalpasaṃpannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi
V05bhivin_u:6939_1: pāṭitavipāṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍhehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā
V05bhivin_u:6940: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6941: sā dāni tāṃ udvahati kāyena vācā /
V05bhivin_u:6942: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6944: śabdāpayatha nandāṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyatīti yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:6945: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6946: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evam uktvā ihārye varṣaṃ vasitavyaṃ ity uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6948: bhikṣuṇīm evam vade ihārye varṣāṃ vasitavyam iti trayo māsāṃ uktveti nivārayitvā paścād udvaheya vā ti kāyena vā vācā vā svayaṃ udvahati /
V05bhivin_u:6949: udvāhāpeya vā ti pareṇa kāyena vā vācāya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6951: na kṣamati nivārayitvā paścād udvahituṃ atha bhavati śithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā vā kalahakārikā vā paśyati yadīha vaśiṣyati āśrayam utpādayiṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:6953: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm udvahati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6954: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇāṃ vā udvahati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6955: antamasato gṛhiṇī pi udvahati samvaragāmīvinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6956: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yevam vaditvā ihārye varṣam vasitavyan ti uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ // tṛ //
V05bhivin_u:6964: tatra ca bhikṣuṇīhi vihāroddeśaḥ śayanāsanoddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6976: sā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍā ti yatra śākhāni praveśayati /
V05bhivin_u:6980: bhadrāyaṇi kin tvayā vihāro kṛto kim vikrīto /
V05bhivin_u:6981: sāṃghiko vihāro kim arthaṃ na praveśayiṣyam /
V05bhivin_u:6983: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6984: yāvat śabdāpayatha kāliṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā /
V05bhivin_u:6989: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācāya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6991: jānantīti svayaṃ vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:6996: vā ti pareṇa kāyeṇa vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6998: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇām vā udvahati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7001: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ // phu //
V05bhivin_u:7005: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya uccāramallakaṃ apratyavekṣitvā rathyāyāṃ choritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7006: tahiṃ dāni aparo brāhmaṇo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro tāya rathyāya atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:7009: janena copahāsitaṃ brāhmaṇa susnātaḥ suviliptas tvam iti /
V05bhivin_u:7012: itikitikāya dhīte śramaṇike na paśyasi mama śīrṣaṃ vastrāṇi ca viṣṭhena vināśitāni /
V05bhivin_u:7013: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7017: duskṛtan te evan nāma tvam apratyavekṣiya choresi /
V05bhivin_u:7018: tena hi na kṣamati apratyavekṣiya chorayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7019: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7020: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prāsrāvam vā kheṭakam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣitvā chorayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7022: tirokuḍyan ti tiraḥprakāram uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā vastradhovanam vā bhāṇḍadhovanam vā keśān vā nakhān vā /
V05bhivin_u:7027: yadi tāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā rathyā bhavanti ārāmayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7028: atha dāni anākīrṇā bhavanti kiñcāpi chorayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7029: taṃ pi dāni na kṣamati aśabdakarṇikāye chorayituṃ api tu acchaṭikā dātavyā ukkāsitavyam vā /
V05bhivin_u:7030: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratyavekṣati nāpi acchaṭikāṃ dattvā chorayati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7031: bhikṣur api apratyavekṣya acchaṭikām akṛtvā chorayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7033: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣya choreya pācattikaṃ // grā //
V05bhivin_u:7038: rājño dāni prasenajitasya kośalasya pūrvakoṣṭhakaṃ nāma udyānam puṣkiriṇīsampannaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7039: anāvṛtaṃ bhikṣūnāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āvṛtaṃ itarāye janatāye /
V05bhivin_u:7041: ho bhaṇe ārāmika pūrvakoṣṭhakam udyānaṃ siktasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ karehi /
V05bhivin_u:7045_0: tāyo dāni pratikṛty eva gatvā tahiṃ haritaśādvalopastarāṇāyāṃ pakvakheṭena ca pakvasiṃghāṇakena
V05bhivin_u:7045_1: ca vināśayitvā padumapatrehi uccārasya puṭakāni bandhitvā puṣkiriṇīyaṃ pravāhayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7046: tāyo dāni divasaṃ tahiṃ kākāvāhāṃ bhañjiya sāyāhnasamaye nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ rājā dāni prasenajita kośalo aparejjukāto niragato sāntaḥpuro /
V05bhivin_u:7047: tāyo dāni antaḥpurikāyo kathañcid eva samrodhād avamuktā randhanamokṣam iva manyamānāḥ cañcūryante /
V05bhivin_u:7049: kāścid ito ca ito ca dhāvanti avakāśaṃ gṛhṇanti śādvalopastaraṇe paribhrāmanti /
V05bhivin_u:7050: tāsāṃ dāni pakvakheṭena pakvasiṃghāṇakena vastrāṇi vināśitāni /
V05bhivin_u:7053: tāsāṃ bhavati kulaputrakehi śrutaṃ śvo rājā sāntaḥpuro udyānaṃ pravekṣyatīti tehi ete gandhapuṭakāḥ pravāhitā iti kṛtvā tāyo gṛhṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:7054: te udakena klinnā uccāreṇa cā khāditāḥ prakṛtisukumāraṃ ca padmapatraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7056: hī hī viṣṭhaṃ tā dāni rājño upasaṃkrāntā āhaṃsu /
V05bhivin_u:7057: mahārāja eṣa tāvad īdṛśī avasthā rājā āha śabdāpayatha ārāmikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7060: ho bhaṇe ārāmika kena udyānaṃ viṭṭālitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7061: āha ṣaḍvargiṇīyo śramaṇīyo eva divasaṃ kākavāhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7064: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7065: mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayet / yāvad
V05bhivin_u:7066: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:7067: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:7073: harite tṛṇe iti śādvale acchinnālūnasmiṃ udan ti udakāni nāma daśa /
V05bhivin_u:7074: nādikaṃ tāḍāgaṃ audupānikaṃ śvabhrodakaṃ praghārimaṃ vṛṣṭisthitaṃ ucchodakaṃ antarīkṣapānīyaṃ himavilīnaṃ sāmudram vā uccāram vā prasrāvaṃ vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7075: atha dāni prāvṛṣeṇyā se sarvabhumiḥ śādvalopastareṇā bhavati yahiṃ pradeśe svalpaharitam bhavati tahiṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7076: atha dāni alpaharitaṃ na bhavati kaṭāhake vā iṣṭakāyam vā upale vā śuṣkatṛṇe vā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍe vā yatra vā anyena uccāro kṛto bhavati balīvardena vā /
V05bhivin_u:7077: yatra vā anyena manuṣyena kṛto tahiṃ kartavyaṃ atha dāni evaṃ na bhavati antamasato kanīyasiṃ pi aṅguliṃ upadrāhayitvā kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7078: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā tahim prathamam nipatati /
V05bhivin_u:7079: atha dāni caṅkramati na kṣamati haritaśādvale śleṣmaṃ chorayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7080: atha khu kaṭe vā patrapuṭikāyāṃ vā chorayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7082: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7083: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:7089: prajāpati detha cchandakaṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ bhaktaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7091: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ āryā yaṃ divasaṃ saṃghabhaktaṃ kariṣyatha tadāsmākam api ārocayetha /
V05bhivin_u:7094: āyuṣmanto śāriputramaudgalyāyanau aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo śroṇakoṭīviṃśa upavāno āyuṣmān rāhulo ṣaḍvargikāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:7097: tahiṃ dāni bhikṣū kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca praviṣṭāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7098: tato āyuṣmato śāriputrasya dātuṃ śālināmodanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ dadhi ca /
V05bhivin_u:7099: āyuṣmato maudgalyāyanasya yavakodano māṣasūpo tailaṃ ca /
V05bhivin_u:7102: apareṣāṃ vyañjanāni dinnāni odano na dīyate /
V05bhivin_u:7103: apareṣāṃ śākaṃ dinnaṃ odano na dīyate /
V05bhivin_u:7106: tā dāni striyo bhakṣyabhojyam ādāya gatāḥ pṛcchanti /
V05bhivin_u:7108: tāyo dāni sthavirān bhikṣūn āvaritvā ṣaḍvargikān darśenti /
V05bhivin_u:7109: tatas teṣān dīyate śālinā modanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7110: navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi gauḍan dadhi śvetaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ samitāsamitaṃ yasyārthaṃ yāv arthaṃ dīyati /
V05bhivin_u:7111: yat kiñcit praṇītasammataṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ peyaṃ coṣmaṃ taṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇān dāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:7112: ime te āryamiśrikāḥ bhikṣū pi bhuktavibhuktakāḥ utthāyotthāya bhagavataḥ pādavandā upasaṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:7114: api tu śāriputra śobhane māsi mṛṣṭam vā praṇītam vā prabhūtam vā /
V05bhivin_u:7120_0: labdho bhagavan śālināmodanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi vyañjanani gauḍan
V05bhivin_u:7120_1: dadhi kṣīraṃ yasyārthaṃ yāvad arthaṃ dīyati yathāpīdaṃ bhaginīnāṃ śraddhāprasannānāṃ parigrahe /
V05bhivin_u:7128: durbhuktaṃ te śāriputra evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viheṭhayantaṃ adhyupekṣasi /
V05bhivin_u:7129: yasya bhagavān durbhuktam ity āha tasya taṃ kalpam vā kalpāvaśeṣam vā tiṣṭheya naiva jarā gaccheya /
V05bhivin_u:7130: sthavireṇa kākapoṭaṃ dattvā sarva daradarāya vāntaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7136: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evam ca nāma yūyaṃ jānantīyo gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayatha /
V05bhivin_u:7138: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7139: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇataṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikam /
V05bhivin_u:7141: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:7143: lābham iti aṣṭa lābhāḥ yāvat kāliko yāmayāmiko yāvat kalpikākalpiko pariṇatan ti pariniṣpannaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7145: eṣa dāni kocid āgacchati deyadharmaṃ dātukāmo /
V05bhivin_u:7150_0: 252. ti / te dāni bhikṣū ṣaḍvargikāḥ sarpikehi sarpi tailakehi tailaṃ gauḍakehi guḍaṃ
V05bhivin_u:7150_1: mādhukehi madhuṃ mātsikehi matsyaṃ māṃsikehi māṃsaṃ dugdhikehi dugdhaṃ dodhikehi
V05bhivin_u:7152: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇo gautamo 'nekaparyāyeṇālpecchatāya varṇavādī yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7153: tasmād iha gautami bhikṣuṇībhir avi atraiva śikṣitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7155: ekam idam gautami samayaṃ tathāgato śākyeṣu viharati /
V05bhivin_u:7157: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7158_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmārthāya agilānā kulehi sarpiṃ vijñāpetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya
V05bhivin_u:7158_1: vā bhuñjeya vā pratideśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya asaṃpreyam me āryamiśrikā prātideśanikaṃ
V05bhivin_u:7169: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpatti gilānāya /
V05bhivin_u:7171: jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā tā virecanapītā vā śirāviddhā vā śleṣmā vā sannipātā vā /
V05bhivin_u:7172: kulehīti kṣatriyakulāni vā brāhmaṇakulāni vā yāni vā punar anyāny api kānicit kulāni /
V05bhivin_u:7173: sarpīti sarpin nāma gāviya māhiṣīye ajāye eḍakāya uṣṭrīya /
V05bhivin_u:7178: pratideśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya yāvad ayam dharmo prātideśaniko /
V05bhivin_u:7179: atha dāni pittasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā sarpi vijñāpetuṃ peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7180: atha dāni piṇḍapātam aṇvanti paśyati ghṛtaṃ vikrāyantaṃ na dāni vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7187: artho āryāya sarpiṇā yady arthikā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:7189: yadi pūraṃ pi pātraṃ labhati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7190: atha dāni aparā pi kācid bhavati labhyā pratyutpannaprāyeṇa (!)
V05bhivin_u:7193: yadi vātavikāro bhavati labhyā tailaṃ vijñapayituṃ taṃ pi dāni na tailapīḍakānāṃ tena vijñapayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7194: atha dāni piṇḍacāram aṇvanti paśyati tailaṃ māpiyantaṃ yāvat pūraṃ pi pātraṃ labhati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7195: yāvat labhyā pratyutpannaprayogeṇa vaktuṃ imāye pi dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:7196: evaṃ madhu / yadi śleṣmavikāro bhavati labhyaṃ madhu vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7197: taṃ pi dāni nā kṣamati madhughātakānāṃ tena vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7199: yadi gilānā bhavati vaidyo āha ārye guḍaprayogaṃ karohīti labhyaṃ guḍaṃ vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7202: atha dāni piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati yo kulehi gāvo duhyantāṃ na dāni vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7209: artho āryāye dugdhenāpūram pi pātraṃ pratīcchaty anāpattiḥ yāvat pratyutpannaprayogena labhyā vaktuṃ imāya pi dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:7217: vaidyo āha dadhikṛtyaṃ karohīti labhyaṃ dadhi vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7218: atha dāni piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati dadhi māpīyamānaṃ labhyā mastu vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7223: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī vamanaṃ virecanaṃ vā kartukāmā bhavati vaidyo jalpati ārye abhiṣyandehi matsyarasehīti /
V05bhivin_u:7225: atha dāni piṇḍacāram aṇvati labhyaṃ āmbūkāñjikaṃ vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7232: atha dāni piṇḍacāram aṇvati labhyaṃ śākarasaṃ vijñapayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7238: atha dāni jānāti amukasmiṃ kāle kadācid gailānyaṃ bhaviṣyati imāni bhaiṣajyāni durlabhāni bhaviṣyantīti pratikṛty eva yācati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7249_0: yāni kho punar imāni praṇītasammatāni bhojanāni bhavanti sayyath' īdaṃ sarpiḥ evaṃrūpaṃ
V05bhivin_u:7249_1: taṃ bhikṣuṇī agilānā kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā
V05bhivin_u:7250: asaṃpreyam me ārye gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpannā taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:7254_0: yāni kho punar imāni praṇītasammatāni bhojanāni bhavanti sayyath' īdaṃ māṃsaṃ evaṃrūpaṃ
V05bhivin_u:7254_1: bhikṣuṇī agilānā kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñapāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā pratideśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya /
V05bhivin_u:7255: asaṃpreyam me ārye gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vā tan dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:7267: 253. śaikṣā vistareṇa kartavyā yathā bhikṣuṇāṃ sarve ṣaḍvargāh sthāpayitvā haritodake /
V05bhivin_u:7354: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo paścimaṃ prahāṇaṃ svastikaparyaṅkena niṣīdanti /
V05bhivin_u:7355: athāparāye dāni bhikṣuṇīye vraṇamukhena dīrghako 'nusrotena praviṣṭo /
V05bhivin_u:7356: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7359: gacchatha tāye amukaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ detha tato so dīrghako niṣkramiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:7360: tāye dāni taṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ dinnaṃ pibanāye /
V05bhivin_u:7361: so dīrghako anusrotam āgato na ca mṛto /
V05bhivin_u:7363: evaṃ ca nāmā yūyaṃ svastikaparyaṅkena niṣīdatha /
V05bhivin_u:7364: tena hi na kṣamati svastikaparyaṅkena niṣīdituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7367: atha khalv ekinā padena paryaṅko baddhavyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7369: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī svastikaparyaṅkena niṣīdati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7374: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kaṭhine cīvaraṃ nikṣipiya sīvanti /
V05bhivin_u:7375: aparāye bhikṣuṇīye vaṃsavidalikāya vraṇamukhena kṛtaṃ rudhiram utpāditaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7379: tena hi na kṣamati kaṭhine niṣīdituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7381: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo cīvara niṣīditukāmā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:7383: atha khu upasthānaśālāyām vā prāsāde vā prahāṇaśālāyām vā ākārṣān dattvā cīvarakaṃ prajñapiya sīvitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7385: pīṭhasya vā mañcasya vā upari prajñapayitvā sīvitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7386: athaivaṃ pi na bhavati jānukānām upari sthāpayyitvā sīvitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7387: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kaṭhine niṣīdati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7392: sthūlanandā dāni bhikṣuṇī saṃbahulāni strīhi sārdhaṃ nadīm ajirāvatīṅ gatvā ekānte cīvarakāṇī nikṣipiya snānāyāvatīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:7393: sā dāni pratikṛtyevottaritvā veṭhakena kāyaṃ veṭhayitvā strīṇām āha /
V05bhivin_u:7397: kim punar āryāya muṇḍāya piṇḍilikāya etena kāryaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7401: yaṃ tāhi strīhi avadhyāpitaṃ taṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7406: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat tena hi na kṣamati veṭhakena kāyaṃ veṭhayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7408: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veṭhakena paṭṭakena vā kāyaṃ veṭhayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7409: atha dāni paṭṭikāya vā lohakena vā kāyaṃ veṭhayati /
V05bhivin_u:7410: na kṣamati dvir api vellakaṃ trir api vellakaṃ veṭhayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7412: atha dāni vātena pārśvaṃ gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:7413: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati kiñcāpi paṭṭakena kāyaṃ veṭhayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7419: sā pratikṛty' eva uttaritvā śroṇībhaṇḍakam ābandhitvā āha /
V05bhivin_u:7420: prajāpatī prajāpati nidhyāyatha māṃ kim aham śobhāmi na śobhāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:7425: bhagavān āha tena hi na kṣamati śroṇībhaṇḍaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7428: śaṅkhāvarttakā vā śirikā vā pīlukā vā vidrumā vā akṣarakṣā vā suvarṇarūpyamayā vā maṇimayā vā prakālakā vā antamasato sūtramaṇikā vā bandhati /
V05bhivin_u:7429: tena ca śroṇībhaṇḍakachandaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7434: eṣaivārthotpattiḥ yāvad gṛhiṇībhaṇḍakam ābandhitvā yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:7449: yad vā punar anyad api kiñcid gṛhiṇībhāṇḍaṃ sarvan na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:7450: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇībhaṇḍakam ābandhayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7451: atha dāni bhaiṣajyabhaṇḍakam ābandhati jvarasūtrakam vā anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7456: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahāntehi kulehi pravrajitā alaṅkārikāny ādāya /
V05bhivin_u:7457: kumārikānāṃ vuhyantīnāṃ utsavasamaye tithi parvaṇyā devayātrādiṣu kṛtakāni bhāṇḍakāni dadantī /
V05bhivin_u:7462: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhiṇīalaṅkāraṃ dhārayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7463: yadi kācid gṛhiṇī pravrajati yadi tāya kiñcid alaṅkāraṃ bhavati vaktavyā visarjehi /
V05bhivin_u:7464: atha dāni paśyati durbhikṣa vā bhaveya piṇḍapāto vā na labhyeta jarādurbalā vā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā gailānyam vā kiñcid bhaviṣyati alpalābho mātṛgrāmo mā vihanyeyā ti /
V05bhivin_u:7466: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī alaṅkāram aparityājayitvā pravrajeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7472: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīyakanyāyo koliyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākulehi pravrajitā ceṭikām ādāya pravrajanti /
V05bhivin_u:7473: tāyo ceṭikāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo veśyaṃ (!) vāhayanti /
V05bhivin_u:7479: evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ veśyām upasthāpayatha /
V05bhivin_u:7482: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veśyām upasthāpayati tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7489: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mahākulehi pravrajanti /
V05bhivin_u:7491: tāyo dāni ārāmikinīyo prāsādikāyo jano dāni ojjhāyati /
V05bhivin_u:7493: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:7495: tena hi na kṣamati paudagalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7499: sā eṣā bhikṣūṇī yā paudgalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7505: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi gacchantīya cīvaram utkṣipīyati /
V05bhivin_u:7510: bhagavān āha tena saṃkakṣikā nāma kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:7511: samkakṣikāṃ prāvarantīya tathā prāvaritavyaṃ yathā dāni stanāpīḍitā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:7512: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃkakṣikān nopasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7513: santī na prāvarayati vinayātikramaḥ idam ucyate saṃkakṣikāpratisaṃyuktaṃ // 0 //
V05bhivin_u:7519: tena hi na kṣamati nagnikāyā snātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7522: na kṣamati nadīyam vā oghe vā puṣkiriṇīyam vā taḍāge vā nagnikāya snāpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7525: atha dāni vihāre gupte pradeśe nagnikā snāyaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7534: so manuṣyo puno puno śabdaṃ śṛṇoti /
V05bhivin_u:7538: bhavatu āryaputra aham etaṃ jānāmi kin tavānena jñānena /
V05bhivin_u:7542: etā āryamiśrikāyo brahmacāriṇīyo kāmarāgena khajjantīyo hastatalena āsphoṭayanti āṅgajātaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7548: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī hastatalenāṅgajātam āsphoṭayati pātreṇa vā kupātreṇa vā kaṃsikāya vā viḍallāya vā anyena vā puna kenacit tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7553: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya kāmarāgeṇa khajjantīya jatumaṭṭhakaṃ mañcakaṃ yantritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7556: tāya dāni saṃbhrāntāya asamanvāharitvā sa mañcako bahin niṣkāsito /
