V05bhivin_u:7558: kahiṃ agnir utthito kasya gṛhād utthito /
V05bhivin_u:7566_0: jatumaṭṭhakaṃ nāma jatusya vā lohasya vā trapusya vā nāgrasya vā hārakūṭasya vā dantasya
V05bhivin_u:7566_1: vā coḍakasya vā mṛttikāya vā aṅgajātakākāraṃ kṛtvā sve aṅgajāte praveśeti tena ca
V05bhivin_u:7572: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:7580: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo bāhirabāhireṇa dhovanti tathaiva durgandhaṃ vāyati /
V05bhivin_u:7581: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:7585: bhikṣuṇīya dhovantīya ekam aṅguliveṭhakaṃ praveśayitvā dhovitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7587: atidūraṃ praveśeti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7592: tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnām anumāsaṃ anumāsaṃ ṛtur āgacchati /
V05bhivin_u:7594: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato āroceti /
V05bhivin_u:7598: yasyā eṣa ṛtur āgacchati śoṇitaṃ sravati tayā ānīcolakaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7600: nāpi kṣamati gāḍhaṃ nāpi kṣamati atidūraṃ praveśayituṃ yathā tenaiva kāmarāgam vinodayet /
V05bhivin_u:7602: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī atidūram vā praveśeti gāḍham vā praveśeti yathā tenaiva kāmarāgam vindodeti sthūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7607: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo strītīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovanti /
V05bhivin_u:7613: tena hi na kṣamati stritīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7615: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ strītīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7622: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo puruṣatīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovanti /
V05bhivin_u:7624: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ puruṣatīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7631: tena hi na kṣamati rajakatīrthe dhovituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7632: atha khu kuṇḍālake vā kaṭāhake vā mallake vā dakānake vā udakaṃ gṛhya ekānte dhovitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7634: atha dāni bāhirodakaṃ bhavati yahiṃ nirvāho tahin dhovitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7635: tāni leṇṭakāni śoṣayitavyāni yadā puno ṛtu nāgacchati tadā puno dātavyāni /
V05bhivin_u:7636: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rajakatīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7641: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya raktacittāya aṅgajātaṃ udake dhāritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7646: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udakadhārāyām vā kuṇḍikadhārāyām vā udakacoḍena vā ālukaveṇṭikāyām vā praṇālyām vā aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7647: atha dāni snāyati taḍāge vā prasravaṇe vā praṇāliyam vā na dāni agrato udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ yathā pṛṣṭhīya vā śīrṣeṇa vā udakadhārāṃ praticcheya tathā snāyitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7648: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agrato mukhāṃ udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyati tāya ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7653: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya raktacittāya udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhāritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7654: tāye aśucir āgato yathā udakadhārāya yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:7655: tena hi na kṣamati udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhārayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7657: yā dāni tāyo bhavanti girinadīyo śīghrasrotāyo tahiṃ aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accyam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7658: atha dāni snāyati na kṣamati agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyituṃ pṛṣṭhatomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7659: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7665: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nānāprakārehi mocayanti mūlakena palāṇḍūkebukāye sobhañjanakena latikāya /
V05bhivin_u:7668: tena hi na kṣamati vikṛtīhi mocayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7670_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī mūlakena vā palāṇḍūya vā kebukāya vā sobhañjanakena vā latikāya vā
V05bhivin_u:7670_1: illādukāya vā trapusena vā allābūya vā kakṣārukena vā anyena vā puna kenacin mocayati
V05bhivin_u:7670_2: tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7675: aparasya dāni bhikṣusya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kriyate /
V05bhivin_u:7679: kin nu khalu labhyā etaṃ kartuṃ utāho na labhyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7684: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7685: karmapratisaṃyuktaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ (!) /
V05bhivin_u:7686: atha dāni na kocit parikuśalo karmakārako bhavati labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣusya uddeśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7687: atha dāni karmakarentasya vismarati labhyā bhikṣuṇīya anupradātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7688: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣusya karma karoti vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7689: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīye karma karoti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7694_0: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī kauśeyacīvareṇa prāvṛtā jñātikulaṃ gacchati sthūlavṛṣito devo
V05bhivin_u:7694_1: ovṛṣṭo kauśeyacīvaramovṛṣṭaṃ kāyeśliṣṭaṃ sphaṭikapratyuṣṭo viya kāyodṛśyati jano
V05bhivin_u:7695: sā dāni utkuṭukā upaviṣṭā antevāsinīhi parivṛtā /
V05bhivin_u:7704: karttimaṃ prāvarati samvaragāmīvinayātikramaḥ kiñcāpi bhikṣur ubhayaṃ prāvarati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7709: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī vihārasyākāśatalake ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramati /
V05bhivin_u:7712: janena uccagghāyati paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā alābutumbakena viya nadīṃ taratīti /
V05bhivin_u:7718: saṃkakṣikāye upariṭo osārayitavyo yathā gaṇḍā praticchannā bhaveṃsuḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gaṇḍapraticchādanaṃ paṭaṃ na prāvarati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7719: na dāni kṣamati prākaṭe pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7720: na dāni kṣamati prākate pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7721: atha dāni vihārasya gupte pradeśe caṅkramati ekasaṃkakṣikāya anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7728: yā dāni kumāriyo vuhyanti navavadhukāyo vā ānīyanti tāyo alaṅkarenti gṛheṇa gṛhan nīyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7729: alaṅkarituṃ khajjabhojjaṃ labhanti tena vṛttiṃ kalpenti /
V05bhivin_u:7736: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śīrṣam vā prasādheti akṣiṇī vā añjeti cūrṇakena vā mukhaṃ ocūrṇeti tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7737: atha dāni akṣiṇīduḥkham ti śirovedanā vā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:7738: ardhāvabhedakā vā labhyā akṣiṇī añjayituṃ śīrṣam vā mārjayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7743: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākula pravrajitāyo utpalāni vāpenti vikrīṇanti ca /
V05bhivin_u:7749: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni vāpayituṃ utpalavāpakapratisamyuktaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7750: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī vāpeti vikrīṇāti ca tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7751: atha dāni caityārthāya vāpeti bhagavataḥ pūjākarmāya vāpeti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7756: evam eva sumanāvāpanāya kartavyaṃ yāvat idam ucyate sumanāvāpanāpratisaṃyuktaṃ //grā //
V05bhivin_u:7762: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo utpalāni granthayitvā vikrīṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:7769: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni granthayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7771: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī utpaladāmām vāmallikādāmām vā āraṅgaṇadāmām vā kṛtvā vikrīṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:7773: atha dāni mālyopahāro bhavati jātimahā vā bodhimahā vā dharmacakramahā vā ānandamahā vā rāhulamahā vā pañcavārṣikā vā /
V05bhivin_u:7777: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī mutpalamālām vā mallikāmālām vā āraṅgaṇamālām vā granthayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7781: evam eva sumanāgranthikāya nānākaraṇaṃ granthiguṇaṃ vā mālāguṇam vā puṣpakañcukam vā kṛtvā vikrīṇāti /
V05bhivin_u:7787: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo yāvan mahākulapravrajitāyo saṃjñikāḥ sūtraṃ kartayitvā vikrīṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:7795: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kambalam vā karpāsam vā kṣaumam vā kauśeyam vā śāṇam vā bhaṅgam vā anyam vā kartayitvā vikrīṇāti tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7796: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pariśrāmaṇaṃ vā kṣīnaṃ vā bhavati labhyaṃ sī
V05bhivin_u:7807: vayaṃ te rakṣiṣyāmaḥ sā dān āha gamiṣyāmi āryāye mūlaṃ āryā me rakṣiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:7808: tāhi tāye nūpurāṇi ābaddhāni karṇikā ābaddhā valayāni āviddhāni alaṅkṛtā rakṣoparaktehi vastrehi parihitā vāvāguṇṭhitā ca /
V05bhivin_u:7810: so dāni manuṣyo tān dvāre sthitvā avaloketi /
V05bhivin_u:7811: yāṃ velāṃ niṣkramiṣyati tato haṃ gṛhṇīṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:7815: sā dāni bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatā bhikṣuṇīhi dṛṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:7819: nāhaṃ pratyodhāvitā api tu mama devaro pratyodhāvayitukāmo /
V05bhivin_u:7825: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayasi /
V05bhivin_u:7826: tena hi na kṣamati ācāraṃ vikopayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7827: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī tyaktamuktena cittena ācāraṃ vikopayati abhikṣuṇī bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:7830: bhikṣur api atyaktamuktena cittena rakṣārthaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7836: sā dāni aparaṃ mahāntaṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:7846: āryāya ahaṃ ettakaṃ caittakaṃ ca dāsye /
V05bhivin_u:7852: yā prathamā bhikṣā lakṣati tāṃ bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā pratiṣṭhāye ti /
V05bhivin_u:7860: tāya dāni bhītāya tharatharāpantīya pātraṃ praṇāmitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7864: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ āyuṣmān mahākaśyapo bhikṣuṇām ārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:7872: duṣkṛtan te nande naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:7873: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ pātraṃ praticchādesi /
V05bhivin_u:7874: tena hi na kṣamati pātraṃ praticchādayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7876: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya prākaṭena pātreṇa piṇḍāya aṭituṃ praticchādayitvā aṭitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7877: yadā bhikṣāṃ praticchati tadā ugghāṭiya praticchitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7878: yadi bhikṣuṃ rathyāyāṃ paśyati ugghāṭiya upadarśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7879: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī prākaṭena pātreṇa aṭati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7880: bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā na ugghāṭiya darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7885: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo onaddhavarce varcakuṭīye upaviśanti /
V05bhivin_u:7889: te taṃ dārakaṃ ekāyāṃ bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā ojjhāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7893: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati onaddhavarce upaviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7895: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya onaddhavarcakuṭiṃ kārāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7899: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī onaddhavarcakuṭīyaṃ āgatodakāyam vā upaviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7904: tāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya śākiyakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo mallakanyāyo jentāke snāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7908: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jentāke snāyituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7909: atha dāni gilānā bhavati labhyā vihāre svedayitvā tailena aṅgāni mrakṣayitvā snāyituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7910: sā esā bhikṣuṇī jentāke snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7915: tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣuṇīnām āraṅyakāni śayanāsanāni na pratikṣiptāni grāmāntikāni ca akṛtāni /
V05bhivin_u:7916: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni mahāprajāpatīpramukhāni rājakārāme viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:7917: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo kolitakanyāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:7923: tāyo puno madhyamayāmaṃ evam paścimaṃ yāmaṃ prahāṇam upaviṣṭāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7926: yāhi ca middham anokrāntaṃ tāḥ sratti vaihāyasam abhyudgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7927: yāvanta samāpattikā yāhi ca middham avakrāntaṃ tāyo kulaputrakehi gṛhya viheṭhitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7930: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati āraṇyake śayanāsane vastuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7931: atha dāni cātuṣpathikā sarvarātrikā bhavati upāsakopāsikā gacchanti labhyaṃ vastuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7932: tahiṃ pi na kṣamati pratigupte pradeśe vastuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7933: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī āraṇyake śayanāsane vāsaṃ upagacchati varṣam vā vasati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7937: 288. yo bhikṣūṇām āstāro anāstāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7938: yo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āstāro anāstāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ // grā //
V05bhivin_u:7940: yo bhikṣūṇām uddhāro anuddhāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7942: yo bhikṣuṇīnām uddhāro anuddhāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ // 0 //
V05bhivin_u:7944: yo bhikṣūṇām abhihāro anabhihāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ // ḷ //
V05bhivin_u:7945: yo bhikṣuṇīnām abhihāro anabhihāro so bhikṣūnāṃ // ḷ //
V05bhivin_u:7951: yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnām āmiṣaṃ akalpiyaṃ kalpiyaṃ tam bhikṣūṇāṃ // 2 //
V05bhivin_u:7953: labhyaṃ bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya pratigrahayituṃ sthāpayitvā jatarūparajataṃ agnikalpiyañ ca // 3 //
V05bhivin_u:7954: labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣūṇā pratigrāhāpayituṃ sthāpayitvā jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ agnikalpiyañ ca // ṇka //
V05bhivin_u:7963: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīnām ekapiṭake eke pi vicāre vastuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7965: yadāsya bhūyo bhikṣu liṅgaṃ prādurbhavati tadā bhikṣuvihāram āgantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7966: sā evāsyopasampadā tad eva varṣāgraṃ // tṛ //
V05bhivin_u:7984: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram anvaṇṭī taṃhi praviṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:7987: imam ārye niṣkrāmetu yadi jīvantīyo mucciṣyāmo asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāye vṛttiṃ dāsyāmo āryāye etaṃ bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:7988: tāya tasyāḥ pātraṃ upanāmitaṃ imaṃhi dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:7989: nānākārāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ pātraṃ pūrayitvā dinnaṃ muktāyāḥ maṇīnāṃ sphoṭikasya musāragalvasya lohikāyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7991: bhaṭehi ca dṛṣṭā te dān āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7996: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8002: tena hi na kṣamati ratanaṃ praticchādayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8004: etaṃ dāni mahāntaṃ kulaṃ rājakule nophatam bhavati yāvan na lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:8007: atha dāni lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati rakṣā vā kṛtā bhavati bhaṭehi parivāritam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:8009: imaṃ gṛhaṃ rājakulenopahataṃ yadi tāvaj jīvantīyo mucyāmaḥ asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāyā eva bhaviṣyatīti na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8011: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8013: caityasya demaḥ saṃghasya vā demaḥ āryāye eva demo ti gṛhṇītavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8016: atha pṛcchīyati kasyedan ti caityasya saṃghasya mameti /
V05bhivin_u:8019: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ratanapūrṇapātraṃ praticchādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:8024: nadīye ajirāvatīye pāre ubhayato sāṃghikaṃ bhaktaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8030: na kṣamati bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya saha ekanāvām abhiruhituṃ ti /
V05bhivin_u:8032: ekabhikṣuṇāpi nāvā paliguddhā bhavati dvihi trihi evaṃ paliguddhā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:8033: yadā te bhikṣū uttaritāḥ tadā bhikṣuṇīyo ekanāvāparipūrakena tāritāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8035: atha kho mahāprajāpatī gautamī sāyāhnasamaye parikilantehi mahābhūtehi bhagavato pādavandīkāṃ upasaṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:8038: atha mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato tad eva sarvam āroceti /
V05bhivin_u:8040: tena hi aṣṭāhi bhikṣuṇīhi yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8042: ete dāni bhavanti bhaktā vā tarpaṇā vā yavāgupānā vā paraṃ vārṣikā vā mahāpañcavārṣikā vā aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āsanāni sthāpayitavyāni yathāvṛddhikāya /
V05bhivin_u:8043: aṣṭa vā nirmuṣṭikā hastāḥ pratikṛty' eva gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8044: tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo aṣṭānām āsanāni sthāpayitvā niṣīdanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:8046: aṣṭābhir bhikṣuṇībhir yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyam u śiṣṭābhi yathāgatikāya // 0 //
V05bhivin_u:8059: sarve anye nava padā anūnā pratiṣitavyā puna tahiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8064: yatrāsi yānaṃ phalavikṛtiṃ nirdiśet tahiṃ vijñaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8065: yatrāsi sahaniṣadyā ekorttakaṃ tahiṃ samādiśet chatraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8067: yatrāsi śastrakarma nirdiśet tahiṃ and āpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8068: yatrāsi viśokadarśanaṃ āpattipratikarma tatra nirdiśed vijñaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8069: etāvatā uddhārāḥ prakīrṇake ye ca ovṛṣāḥ vargaṃ samuddhariya dvādaśamaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8070: nava padāni punar eva bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prakīrṇake sarvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhikṣuprakīrṇakato vargās trayodaśa kāryāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8071: anye ca pañca vargāyutakā yathā bhikṣuṇīsūtre /
V05bhivin_u:8073: jentākaṃ varca kaṭhinaṃ uddharitvā avaśeṣā tathaiva kāryāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8075: taṃ sarvaṃ saṅkale puna vargā aṣṭādaśa prakīrṇake svayaṃbhunā nirdiṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:8077: pañcaśatāni anūnāni apare ca padā catustriṃśat /
V05bhivin_u:8259: 'phagspa dge 'dunphalchen pai 'jig rtenlas 'dasparsmrabai dge sloṅgi 'dulba silbu rdzogsso //
V05bhivin_u:8269: kahiṃ dāni saṃgho śīlavān guṇavān bhadrako śikṣākāmo vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8272: kahiṃ dāni abhiyuktā bhikṣubhikṣuṇīyo vā kriyāyāṃ vā /
V05bhivin_u:8273: khaṇḍapralugge vā uddeśe svādhyāye yoge manasikāre kahiṃ vā śīghraṃ parisamāpyet /
V05bhivin_u:8276: amukaṃhi bhikṣū vā bhikṣuṇīyo vā abhiyuktā ity ādi /
V05bhivin_u:8277: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ ātmano pariṇāmayen niḥsargika /
V05bhivin_u:8282: bhikṣur api gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8284: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī gaṇalābhaṃ pariṇataṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikaṃ // lṛ //
V05bhivin_u:8294: vargāvaśeṣāḥ deśanā ca vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīnāñ ca ye daśa praṇītasammatam mātraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8295: yāvat vāsādanā iha chadanā sahaśayyā ca /
V05bhivin_u:8298: araṇyāyāṃ ca śāṭikā dvāviṃśati śuddhekehi uddhārā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pravuccati /
V05bhivin_u:8299: deśanām uddharitvāna saṃcintyaṃ samodahe puno cātra //
V05bhivin_u:8300: atha puno vihāraṃ uddhariya bhaṇeya ko kuccaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8302: apanetvā samodahe cīvaraṃ puno tatra vijñaptim uddharitvāna aparihatā catu nirdiṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:8305: tatra chādanā uddharitvāna udakahāsyaṃ ca nirdiṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8308: samoho puno bhavati tatra eva tāvatā ca /
V05bhivin_u:8313: yate te bhūṣāḥ purimā ca sapta vargāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8316: yutaṃ yan bhikṣuṇīsūtre taṃ sarvam saṃkaletvāna śataṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:8318: uddiṣṭā āryamiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8323: yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // ḥ //
V05bhivin_u:8325: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantreti /
V05bhivin_u:8326: ekam idaṃ gautami samayaṃ tathāgato ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ viharati /
